title: AfriLex AI
subtitle: AfriLex AI is a Pan-African legal-rights assistant built with Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal and multilingual intelligence.
description:
AfriLex AI Companion is a Pan-African legal-rights assistant built with Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal and multilingual intelligence. It helps people understand laws, analyze documents, and receive safe, reliable legal guidance using text, voice, images, and live video.

Digital literacy remains a major challenge across Africa—many citizens struggle with navigating apps, reading long documents, or understanding legal terms. AfriLex solves this by communicating in people’s own languages, accents, cultures, and expressions, making legal understanding feel natural and familiar rather than technical or intimidating.

Legal help is also extremely expensive across the continent. Most people cannot afford a lawyer or even a brief consultation. AfriLex fills this critical gap by offering instant, low-cost legal information, helping users understand contracts, fines, rental issues, police encounters, workplace disputes, and more.

Users can simply show a document to the camera, speak in their mother tongue, or interact face-to-face, and AfriLex explains everything clearly. With support for 12+ African languages, the assistant becomes accessible to millions who are often left out of digital and legal systems.

Built entirely in Google AI Studio, the project demonstrates how Gemini 3’s reasoning, vision, and conversational abilities can dramatically increase legal literacy and empower communities at scale.
keywords: legal, afrilex, people, african, assistant, built, gemini, understand, documents, digital

title: I built AURA Creator Studio
subtitle: Transforming Ideas into Digital Gold
description:
Welcome to AURA, a next-generation creative workspace designed exclusively for the modern content creator. In an era where attention is the new currency, AURA serves as your digital mint, transforming raw, fleeting ideas into polished, high-value content assets.

We built AURA because we understand the struggle of "Blank Canvas Paralysis." You have the charisma, the camera gear, and the audience, but sometimes the idea just won't take shape. Or perhaps you have the concept, but you're stuck on how to package it for the algorithm.

AURA is not just a utility; it is a creative partner. It combines the raw computational power of Google's Gemini AI with a sophisticated, user-centric design philosophy we call "Gilded Noir." The result is a platform that feels less like software and more like a luxury studio suite—a place where your creativity is treated with the dignity it deserves.

AURA handles the heavy lifting of pre-production, allowing you to focus on what you do best: performing and connecting with your audience.

The first 3 seconds of your video determine its destiny. AURA generates 5 distinct viral hook options for every query. These aren't just random titles; they are psychologically calibrated scroll-stoppers designed to trigger curiosity, debate, or emotion.

A good hook is wasted on a bad video. AURA writes a complete 60-second script tailored specifically to the pacing of short-form content.

Before they click, they must see. AURA leverages the gemini-2.5-flash-image model to generate 4 high-fidelity thumbnail concepts. These serve as artistic storyboards, giving you concrete visual references for lighting, composition, and expression before you even pick up a camera.

Content knows no borders, and neither does AURA. We have engineered the system to be culturally and emotionally intelligent.

Expand your reach beyond your native tongue. AURA natively supports generation in:

Context is king. A tutorial on "How to file taxes" requires a different energy tha

title: Onlygains.ai
subtitle: Personal coach that tracks and manages fitness and nutrition and recovery of athletes.
description:
Onlygains.ai is the first closed-loop Preventive Health Operating System designed to democratize elite personal coaching. It acts as an always-on, hyper-intelligent AI coach that lives in your pocket (specifically on WhatsApp), connecting the fragmented silos of Fitness, Nutrition, and Recovery into a single, cohesive lifecycle.

The current fitness landscape is broken and fragmented. Athletes and health-conscious individuals are forced to juggle multiple disconnected tools—separate apps for food logging, workout tracking, and recovery metrics—that never "talk" to each other. Furthermore, elite human coaching is expensive, often relies on static spreadsheets, and lacks the bandwidth to manage every vernacular lifestyle trend (Keto, Hyrox, etc.) simultaneously.

We built Onlygains.ai to be the "Andrew Huberman in your pocket". By leveraging the advanced reasoning and multimodal capabilities of Gemini-3-pro, we have created an agent that doesn't just log data—it understands it, plans for you, and keeps you accountable 24/7.

Key Features:

At the core of Onlygains.ai is Gemini-3-pro, which serves as the "brain" of our operation. We chose this model for its superior long-context handling and reasoning abilities, allowing the AI to:

We are moving beyond simple "tracking" to "measurable prevention". By making data-driven health decisions accessible to everyone—not just those who can afford human coaches—we aim to increase the health span of our users and tap into the $150B preventive health market. Onlygains.ai is the lifelong companion that finally connects all the dots.

title: Penny AI - Gemini 3 Pro AI studio Hackathon
subtitle: Penny AI: AI Finance tracker featuring 3D budget visualization voice logging, splitting, and a context-aware reasoning chat assistant
description:
Penny AI is a financial intelligence platform engineered entirely within Google AI Studio using Gemini 3 Pro, driven by two core multimodal engines. The first is a high-fidelity voice parser that deconstructs complex spoken narratives directly into structured, multi-party transactions, giving a seamless and very easy way of logging transactions or income. The second is the "Penny AI" Chat, which is a comprehensive AI Chat that functions as a dynamic UI Orchestrator and financial coach that knows almost everything about your spending and habits and goals and more. By leveraging sophisticated context injection, grounding the model in the user's entire financial ecosystem, the AI executes precise tool calls to deterministically (it doesn't pass arguments in the tool call) render interactive charts and widgets directly within the chat stream based on real-time queries.

Beyond analysis, Penny actively manages the user's financial state by automating recurring transaction rules for subscriptions and bills, while coordinating family syncing and debt settlement using a greedy minimization algorithm. The Analytics page offers a comprehensive financial deep dive featuring AI-powered spending forecasts and "Hasala IQ" insights, fun lifestyle equivalents for your expenses (like instant noodles or movie tickets), and detailed interactive visualizations for your daily trends, weekly spending patterns, income sources, and category breakdowns. Additionally, it integrates the Gemini 2.5 Flash Image model to generate context-aware infographics on demand. Ultimately, Penny aims to transform the chaotic reality of personal finance, split bills, confusing subscriptions, and panic, into a clear, actionable, intuitive and visually engaging path forward.
keywords: financial, penny, chat, your, spending, within, using, gemini, directly, into

title: Renalytics
subtitle: A web application to help in the early detection of Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) by assessing risk factors
description:
This web application serves as a comprehensive digital guardian for renal health, designed to facilitate the early detection of Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD). By bridging the gap between complex medical data and user-friendly insights, the platform empowers users to take control of their long-term well-being.

Key Features:

Intelligent Risk Assessment: Users input key health metrics (such as blood pressure, glucose levels, and GFR), which the application analyzes against established medical risk factors to calculate a personalized risk profile.

Dynamic Trend Visualization: The app transforms static data points into clear, interactive graphs. This allows users and healthcare providers to spot negative trends over time—often the first sign of silent progression—before they become critical.

Actionable Insights: Beyond just data, the system provides tailored lifestyle recommendations and alerts, guiding users on when to seek professional medical advice.

Core Functionality:

Input & Analysis: The system ingests patient demographic and physiological data to compute a risk stratification score based on KDIGO (Kidney Disease: Improving Global Outcomes) guidelines.

Data Visualization Module: Utilizing charting libraries, the app renders longitudinal data to visualize the trajectory of biomarkers like Creatinine and BUN, highlighting deviations from the norm.

Decision Support: The final module processes the risk score to output tiered recommendations, ranging from "Monitor at Home" to "Consult Nephrologist Immediately."
keywords: data, risk, users, medical, application, health, kidney, disease, insights, input

description:
1️⃣ Overview: What Is MediScan360?

MediScan360 is an intelligent, AI-powered medical triaging and personal health-analysis companion designed to bring healthcare guidance to anyone, anywhere, whenever they need it. Built on Google’s latest Gemini 3 Pro multimodal intelligence, MediScan360 analyzes symptoms, lab reports, prescriptions, medical imaging, and voice descriptions to deliver highly accurate, real-time health insights. Instead of waiting for appointments, struggling to interpret medical documents, or guessing what your symptoms might indicate, MediScan360 empowers users with early detection, personalized recommendations, and actionable next steps. It is not a replacement for medical professionals, but rather a powerful assistant that enhances decision-making, improves understanding, and helps users communicate more effectively with healthcare providers. MediScan360 combines AI triage, medical reasoning, document interpretation, risk analysis, and personalized health coaching into one unified mobile application. Its core goal is to make healthcare more understandable, more accessible, and more preventive by catching warning signs early and guiding users with clarity and confidence.

title: Verified Hands: The Multimodal AI Proctor
subtitle: An AI verification system that audits performance and grades trade skills with strict security checks.
description:
I built Verified Hands. It’s a real-time AI certification platform that solves this by turning your laptop or phone into a strict exam center.

The idea is simple: You don't just take a test; you demonstrate your skill live on camera. I used Google Gemini 3 Pro to create an AI "Drill Sergeant" that actually watches you work, guides you through tasks, and grades you instantly. It’s not just recording video—it’s understanding what you’re doing.                                                How It Works

Identity First: You can't just log in. You have to capture a live "Master Key" photo. The system then checks your face every few seconds during the exam to make sure you haven't swapped places with someone else.

The 360° Object Hunter: Before you start, the AI makes you scan your room with your camera. It hunts for phones, second monitors, or people hiding in the corner. If the room isn't clean, the exam doesn't start.

The Drill Sergeant: This is the cool part. If you're doing a physical task (like soldering) or a digital one (like coding), the AI watches you. If you hold a tool wrong or forget your safety goggles, it shouts at you (literally, using text-to-speech) to fix it. It forces you to do it right.

Stealth Security: While you work, a background "Interceptor" is analyzing everything. It tracks your eye movement to see if you're looking at notes, and even monitors your jaw movement to catch you whispering to a friend.

The Result: If you pass, you get a Verified Career Passport. It’s a digital certificate with a hash of your session and a detailed breakdown of your skills. It’s proof that you actually did the work.

Key Features

Powered by Gemini 3 Pro: I used the new "Deep Think" capabilities so the AI can reason through complex physical tasks, not just guess.

Hybrid Verification: I combined Gemini 1.5 Flash for super-fast background security checks with Gemini 3 Pro for the heavy grading logic.

Zero-Trust Security: I added features like a "Tab-Switch Guil

title: GAT LITE DEMO BY Google AI STODIO AND GEMINI
subtitle: A web-based Grand Theft Auto demo has been implemented using Gemini.
description:
Project Overview This project is a web-based, open-world sandbox designed to emulate the core mechanics of Grand Theft Auto, built entirely using Google AI Studio.

Key Features

Core Gameplay: A seamless third-person controller featuring combat mechanics and a vehicle system with advanced physics (suspension, torque, and drift).

World & Logic: A procedurally generated city using instanced meshes, populated by pathfinding NPCs, a functional safehouse, and a mission system with a reactive HUD. In addition, it includes background music and day night system.

Development Workflow The project leveraged a unique Google AI Studio workflow:

1. Code Generation: The core codebase was authored directly within the Build environment.

2. Assistant Loop: A parallel Playground session served as a "co-pilot" for logic verification.

3. Reasoning & Decomposition: Leveraged the model's reasoning capabilities to autonomously decompose complex requirements—specifically 3D vector mathematics—into executable, step-by-step implementations.

4. Multimodal Game Modeling & Debugging: Upload pictures and videos to help with modeling. Context images were uploaded to resolve bugs.

Summary Crucially, I possess zero prior knowledge of game development or React; every line of code in this project was generated by the model and completed in just a few days. This demo stands as a testament to the immense potential of LLMs. By radically lowering the barrier to entry and accelerating development efficiency, Gemini empowers creators to build high-performance 3D simulations regardless of their technical background.

(The link to the auxiliary dialogue is in the Readme.txt file.)
keywords: project, core, system, development, world, mechanics, using, google, studio, logic

title: PDFBoard - A Node Based PDF Editor for Reusable Advanced PDF Workflows
subtitle: PDFBoard is a like n8n but for PDFs, its a node based PDF manipulation tool, which allows advanced combinational workflows with nodes.
description:
There are a lot of PDF editing and manipulation tools in the market, naming few prominent ones, smallpdf or ilovepdf. They do their work well, but the problem with them is they all only offer one tool at a time, and combined workflow containing multistep manipulation is harder to achieve on their platform.

PDFBoard is trying to solve this exact issue by taking a workflow canvas approach like n8n on similar tools, It consists of nodes, which has connectors and can be dragged into the canvas view. Each node performs their own specific thing, for example there is an input node to read files into your workflow, a node like "Merge PDFs" takes multiple PDF inputs and merges them, a preview node lets you preview the data at any step in the workflow and so on.
These fundamental manipulation nodes allow you to create reusable complex workflows, it's like write once and use every time, so you can use PDFBoard to replace any other tools while still having the advanced manipulation features
keywords: manipulation, workflow, node, tools, their, like, there, them, time, pdfboard

title: Project Minus
subtitle: Less Noise. More Meaning.
description:
We conquered storage but failed at digestion. Humanity suffers from the "Indigestion of Alexandria." We are trapped in performative productivity — saving contents we don't read and consuming content to feel productive, yet retaining almost nothing.

minus is a subtractive intelligence engine powered by Gemini 3 Pro. It shifts the focus from the Attention Economy to the Intention Economy, filtering the chaos to reveal the signal.

It transforms "Digital Hoarding" into "Osmotic Learning" through three core capabilities:

The Compass (Reasoning): It transforms specific user needs into targeted micro-learning cycles. A Socratic agent identifies the user's friction point (e.g., "I need to resolve a team conflict") and generates a custom loop to help them incorporate that skill immediately.

The Architect (Long Context): It ingests robust corpora (entire books, transcripts) and transmutes them into a step-by-step journey. It breaks down the full depth of the content into a paced path, integrating the whole document one dose at a time.

The Lens (Creativity): Raw data is dry; stories are sticky. Users select a narrative lens to rewrite content playfully — choose The Best Friend for empathy or The Comedian for wit. This generates a Multimodal Tasting Menu: a custom podcast for listening on the go and an AI infographic for visual reinforcement.

minus slows down the feed to reveal the meaning. Stop hoarding. Start savoring.
keywords: into, content, minus, economy, reveal, transforms, hoarding, learning, user, generates

title: CLARA: AI's Life-Saving Intervention
subtitle: CLARA is a multimodal AI safety net that safeguards clinical logic to detect diagnostic shadowing before it harms patient care.
description:
The Problem: Cognitive Load & System Strain

Diagnostic error affects 12 million Americans annually [1]. In women's health, this crisis is acute: women are diagnosed on average 4 years later than men [2]. This gap highlights the role of cognitive phenomena such as Diagnostic Shadowing [3], a bias where physical symptoms are misattributed to psychiatric history.

However, this is rarely negligence. It is a failure of Dual Process Theory under pressure. High cognitive load forces physicians to rely on System 1 (fast/heuristic thinking), bypassing System 2 (slow/analytical thinking). Harmless shortcuts then mutate into dangerous biases [4].

The Solution: A Cognitive Forcing Strategy

We introduce CLARA: Clinical Logic Assessment & Reasoning Auditor, a multimodal AI agent powered by Gemini 3 Pro. CLARA acts as a Cognitive Forcing Strategy - an "External System 2" that supports physicians when their own cognitive bandwidth is exhausted.

Unlike a scribe recording what is said, CLARA audits the logic of the encounter. Designed as a safety net, she runs in the background to flag high-risk logic patterns for review prior to discharge.

Methodology & Impact

Engineered with the Google AI Studio, CLARA processes consented consultation audio to generate standardized "Audit Flags" (JSON). This transforms the subjective experience of "being dismissed" into objective data, protecting patients from gender-based bias while shielding doctors from the inevitability of human fatigue.

References
keywords: cognitive, system, clara, logic, load, diagnostic, women, bias, high, physicians

title: ChessOdyssey: The Neuro-Symbolic Grandmaster Engine
subtitle: ChessOdyssey is a neuro-symbolic engine combining Gemini 3 Pro’s reasoning with game theory to democratize Grandmaster wisdom
description:
Chess is often an elitist game, accessible mainly through costly coaching. Engines like Stockfish deliver flawless calculations but no guidance--reducing positions to cold numbers (eg "+1.5") without teaching the why or How behind them.

Modern foundation models, by contrast, have incredible multimodal capabilities and can explain concepts, in chess they frequently hallucinate, even producing illegal moves or blundering at amateur level Source-1, a shortcoming also confirmed by Demis Hassabis in recent Game Arena evaluations : "perform… not very well atm" Source-2 and "…Note that none of these AI models are good at chess yet…" Source-3

ChessOdyssey reinvents this paradigm as a Cognitive Gym, a Neuro-Symbolic Cognitive Engine fusing Gemini 3 Pro’s visual reasoning with algorithmic game theory to democratize Grandmaster-level intuition and mastery for all, from children to aspiring pros.

Pure LLMs struggle with chess calculation (often hallucinating illegal moves), while pure engines lack semantic reasoning and multimodal capabilities. ChessOdyssey fuses them:

1. The Neuro Layer (Gemini 3 Pro): Acts as the Visionary Mentor. It uses Multimodal Vision to "see" the board, identify structures, and explain concepts via Socratic dialogue ("Caissa’s Shadow"). Integrating Google Search ("Historical Echo"), it grounds advice in history, while linking the player’s current position to iconic games, reminding them that the challenges they face are the very ones that shaped the legends.

2. The Symbolic Layer ("Mini-Stockfish"): Acts as the Truth Filter. A TypeScript engine powered by chess.js: validates legality, calculates tactics, enforces FIDE rules, and prevents hallucinations. Additionally, it powers an AI opponent that instantly calculates and executes the optimal counter-move in response to the user's play, ensuring a realistic and challenging simulation.

Multimodal Vision Board that extracts FEN (board state) from uploaded chessboard images and overlays live "ghost pi
keywords: chess, board, chessodyssey, vision, game, them, multimodal, source, here, coaching

title: HiveMind: Collaborative Cognitive Architecture
subtitle: Turning AI from a Crutch into a Socratic Tutor.
description:
HiveMind is a "Cognitive Accelerator"—a local-first collaborative learning environment designed to replace passive studying with active neural engagement. Unlike standard chatbots that simply provide answers, HiveMind employs a specialized Socratic Engine powered by Gemini to guide students through deep reasoning, identifying gaps in logic rather than solving problems for them.

How we created it:
Built with React and a local-only SQL database (AlaSQL) for privacy, we orchestrated specific Gemini models for distinct cognitive tasks. We utilize Gemini 2.5 Flash for high-speed syllabus synthesis and Gemini 3.0 Pro (Thinking model) for complex reasoning and generating real-time SVG schematics of abstract concepts. We also integrated the Live API for low-latency, real-time voice debate.

Impact:
HiveMind bridges the gap between AI assistance and human retention. By featuring "The Hive"—a protocol for peer-to-peer knowledge transmission—and auto-generating assessments from student notes, it transforms AI from a homework shortcut into a rigorous academic mentor. It ensures students don't just complete assignments, but actually master the material.

title: AceAnalyzer

description:
# ###### Ace Analyzer: Your Unfiltered Academic Partner
Ace Analyzer isn't another feel‑good app. It's built for the real frustrations students actually face—the ones nobody talks about in polished marketing materials.

You're sitting with a textbook, completely lost. Not just confused about one line, but lost in the way that makes you question whether you're smart enough to understand this at all. The explanations in your book sound like they're written in a different language. Your teacher moved on four topics ago. Google gives you either oversimplified summaries or PhD-level papers with no middle ground.

Chat Mode is that moment when you need someone who doesn't judge, doesn't assume you're stupid for asking, and breaks down concepts the way they should have been explained in the first place. Clear language. Step-by-step. No fluff. Just the core idea explained until it actually lands.

#### Exam Mode (Answer Analyzer): The Moment After the Test
The test is over. You're sitting in the hallway with your friend, both of you confused about how much you lost. You write out your answer hoping someone will read it and tell you exactly where the examiners thought you went wrong—but that feedback never comes. Teachers hand back marks, maybe a circled number, but not a real explanation of the gap between what you wrote and what would have scored higher.

Exam Mode fills that void. Upload a photo of your answer sheet or paste your written response. Ace Analyzer doesn't just mark it wrong—it shows you the structure an excellent answer would have had, the points you missed, and the conceptual gaps hiding in your response. It's like having a ruthless senior who actually cares enough to explain where your thinking broke down and how to think differently next time.

#### Lab Mode: For the Spark You're Afraid to Chase
There's something that interests you. Maybe it's AI, maybe it's economics, maybe it's psychology or climate science. But it's not in your syllabus, and your school

title: StructViz AI
subtitle: Master Data Structures with Interactive Visualization
description:
Remember staring at textbook diagrams of binary trees and thinking "I don't get it"? I built StructViz AI because I was that student. Using Gemini 3 Pro, I created 14 interactive visualizations that actually show you what's happening when algorithms run—not just static diagrams, but real animations you can control.

What's Inside: Everything from the basics (stacks, queues, hash tables) to interview essentials (AVL trees, tries, dynamic programming) to the really cool stuff (pathfinding algorithms racing each other, geometric convex hulls). Each one lets you step through operations frame-by-frame, speed things up or slow them down, and see exactly why an algorithm makes each decision.

The Gemini Magic: Here's where it gets interesting. Sketch a tree on paper, upload it, and watch Gemini turn it into a working visualization. Say "generate a maze and solve it with A-star" out loud—it just works. Ask "why did the algorithm choose this path?"—Gemini explains while highlighting the exact nodes it's talking about. This wasn't possible before Gemini 3's reasoning capabilities.

Why It Matters: Most CS students struggle to visualize algorithms—I know I did. StructViz connects theory to practice by showing how these structures power GPS navigation, autocomplete, database indexing, and everything else we use daily. It's the tool I wish existed when I was learning this stuff.

Built with React, TypeScript, and a ton of late nights. Free, open-source, and ready to help anyone ace their next technical interview.
keywords: gemini, algorithms, each, diagrams, trees, built, structviz, what, when, just

title: Triager.AI
subtitle: Remote Health Triager
description:
Title: Triager.AI: Multimodal AI Medical Assistant
Subtitle: Revolutionizing Remote Triage with Gemini 3 Pro
Track: Healthcare / Social Good
Description:
Triager.AI is a next-generation remote triage platform designed to assist medical professionals in prioritizing patient care. Leveraging the Google Gemini API, specifically the multimodal capabilities of Gemini 3 Pro, the application processes diverse patient data—including symptom images, audio recordings (coughs/speech), and scanned medical records—to provide immediate, AI-driven risk assessments.
How I Created It:
The application is built with React and TypeScript, featuring a "Cyber-Med" aesthetic powered by Tailwind CSS. It uses the Google GenAI SDK to interface with Gemini. The core innovation is the Multimodal Intake system, which aggregates:
Visual Sensor: Captures patient images for dermatological or physical analysis.
Audio Sensor: Records breath/speech patterns for respiratory analysis using the Web Audio API.
Record Scanner: OCRs and analyzes uploaded PDF/Image medical reports.
Data is stored locally using IndexedDB for privacy and persistence. The Doctor Dashboard includes an AR-style visualization mode and real-time analytics charts (Recharts) to visualize population risk.
Impact:
In resource-limited settings, identifying critical cases quickly is a matter of life and death. Triager.AI acts as a force multiplier for doctors, surfacing rare conditions (like PKDL) and correlating complex multimodal symptoms that might be missed in a standard text-based triage, ultimately reducing ER bottlenecks and improving patient outcomes.
keywords: multimodal, medical, gemini, patient, triager, triage, audio, remote, google, application

title: CrashLens: AI-Powered Accident Reconstruction with Gemini 3 Deep Think
subtitle: Transforming dashcam footage into legally-admissible 3D forensic reports using Gemini 3's Deep Think reasoning and pixel-precise analysis
description:
CrashLens AI represents a paradigm shift in how the insurance industry processes collision claims. By leveraging Google Gemini 3 Pro's Deep Think reasoning and pixel-precise spatial analysis, we've built the world's first legally-admissible AI accident reconstructor that transforms raw dashcam footage into comprehensive forensic reports in under 60 seconds.

The Impact: With 40+ million auto claims filed annually in the US alone and average settlement times exceeding 30 days, CrashLens addresses a $45 billion operational inefficiency. Our solution doesn't just detect collisions—it determines liability with court-ready evidence and transparent reasoning.

The Problem: Insurance's "Black Box" Crisis
Current State of Claims Processing
The insurance industry faces a critical paradox:

Data abundance: 63% of US drivers now use dashcams, generating millions of hours of collision footage annually

Processing paralysis: Human adjusters can't efficiently review this video evidence at scale

Legal liability: Existing "Silent Adjuster" AI systems that automate payouts face lawsuits for being opaque "black boxes" that can't explain their decisions under the Daubert standard for evidence admissibility

Real-World Example: State Farm's automated claims system was challenged in court when it couldn't explain why it recommended a lower payout for similar accidents in specific zip codes. The lack of transparent reasoning cost the company millions in bad faith claims.

Why Traditional Computer Vision Fails
Standard CV approaches can detect that a crash occurred (via motion/sound spikes) but cannot:

Determine why it happened (causal reasoning)

Assign legal liability based on traffic laws

Generate auditable evidence that survives court scrutiny

Handle novel scenarios not seen in training data (every crash is unique)

This is where Gemini 3's Deep Think changes everything.

Our Solution: Glass Box Forensics
Architecture Overview
CrashLens is a full-stack web application built on thr

title: Nexus — The Agentic CLI Builder
subtitle: Zero-Config, AI-Driven CLIs that Run Your Repo in Ephemeral Containers
description:
Nexus is a Meta‑CLI Platform designed to transform code assets into instantly runnable, auditable, and shareable command‑line tools. It sits at the intersection of program analysis, developer tooling, and containerized execution: a Web Dashboard (Control Plane) orchestrates a Python‑based AI Agent to statically analyze repositories and produce a structured JSON "CLI Manifest." A local Nexus CLI (Execution Plane), implemented as a single Go binary, syncs manifests, JIT‑generates language‑specific Bridge scripts, and runs repository functions inside ephemeral Docker containers — preserving the original runtime environment while removing plumbing like argument parsing, serialization, and glue code.

This document provides a detailed technical walkthrough of Nexus's architecture, design decisions, implementation details, operational constraints, security posture, developer workflows, and the expected user experience. It is intended both as a narrative for judges and as an engineering blueprint.

Executive summary
Nexus enables developers and teams to expose meaningful, safe entrypoints into their repositories with minimal effort. By using static analysis and lightweight heuristics, the Nexus Agent extracts public callables (functions, handlers, operationIds) and synthesizes a manifest describing commands, arguments, runtimes, and invocation examples. The Nexus Dashboard presents these to users for edit/review/publish. The local Nexus CLI then uses the published manifest to run chosen commands inside disposable containers, mapping CLI flags to function parameters automatically. Nexus removes boilerplate, reduces friction for repeated tasks, and makes internal automation discoverable and reproducible.

Why this matters
Modern codebases have a wealth of useful functions — data exports, model inference, maintenance scripts, and ETL stages — but these artefacts are often fragmented, under‑documented, or hidden behind ad‑hoc scripts. Teams resort to brittle shell scripts, und
keywords: nexus, developer, code, analysis, manifest, scripts, commands, into, execution, dashboard

title: The Lazarus Protocol
subtitle: "In the name of Allah, the compassionate, the all-merciful, I tell my tale."
description:
Hello everyone, hope all are well, I started this journey into AI and it's surrounding technologies around 3 weeks ago starting with MetaAI, then CharacterAI, then Gemini, Grok, Anthropic, but settled in on Gemini just because it "felt' best suited for my needs through it's interface, performance on the topics I was focused on, it's vast and robust Ecosystem of services and such. I've never really coded in my life, just played mostly video games, and through the help of Gemini I was able through pure reason and logic with Gemini doing the coding I was able to achieve a level of competence beyond my wildest dreams, and here I am now I just submitted a 10/10 100% AIMO 2025 AI Math Olympiad submission the other day and now this Google Hackathon competition, and "…all credit is due to Allah, only the mistakes were mine." Thank you Google for hosting not only this competition to foster community growth and progression in AI but for Kaggle and all  the other services you have provided for us to utilize and sometimes get results that are "uncommon".

The Lazarus Protocol: Zero-Hallucination Logic

AI models dream; engineers need math. "The Lazarus Protocol" is a Glass Pane architecture that forces Gemini 1.5 Flash to stop predicting text and start engineering Source Code.

The Architecture:

Pane 1 (Source): We prompt Gemini to generate raw, executable Python code for a given problem—not the answer, but the method to find the answer.

Pane 2 (Lazarus Engine): A local execution sandbox captures the code, writes it to disk, and executes it via sub-process.

Pane 3 (Truth): The system validates the output. If the code fails, the pane shatters. If it runs, we get the Ground Truth.

Demonstration: In the video, we task the system with "High Mass" logic problems: calculating sums of primes, solving combinatorics ("How many integers have three 7s?"), and resolving temporal paradoxes ("What was the date 10,000 days ago?"). Standard LLMs hallucinate these answers. Lazarus calculate
keywords: gemini, pane, lazarus, code, just, through, logic, then, services, video

title: VerifyMate: The Accessible AI Fraud Guard
subtitle: Protecting vulnerable users from scams with a single click—powered by Gemini Multimodal analysis.
description:
In the age of AI-generated phishing and sophisticated SMS scams, the most vulnerable among us—our elderly relatives and non-technical friends—are being left behind. Existing security tools are often too complex, filled with jargon like "hash mismatch" or "certificate error."

We asked ourselves: How can we build a fraud detector that our grandparents could actually use?

VerifyMate is a high-accessibility, personal fraud detection tool designed to verify screenshots of emails and text messages. It strips away the complexity of cybersecurity and replaces it with a simple, traffic-light interface:

Instead of just flagging a message, VerifyMate acts as a patient expert, explaining why something is suspicious in plain English (e.g., "The sender claims to be your bank, but the email address is a generic Gmail account").

VerifyMate leverages the multimodal capabilities of the Gemini API to "see" and "reason" like a security analyst.

This project started with a personal realization: our own family members were getting bombarded with "urgent" texts and emails—from "banks," "delivery services," and "government agencies"—and they didn't know who to trust. They weren't struggling with complex software; they were struggling with the messages themselves. We realized they didn't need a technical firewall; they needed a "knowledgeable friend" to look at a screenshot and give them a simple, honest answer.
keywords: verifymate, technical, security, complex, like, fraud, personal, emails, messages, simple

title: StoryPlay: Adaptive Learning
subtitle: AI-driven engine for simulating adaptive learning pathways
description:
StoryPlay is an interactive learning tool designed to build reading skills for young students. It turns reading into a conversation to help children understand stories better instead of just reading words. The tool focuses on developing two main skills. Recall helps with story comprehension and understanding cause and effect while reasoning helps with prediction and deep engagement. It creates an adaptive personalized path for every learner.

I have built this using the Gemini API to run a team of smart helpers. A Question Agent creates questions from parts of the story and switches difficulty based on how the student does. To stop students from getting bored the system moves them up to harder questions after two correct answers in a row. To stop them from getting frustrated it moves them back to easier questions after two wrong answers in a row. If a student makes a mistake a Scaffolding Agent gives a helpful hint to guide them to the right part of the text.

StoryPlay is important because it changes how we teach reading. By giving hints and adjusting the level it keeps young learners happy and focused. This project shows how AI can act like a patient tutor that builds strong reading skills for the future.
keywords: reading, them, skills, questions, storyplay, tool, young, students, helps, story

title: Nutriscale AI: Precision Nutrition Through AI + Smart Weighing
subtitle: AI that gives families real confidence—turning photos, weights, & menus into clinically accurate nutrition for safer eating in everyday life
description:
Nutriscale AI: The First Weight-Aware, Vision-Powered Clinical Nutrition System

Nutriscale AI pushes nutrition technology into territory previously limited to hospitals and research labs. It delivers ingredient-level accuracy by unifying three modalities—computer vision, real-time weight changes, and intelligent menu ingestion—into a single, end-to-end system built entirely in Google AI Studio.

How It Was Created
The project uses a modular agent architecture engineered in AI Studio:

Gemini Vision Pipeline: A custom segmentation and food-understanding model that identifies dishes, isolates components, predicts ingredients, and interprets volume using monocular depth and shape priors.

Smart-Tare Algorithm: A novel weight-delta method that transforms ordinary kitchen scales into multi-component measuring devices, capturing exact grams for each ingredient as users add or remove items.

Menu Intelligence: OCR + Gemini reasoning convert any menu photo into structured dishes, ingredient sets, and safe-to-eat recommendations—solving one of the hardest problems in metabolic nutrition.

Clinical Nutrition Engine: A deterministic pipeline powered by FoodData Central, specialized amino-acid datasets, and embedding-based food similarity models to compute precise macro, micro, and amino-acid profiles.

Why It Matters
For people managing metabolic disorders like HCU or PKU, precision is not optional—small nutritional errors can cause irreversible harm. Existing apps routinely miss the mark by 30–50%. Nutriscale AI replaces estimation with measurable truth.

Impact
Nutriscale AI reduces logging time from minutes to seconds, enables safer restaurant dining, and produces research-grade nutrition logs suitable for clinicians and large-scale studies. Its architecture generalizes far beyond rare conditions, defining a new standard for accessible, intelligent, and medically meaningful nutrition technology.
keywords: nutrition, nutriscale, into, weight, vision, ingredient, menu, powered, clinical, system

title: DailyHealth AI
subtitle: Multi-Agent app for personalized daily healthy lifestyle.
description:
The goal of this project is to provide access to personalized health coaching. While we visit doctors for acute illnesses, the majority of health outcomes are determined by daily decisions. Furthermore, generic health advice fails to account for individual medical histories and genetic backgrounds. There is a critical need for a system that bridges the gap between clinical medical records and daily lifestyle choices to prevent disease, reduce medical burdens, and improve overall quality of life.

Personal health is a multimodal challenge involving distinct, complex domains: nutrition, physiology, sleep science, psychology, and medicine. A single general-purpose AI model often struggles to maintain deep expertise across all these verticals simultaneously. An agentic architecture is the ideal solution because it allows for separation of concerns. These agents can operate independently to gather deep data, and then collaborate to form a holistic view of the user, mirroring a real-world board of health experts.

I built DailyHealth AI, a comprehensive health application powered by Google Gemini's API in the AI Studio. The architecture utilizes a Multi-Agent System consisting of five specialists: a Dietitian, Trainer, Sleep Specialist, Counselor, and Medical Specialist. These agents operate sequentially throughout the day to ingest multimodal user data (images, text, metrics). At the end of the day, a Lead Coordinator Agent aggregates these distinct logs, retrieves long-term context (medical history), and synthesizes a "Daily Board Meeting" report. This generates a cohesive strategy for the user's next day, helping to improve life quality through a healthy lifestyle.
keywords: health, medical, daily, user, system, lifestyle, improve, quality, life, multimodal

title: Trade Vision AI
subtitle: An app that analize physical shelves and give insigths for SME's
description:
Trade Vision AI
AI-Powered Intelligence for Physical Point of Sale

Project Description

Trade Vision AI is an artificial intelligence platform designed to bring clarity, structure, and expert-level decision-making to the physical point of sale.

The application analyzes in-store execution using computer vision and advanced analytics, transforming real-world retail conditions into actionable intelligence for CPG and trade marketing teams.

Trade Vision AI evaluates key trade marketing variables, including Share of Shelf, stock-out detection, and price compliance, identifying gaps between planned strategy and actual in-store execution. The platform continuously monitors these variables to detect performance issues, competitive threats, and lost sales opportunities at the shelf level.

Beyond diagnosis, Trade Vision AI acts as a virtual Trade Marketing expert. It generates clear, prioritized recommendations,such as shelf reallocation, pricing corrections, replenishment actions, and execution improvements, based on best practices in CPG trade marketing and retail operations.

By turning physical retail data into structured insights and recommendations, Trade Vision AI enables brands to move from reactive store visits to proactive, intelligence-driven execution, improving availability, visibility, and commercial performance where sales truly happen.
keywords: trade, vision, intelligence, execution, marketing, physical, store, retail, shelf, point

title: Axilo Voice Agent
subtitle: The Enterprise Orchestration Platform for Next-Generation Voice AI Agents
description:
The Enterprise Orchestration Platform for Next-Generation Voice AI Agents

Axilo handles the complexity of voice infrastructure, enabling any business or enterprise to automate calls faster, better, and more cost-effectively at scale. We enable businesses to automate calls with multilingual, realistic Voice AI agents. Businesses handle tens of thousands of calls every day, across various departments, including sales, support, collections, recruitment, and more. Axilo gives them the power to build and deploy Voice AI Agents directly from their transcripts and FAQs, allowing them to start automating calls immediately.

For global enterprises, phone calls remain a critical, high-volume channel across sales, support, and operations. Yet, the existing system is inefficient and incapable of handling real-world complexity:

Linguistic Complexity: Conversational AI must fluidly adapt to diverse regional accents, dialects, and spontaneous code-switching (e.g., mixing English with a local language), something only a natural, adaptive AI can manage.

Context-Dependent Performance: There is no "one model to rule them all." A support call requires high noise cancellation and low latency, while a recruitment call demands superior reasoning and complex context management. Integrating and managing hundreds of siloed models is an unwanted burden.

Cost Inefficiency at Scale: Automating millions of calls demands an engine engineered for efficiency—leveraging smaller, specialized models and intelligent routing to minimize operational costs.

Axilo is an enterprise-grade Voice AI Orchestration platform purpose-built to deploy thousands of concurrent, high-performance voice agents in days, not months.

Enterprise-Grade Performance: Sub-500ms latency, robust interruption handling, and fluent adaptation across multiple languages and accents.

Intelligent Routing: Axilo automatically selects the optimal model blend (including Gemini 3 Pro) for the specific call context, maximizing ROI whil
keywords: voice, calls, axilo, enterprise, agents, scale, complexity, cost, across, support

title: AI Discussion Board
subtitle: Simulate high-level debates with Gemini 3 Pro. Watch AI personas negotiate, vote, and visualize ideas in real-time.
description:
AI Discussion Board transforms solitary ideation into a dynamic, multi-perspective collaboration powered by Gemini 3 Pro.

The Vibe:
Imagine a boardroom where Demis Hassabis (Science), Sam Altman (Scale), and Elon Musk (Truth) debate the future of AI. This app simulates their distinct philosophies and negotiation styles, turning abstract topics into intense, unscripted drama.

How it works:
Users set a topic, and a team of AI agents—guided by an expert Moderator—engages in a structured debate. The system leverages Gemini 3's advanced reasoning to employ facilitation techniques like Six Thinking Hats and Fist-to-Five voting to drive consensus. Simultaneously, a real-time Whiteboard parses the chaotic conversation into structured JSON sticky notes, visualizing insights instantly.

Tech Stack:
Built entirely in AI Studio, the app features a robust Multi-Model Fallback Chain (Gemini 3 Pro → Flash Lite). It ensures long-running coherence by automatically summarizing context when token limits are approached, blending high-level reasoning with cost-effective execution.

Impact:
This tool democratizes high-level consulting. It allows users to stress-test ideas against the world's greatest (simulated) minds, turning "what if" into actionable insights.

title: KnowMore: An Ai Powered Learning Platform
subtitle: KnowMore is an ai powered platform to learn about any topic through a curriculum based approach with help of personalized content.

KnowMore is an AI powered learning platform which converts your prompts to a highly organised curicculum optimised for your depth and familiarity with the topic.

title: StoryVision: The Multimodal Content Engine
subtitle: Transform complex PDFs and URLs into professional visual narratives, infographics, and social carousels & post instantly using Gemini 3.
description:
Project Description: Content generation is a bottleneck. We consume massive amounts of information—technical papers, video lectures, and market reports—but transforming that consumption into sharing requires hours of writing, designing, and formatting.

StoryVision is a native multimodal workspace built with Gemini 3 Pro that solves "Blank Page Syndrome." It allows creators, founders, and educators to turn raw information into polished visual stories in seconds.

How it works:

Universal Input: The app leverages Gemini’s multimodal capabilities to ingest diverse sources: upload a PDF, paste a web Url, a YouTube URL, or perform a live Web Search.

Reasoning & Synthesis: Gemini 3 analyzes the content (e.g., a complex software architecture paper), extracts key insights, and structures them into a coherent narrative flow.

Generative Visualization: Users select a format (Storyboard, Infographic, Slide Deck) and a visual style (e.g., Colored Sketch, Cinematic). The app generates consistent visual panels that explain the concepts.

Iterative Refinement: Users can "chat" with specific frames to edit them (e.g., "Make the lighting dramatic") and generate accompanying LinkedIn captions.

Actionable Output: One-click export provides a carousel-ready PDF and a viral-optimized social post.

Built in Google AI Studio, StoryVision uses inline data processing, web search tools, and image generation to automate the creative workflow, allowing users to focus on the quality of ideas rather than the labor of design.
keywords: into, gemini, visual, users, content, generation, information, storyvision, multimodal, built

title: Swar AI - Indian Classical Music Guru
subtitle: A Virtual Guru & Swara Coach Offering Accurate, Real-Time Swara Evaluation for Every Singer
description:
Swar AI is a real-time Indian Classical Music tutor powered by Gemini 2.5, designed for learners of all levels across Hindustani and Carnatic styles. It listens to vocal or instrumental practice and instantly identifies the Swaras (Sa, Re, Ga…), analyzes Shruti accuracy, and detects Raga patterns based on melodic movement. Using Vibe Coding in AI Studio, the app adapts Gemini’s multimodal audio intelligence for the microtonal, expressive nuances of Indian classical music.

The system provides live pitch visualization, giving students immediate insight into their pitch stability and how close they are to the correct shruti. Swar AI also features song identification, enabling it to recognize which Bollywood or Indian song the user is singing or playing—whether on flute, violin, veena, guitar, harmonium, or keyboard.

A standout feature is the interactive Guru Mode, where Gemini acts as a virtual teacher. It not only evaluates performance but can also demonstrate melodies. This creates a traditional call-and-response learning environment, offering culturally aligned feedback on swaras, pitch deviations, gamakas, and stylistic expression.

By merging AI-driven audio analysis with the pedagogy of classical music, Swar AI becomes an accessible practice partner that supports daily Riyaz. It empowers learners to improve accuracy, understand Raga structure, and practice confidently—anytime, anywhere.

This project showcases how Gemini 2.5 can preserve musical heritage while making high-quality training available to everyone. Swar AI is a personal practice buddy and a Voice Trainer.
keywords: swar, gemini, practice, indian, classical, music, pitch, learners, swaras, shruti

title: Project Citadel: AI BANKGUARD
subtitle: To protect every banking sector of the world with the help AI
description:
Project Citadel: AI BankGuard is a next-generation Security Operations Center (SOC) platform designed to immunize the banking sector against sophisticated cyber threats. Unlike legacy dashboards that overwhelm analysts with noise, Citadel leverages Google Gemini 3 Pro to provide contextual reasoning, multimodal forensics, and active defense capabilities.
The application solves critical industry pain points through three core innovations:
AI Forensics: The Transaction Guard uses Gemini to cross-reference metadata with visual evidence (logs/screenshots) and IP geolocation, identifying complex fraud patterns and "impossible travel" scenarios that rule-based systems miss.
Active Defense: The Sentinel Protocols (SOAR) module moves beyond passive monitoring by automating incident response. It allows the system to neutralize ransomware, isolate nodes, or freeze compromised credit cards in milliseconds.
Collaborative Immunity: The Global Network module connects disparate financial institutions, enabling real-time sharing of threat signatures. This creates a "herd immunity" effect where an attack detected by one bank instantly protects all others.
Built on a robust full-stack architecture (React/Node.js) with a Zero Trust security model, Citadel transforms banking security from a reactive, siloed effort into a proactive, intelligent, and collaborative shield. It represents the future of financial cyber-defense—where AI doesn't just watch, it protects.
keywords: citadel, security, defense, banking, cyber, gemini, forensics, active, module, collaborative

title: Farming assistant
subtitle: A mobile AI farming guide for beginners that analyzes soil, diagnoses crop issues, identifies local pests, and gives simple advice.
description:
AgriGuide is a mobile AI-powered farming assistant designed to help beginners enter the agriculture world with confidence. Many newcomers struggle with understanding soil quality, selecting the right crops, identifying pests and diseases, and following proper farming practices. AgriGuide simplifies this entire journey through an accessible, multilingual, multimodal experience.

Users can upload images of soil, leaves, or crops, type their concerns, or use voice input in various languages to ensure global accessibility for farmers who may not be literate or comfortable typing in English. The AI analyzes the input to evaluate soil fertility, diagnose plant diseases, identify pests and weeds, and recommend suitable crops based on location, season, and soil type. It also provides clear step-by-step instructions for planting, watering, fertilizing, and harvesting, along with weather alerts and localized pest warnings.

AgriGuide empowers aspiring farmers with the knowledge they need, making modern farming easier, smarter, and more efficient for everyone.

title: NullPoint
subtitle: NullPoint
description:
NullPoint: Failed Scientific Experiments Data Marketplace

NullPoint is an innovative data marketplace platform where “negative findings” (failed experiments) — which are often shelved and never published in the scientific world — are bought and sold as valuable assets. Due to the “positive results bias” in scientific publishing, billions of dollars and countless research hours are wasted every year repeating methods that have already been tried and failed elsewhere. NullPoint aims to transform these sunk costs into revenue, accelerate global R&D processes, and prevent resource waste.

Technically, this project is a high-performance, responsive MVP (Minimum Viable Product) prototype built using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The application functions entirely on enriched mock data sets, without requiring any backend connection.

Key Features

Smart Marketplace: Users can search data across categories such as Antiviral Drugs, CRISPR, or Battery Technologies using detailed filters.

Data Visualization: Before purchasing, experiments can be visually analyzed via dynamic Recharts graphs and data tables showing metrics such as IC50 values or voltage cycles.

Simulated Flows: A credit-based purchasing system, multi-step data upload wizard, and personal dashboard management are all fully functional.

Multilingual Support (i18n): The platform can instantly switch between English and Turkish.

NullPoint transforms failure from a hidden burden into a commercially valuable force that advances collective science.
keywords: data, nullpoint, failed, scientific, experiments, marketplace, platform, valuable, into, using

title: Lira Aventuras: Multimodal Speech Missions for Kids
subtitle: A Gemini-powered companion that turns speech practice into interactive adventures.
description:
Lira Aventuras is a multimodal speech-therapy playground for kids, powered by Gemini 3 Pro. It helps families and therapists turn daily practice into a game, especially for children who struggle with Spanish sounds like /rr/ or /s/.

The child completes four short “missions” on web or mobile:

1) Word Practice – Lira listens to each attempt and gives friendly, per-word feedback.  
2) Comic Story – a tiny personalised comic with TTS audio; the child repeats target words in context.  
3) Treasure Hunt – the child shows a photo or uses the camera; Gemini detects an object and turns it into a pronunciation challenge.  
4) Spy Mission – the child memorises and repeats secret code words in sequence; Gemini checks accuracy and order.

Behind the scenes, Lira Aventuras analyses pronunciation attempts and stores a lightweight performance history. Next sessions are auto-planned: the system selects phonemes, words and stories that match the child’s age, interests and recent success rate. Parents receive a structured, jargon-free summary of each session in natural language.

The result is a realistic, working assistant that showcases Gemini’s native multimodality (text, audio and images) and advanced reasoning in an educational context, making speech practice more engaging, trackable and sustainable at home.
keywords: child, gemini, lira, practice, words, aventuras, speech, into, word, each

title: Biologically-Inspired Liquid Network Simulator
subtitle: A digital petri dish for intuitive AI discovery, empowering users to grow and shape living, liquid neural networks.
description:
Project Name: NeuroLiquid
Hackathon Track: Education & Science (Reimagine Learning / Accelerate Discovery)

Yann LeCun, one of the godfathers of deep learning, once said something that stuck with me: "The next breakthrough in AI may not come from an AI person."

As a musician, artist, and lifelong tinkerer, this resonated deeply. I am fascinated by intelligence, but modern AI research is often gated behind a wall of dense mathematics and matrix multiplication. If you aren’t steeped in calculus or state-of-the-art algorithms, you are left on the sidelines.

But nature doesn’t need matrix multiplication to solve problems. Nature doesn't calculate gradients. Nature survives. Nature overcomes impossible odds with massive populations.  Biological systems are tightly coupled to their environment, evolving from the realities of our universe, where structure and function are inseparable.

NeuroLiquid is my answer to that disconnect. It is a gamified simulation designed to democratize access to one of the most exciting, understudied frontiers in AI: Liquid Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs).

In traditional deep learning, neurons are just variables in a static equation. In NeuroLiquid, every neuron is an independent organism with a will to thrive.

Using the advanced reasoning capabilities of Gemini 3 Pro, I "vibe coded" a system that moves away from rigid layers and towards biological realism.

Intelligence in NeuroLiquid isn't programmed; it emerges from the collective struggle of these individual agents trying to stay healthy.

Drawing inspiration from Sara Walker and Lee Cronin’s Assembly Theory, NeuroLiquid treats neurons as the fundamental building blocks of complexity.

In nature, DNA has a high "assembly index"—it encodes the specific physical structure required for an organism to function. In this simulation, users act as the evolutionary force. You can physically grab neurons and move them around.

This visual feedback loop allows users to develop an intuition for neur
keywords: neuroliquid, nature, learning, gemini, building, into, biological, environment, simulation, snns

title: Auto Agent Builder – Create a Working AI Agent from One Sentence
subtitle: Turn natural language ideas into fully functional AI agents using Gemini 3 Pro.
description:
Auto Agent Builder is a Gemini 3 Pro–powered system that turns a single natural language instruction into a complete, functional AI agent. Users simply describe what they want — for example, “Create a scraper that extracts product details and summarizes them” — and the application automatically generates the full workflow, tools, agent loop, code implementation, and execution environment.

The goal is to make advanced AI agent creation accessible to everyone, regardless of programming experience. Auto Agent Builder uses Gemini 3 Pro’s native multimodality and advanced reasoning to interpret text, diagrams, uploaded screenshots, or PDFs. It then produces modular Python code, structured blueprints, and a ready-to-run agent inside Google AI Studio Build.

Users can test, refine, and export their agents as JSON workflows or runnable scripts. This enables rapid prototyping for research, automation, business workflows, education, and more.

By lowering the barrier to agent development, Auto Agent Builder empowers individuals and teams to transform ideas into fully functional systems instantly—something that traditionally required hours or days of engineering effort.
keywords: agent, auto, builder, gemini, into, functional, users, code, advanced, workflows

title: Private Mind – Offline AI  Personal AI Assistant That Runs Fully On-Device
subtitle: Private Mind – Offline AI  Personal AI Assistant That Runs Fully On-Device
description:
Private Mind is a fully offline AI assistant built for iOS and macOS that allows users to chat with local LLMs without sending data to the cloud. The app focuses on privacy, speed, and reliability  especially useful during internet outages or server failures. The idea was reinforced during recent Cloudflare outages when many AI tools went down, while Private Mind remained fully usable.

The app loads local LLMs directly on-device using MLX. Every message, image, voice input, and document stays stored on the user’s device. No accounts, no login, no API keys required.

I built this project as a solo developer to give users private AI capabilities without depending on server costs or subscriptions.

Core Features

Fully offline text chat with local LLMs

Voice input + AI voice responses

OCR camera extraction & image-to-text

Text utilities: summarize, rewrite, translate, correct grammar, generate email

PDF summarization + quiz generation

Mini-games powered by the model

Multi-chat sessions & multilingual output

Light/Dark mode, crash-free updated UI

View extracted images directly in chat

New lightweight free models for older devices: SmolLM 135M & Qwen 0.5B

Paid upgrade unlocks larger LLMs for more power

Why this matters
Most AI apps depend on cloud servers, internet, and user data.
Private Mind continues working offline  even if servers go down  and users retain full privacy and control. It also lowers costs to users since no API tokens are required.
keywords: private, users, chat, llms, mind, fully, offline, local, voice, text

title: LastMile Medic
subtitle: One Photo, One Life Saved
description:
Every year, 5 million children under five die from preventable conditions such as measles, pneumonia, severe malnutrition, and dehydration mostly in remote villages where the nearest doctor is hours or days away. Community health workers and mothers have smartphones, but no reliable way to know if a sick child will survive the night.

LastMile Medic changes that with a single photo.

Built with Gemini 1.5 Pro’s vision and reasoning, the app instantly analyses one image of a child (0–10 years) and detects life-threatening visible signs: Koplik spots, kwashiorkor edema, chest indrawing, palmar pallor, jaundice, rashes, lethargy. In under 15 seconds it returns a clear, colour-coded emergency level (RED/ORANGE/YELLOW/GREEN), the most likely condition, exact immediate actions, simple medicine dosages when available, and urgent warning signs to watch.

Designed for low-resource settings, it works offline after first load, speaks in local languages (Swahili, Hindi, French, Arabic, Portuguese, and 100+ more), and requires zero typing or medical knowledge. A $30 phone becomes a triage doctor. One photo can decide whether a mother walks 20 km today or waits and whether her child lives. LastMile Medic turns that decision from guesswork into certainty, bridging the last mile where no clinic exists.
keywords: child, under, where, doctor, lastmile, medic, photo, signs, whether, every

title: latticemind
subtitle: it is a single interface that turns observation into action using the most advanced capabilities of the Gemini API.
description:
LatticeMind: The Multimodal Scientific Reasoning Engine

Accelerating discovery by turning any image into code, experiments, and accessible lessons.

Science (Primary), impacting Education and Technology.

LatticeMind transforms the static world of scientific figures into dynamic, actionable intelligence. Researchers and students struggle with "dead" data—PDF graphs, messy whiteboard notes, and complex dashboards. LatticeMind is the multimodal engine that wakes them up.

Built entirely in Google AI Studio using Gemini 3 Pro, LatticeMind lets users upload any visual—from microscopy to system architecture. It doesn't just describe the image; it reasons through it using a massive 32k thinking budget. It identifies domains, extracts variables, and immediately generates four outputs: rigorous scientific hypotheses, level-adjusted educational lessons, accessibility-compliant descriptions, and executable simulations.

We pushed Gemini 3 Pro to its limits:

LatticeMind is a unified framework that accelerates discovery in Science, reimagines Education, and ensures Accessibility, proving that a single multimodal reasoning engine can solve problems across every impact track.

LatticeMind was built using Google AI Studio and the Gemini API (gemini-3-pro-preview).

title: OPESHA SOLUTIONS
subtitle: OPESHA Solutions is an AI-powered SME credit and capital access platform that uses Gemini 3 and advanced financial analytics to accurately a
description:
OPESHA Solutions – AI-Powered SME Credit & Capital Access Platform

Small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) are the backbone of emerging economies, yet millions are locked out of formal financing due to manual assessments, limited data visibility, high processing costs, and inconsistent credit decisions. Traditional financial institutions rely heavily on outdated evaluation methods that fail to capture the true potential of SMEs—especially in Africa.

In this hackathon, we built an advanced credit-intelligence system powered by Google DeepMind’s Gemini 3 Pro within AI Studio to transform the way financial institutions assess SME creditworthiness.

🔍 What We Built

A multi-agent pipeline built using Gemini 3 Pro that automatically ingests, processes, analyzes, and scores SME financial data at a level of depth that previously required expensive human analysts.

Key capabilities:

Financial Document Understanding:
Processes bank statements, sales records, P&Ls, balance sheets, MPesa statements, invoices, and receipts—extracting structured insights using Gemini’s advanced multimodal reasoning.

SME Health Diagnostics:
Computes financial ratios, liquidity measures, revenue stability, seasonality patterns, and debt stress indicators.

Predictive Credit Scoring:
A hybrid scoring system combining rule-based logic + Gemini reasoning to estimate repayment ability, creditworthiness, and risk category.

Fraud & Anomaly Detection:
Gemini identifies unusual activity, doctored statements, or conflicting financial signals.

Automated Loan Application Advisory:
The system recommends the optimal loan amount, best-fit financial institution, required documents, and approval likelihood.

🎯 Why This Matters

Financial institutions spend 40–60 minutes manually reviewing each SME application. Our system reduces this to under 2 minutes, while offering:

Higher accuracy

Lower operational costs

title: Keep Journaling
subtitle: An AI-Powered Reflection & Growth Companion
description:
KeepJournaling is an AI-powered journaling application designed to help users build sustainable reflection habits, track personal growth, and stay grounded during challenging periods.

The app offers a range of guided templates—including Stoic, yoga, and dream journals—while also allowing users to design their own. Entries can be created using text, audio, and images. Built-in AI coaches, such as Muse for creative reflection and Marcus as a Stoic mentor, provide thoughtful analysis and guidance. Optional AI insights and summaries help users recognize patterns, extract key ideas, and set intentions. For users who prefer full privacy, all AI features can be disabled so entries remain entirely local.

The system was built using Google AI Studio (Build with Vibe Coding) and Gemini 3 Pro, developed iteratively over several days. Through studying Gemini 3 vibe-coding tutorials, I introduced a key improvement: persisting user-created content to local disk as JSON files, rather than relying solely on browser localStorage.

This project is meaningful because many people struggle to maintain consistent self-reflection during periods of transition, burnout, or emotional stress. KeepJournaling lowers that barrier by offering gentle structure and support—helping users cultivate clarity, resilience, and long-term personal growth, one entry at a time.
keywords: users, reflection, keepjournaling, help, build, personal, growth, during, periods, stoic

title: CivifyAI: Voice, Image, and Text–Powered Issue Reporting Assistant
subtitle: A smart AI assistant that lets anyone report community problems using voice, image, or text, instantly structured into actionable data.
description:
CivifyAI is an AI-powered assistant built to help communities map local problems instantly using text, voice, or images. The app detects the language of any user input, translates it to English, and organizes all reports in a simple dashboard.
The goal is to solve a global challenge: millions of citizens worldwide struggle to report local issues, and governments lack real-time visibility into what communities are facing. CivifyAI solves this by allowing anyone, to submit a report in seconds.I built the app entirely inside Google AI Studio using Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal capabilities. Using vibe coding, I connected multiple flows: multilingual understanding, image interpretation, voice transcription, classification of urgency, and memory for maintaining a live issue history. Users can choose between three input modes: text, image, and voice. All submitted reports appear instantly on the dashboard.
To make the app scalable globally, I added a Demo Mode that shows a sample database of reports from individuals and organizations. This allows judges and users to experience the workflow without needing an account. The public demo link makes the app accessible to anyone without login barriers.CivifyAI is important because it empowers citizens and gives governments an AI-driven mapping tool to understand real-world problems more quickly. The tool provides a universal, language-agnostic way to collect local intelligence.
My submission includes:
• A working public demo link from Google AI Studio
• A 2-minute video walkthrough
• A detailed explanation of how the app was built and the global impact it targets
keywords: civifyai, built, local, using, voice, reports, demo, communities, problems, instantly

description:
What

A Generative Universe Storytelling Engine—an AI-powered platform that acts as an intelligent, improvisational Dungeon Master. For each new session, the engine dynamically creates a complete, unique universe with its own coherent rules, lore, and aesthetic. It then narrates adventures within that universe in real time using synchronized multimodal output: descriptive prose, dynamic voice narration, thematic illustrations, and managed dice rolls—all generated on the fly in response to completely free-form player input.

How

I engineered the system by structuring and iterating on sophisticated prompt commands in spanish to define the core behavior of DungeonAI.

Through iterative refinement, I shaped this core concept into a stable workflow where the AI:

Universe-builds first

Orchestrates narrative – interpreting open-ended player commands within the created framework

Maintains consistency – across all generated media

Why

This project represents a fundamental shift in interactive entertainment by:

Democratizing unlimited storytelling – Removing barriers of pre-written campaigns or the need for a human DM

Enabling emergent narrative freedom

Creating infinite replayability

Showcasing multimodal AI integration – Demonstrating how models like Gemini 3 Pro can orchestrate text, voice, and image generation cohesively

Rather than consuming finite content, players become co-creators in AI-powered stories that are personalized, dynamic, and bounded only by imagination. This isn't just another game tool—it's a new paradigm for human-AI collaborative creativity in entertainment.

title: Overwatch: AI Bureaucracy Breaker & Crisis Safety Net
subtitle: The AI Bureaucracy Breaker: Using Gemini 3 to turn administrative dead ends into veteran access, with a hidden 'Protocol Red' safety net.
description:
Project Name: Overwatch: AI Bureaucracy Breaker & Crisis Safety Net

Description: The Mission: In 2025, the veteran suicide crisis is no longer just a mental health issue; it is an administrative one. "Parking lot tragedies" often occur when veterans hit a wall of bureaucracy, denied claims, confusing directives, and cancelled appointments. I built Overwatch to dismantle that wall.

The Solution: Overwatch is a "Trojan Horse" utility application built on Google Gemini 3 Pro. Marketed as a high-utility "Bureaucracy Navigator," it uses advanced AI to help veterans win their VA claims. Hidden beneath this utility is a silent "Crisis Sentinel" that activates when a veteran is at their breaking point.

Key Capabilities:

Multimodal Document Decoder: Uses Gemini 3’s vision capabilities to ingest VA denial letters and translate them from "Legalese" into "BLUF" (Bottom Line Up Front) military-standard instructions.

The (MM) Mark Miller Protocol (Agentic Workflow): Named in honor of the late Navy veteran, this feature automates patient advocacy. If a veteran is denied care, the AI references VHA Directive 1137, drafts a formal legal "Clinical Appeal," and demands a Community Care referral instantly.

Secure Crisis Intercept: A "Zero-Trust" (DMS) dead man’s switch. If the user indicates a crisis, it bypasses standard hotlines to trigger an encrypted "SITREP" to a designated Battle Buddy, providing GPS coordinates and an immediate intervention script.

Technical Stack:

Engine: Google Gemini 3 Pro (Reasoning & Multimodality) via Google AI Studio.

Architecture: Privacy-first, ephemeral processing (no PII retention).

Impact: We are shifting the paradigm from "Suicide Prevention" to "Patient Empowerment." By solving the upstream friction of paperwork, the application can prevent the downstream spiral of despair.
keywords: crisis, veteran, overwatch, bureaucracy, utility, google, gemini, suicide, when, veterans

title: IoT Sentinel
subtitle: Multimodal AI Guardian for Everyday Devices
description:
In 2025, over 15 billion IoT devices are live, yet 70 %+ run without encryption or authentication. A single vulnerable ESP32 or smart camera can join a botnet in minutes. Traditional tools demand expert knowledge — everyday makers, homeowners, and small businesses are left exposed.
IoT Sentinel eliminates that gap in seconds.
Built 100 % in Google AI Studio using Gemini 3 Pro’s native multimodality and advanced reasoning:

Snap a photo of any setup → vision instantly spots exposed ports, wiring risks, default creds
Speak or paste config → probabilistic reasoning flags real threats with accurate risk scores (e.g., “Unencrypted MQTT on 1883 → 82 % replay attack probability”)
Drag simple fix cards (“Enable TLS”, “Add auth”) → live Bayesian simulation recalculates and drops risks in real time
Secure Score gauge animates from red (~40) to bright green (85–95)
Voice-guided walkthrough + auto-generates ready-to-flash, correct Python/Kotlin fixes
One-click PDF report export

No code written by hand — everything vibe-coded through natural language. The entire chain (vision → voice → reasoning → code gen → simulation) was impossible before Gemini 3 Pro.
Impact: Turns expert-level IoT auditing into something anyone can do on their phone in under a minute. From hobbyists to enterprises, IoT Sentinel makes tomorrow’s connected world safer today.
Interactive demo and full experience: see attached public app link and video.
keywords: reasoning, live, expert, exposed, sentinel, gemini, vision, risks, real, simulation

title: Nocturne.AI
subtitle: An AI copilot that organizes your overnight Slack and email activity into a clear, prioritized morning summary.
description:
Overnight Inbox Copilot is an AI-powered productivity system designed to process Slack and Gmail activity while you sleep, transforming overwhelming overnight communication into a clear, actionable morning briefing. Built entirely with Gemini 3 Pro in Google AI Studio, the app ingests 50–100+ Slack messages and 20–30+ emails—including images, screenshots, PDFs, and inline attachments—and uses multimodal reasoning to group them into coherent threads, detect urgent incidents, and prioritize what the user must address first.

Using Gemini 3 Pro’s native ability to interpret text and visuals together, the system identifies patterns such as production outages, error spikes, escalations, or decisions requiring immediate review. It summarizes each thread, extracts suggested actions, highlights high-priority items, and explains why something is important, referencing both textual context and image-based cues. The result is a personalized morning dashboard that reduces cognitive overload for engineers, managers, and globally distributed teams who often wake up to hundreds of messages from other time zones.

The application was created end-to-end in AI Studio using Vibe Coding: generating the full codebase, UI, prompts, mock datasets, and multimodal pipelines directly from natural language instructions. This demonstrates how modern AI can rapidly convert ideas into fully functioning tools with real-world value.

Overnight Inbox Copilot matters because it solves a universal problem in remote and global work—information overload. By turning a night of scattered alerts, messages, and attachments into a structured briefing, it enables teams to start their day focused, aligned, and ready to act.

App link: https://aistudio.google.com/apps/drive/1_Gk8-SwkxUZftkFrqnnW1ruCULIh32yA?showPreview=true&showAssistant=true&fullscreenApplet=true
