title: Climate Resilience Simulator
subtitle: Simulate real-world climate hazards through natural language and see dynamic, AI-generated GeoJSON layers rendered on an interactive map.
description:
The Climate Resilience Simulator is an AI-powered, map-based application that allows users to explore how climate risks evolve under different environmental conditions. Built for the Vibe Coding Track, the tool transforms natural-language instructions into dynamic climate scenarios and geospatial hazard maps using Gemini 3 Pro.

Users can simulate sea-level rise, extreme rainfall, heatwaves, wildfire exposure, or vegetation changes simply by describing the scenario. Gemini 3 Pro interprets each instruction, updates an internal climate state, and outputs strictly formatted JSON containing qualitative risk assessments and GeoJSON hazard polygons. These polygons are rendered on an interactive Leaflet map, providing immediate and intuitive visual feedback. The system also supports multi-city exploration, enabling seamless transitions between global regions.

The application was created entirely in Google AI Studio using the Vibe Coding workflow. Gemini 3 Pro powers all reasoning, spatial layer generation, world-state updates, and scenario interpretation. The frontend is a single-page interface that integrates model output, mapping logic, and adaptation analysis.
Link to AI Studio App: https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1srbzMBASyeI7Zb-ejTCyTkIKyPA2O8Pr?fullscreenApplet=true

This project addresses the broader challenge of making climate information accessible. Traditional climate tools are technical and difficult for the public to interpret. By combining conversational interaction with real-time geospatial visualization, the Climate Resilience Simulator lowers this barrier and supports education, awareness, and early-stage resilience planning.

The tool demonstrates how multimodal, reasoning-driven AI can redefine how communities understand climate impacts and explore actionable adaptation strategies.
keywords: climate, resilience, gemini, studio, simulator, application, users, explore, vibe, coding

title: The playable token factory
subtitle: A gamified arcade that turns millions of daily players into a distributed token factory for training the next generation of LLMs
description:
Project Description: TokenForge Trifecta
 The Core Concept
TokenForge Trifecta is an Intent Agent system built using Gemini 2.5 Pro (or Flash) that gamifies the creation of high-quality, verifiable data. It solves a critical problem in AI/agent development: authenticating human intent and focus during collaborative tasks. We use three classic arcade games (Jeopardy, Bingo, Mahjong) as fun, high-throughput interfaces to fuse human decisions with Gemini's reasoning, minting cryptographically watermarked tokens as proof of authentic, focused collaboration.

The Trifecta: Multimodal Agent Use Cases
The three games serve as distinct demonstrations of Gemini's multimodal and reasoning capabilities:

Jeopardy (Language Reasoning Agent):

Gemini Role: Generates complex, fact-based questions, testing its language generation and knowledge retrieval.

Human Role: Provides the correct answer.

Intent Action: The token proves the human agent focused on and correctly answered the knowledge-based query.

Bingo (Multimodal Vision/Categorization Agent):

Gemini Role: Validates an uploaded image/video clip (e.g., classifying a Red Car as a "Vehicle"), demonstrating visual reasoning.

Human Role: Matches the validated item to a game card.

Intent Action: The token proves the human agent agreed with and correctly placed the multimodal classification result.

Mahjong (Categorical Pairing/Reasoning Agent):

Gemini Role: Reasons about logical pairs and categorizes complex data points (e.g., pairing "Sun" and "Moon" into "Celestial Objects").

Human Role: Makes the final pairing decision.

Intent Action: The token proves the human agent followed the agent's logic to create a new, labeled data sample.

The Innovation: Gaze Intent Watermarking
Our unique contribution is the Gaze Intent Watermark.

Every token is minted with a unique, SHA-256 hash.

This hash integrates the user's solved data and a real-time Intent Score (mocked via a formula simulating saccade, fixation, and pupil data).

Re
keywords: agent, human, intent, gemini, data, role, reasoning, multimodal, token, high

title: Layman Notebook
subtitle: Layman notebook is a smart notetaking app supercharged with AI making it a goto resource to master notes.
description:
Project Title: Layman Notebooks
Tagline: The end of "Tab Fatigue." The start of Active Mastery.

The Core Problem: A Crisis of Attention & Retention
Students today face a dual crisis:

"Scattered Resource Syndrome" (Tab Fatigue): To learn a single topic, a student must alt-tab between YouTube for lectures, ChatGPT for explanations, Quizlet for testing, and Notion for writing. This constant context-switching destroys focus.

The "Illusion of Competence": AI tools like ChatGPT act as "Butlers," generating endless summaries that students store but never read. Students possess the notes, but their brains remain empty. They are "renting" knowledge, not owning it.

Layman Notebooks is the antidote. It is a One-Stop AI Workspace that consolidates the entire learning journey—from first hearing a lecture to final exam prep—into a single, distraction-free window.

The Solution: A Unified "Understanding-to-Testing" Loop
We replaced the fragmented app stack with a seamless, three-phase workflow driven by a custom Multi-Model Orchestration Strategy.

Phase 1: Intelligent Capture (Replace YouTube/Otter.ai)
Layman Listens (Powered by Gemini 1.5 Flash): We use Flash’s sub-second latency to process live audio in real-time. The AI doesn't just transcribe; it detects "Hot Zones" (moments of high complexity or confusion) and generates a smart recap while the student focuses on listening.

Scan & Autopilot: Feed the app physical text or video links. The AI digests the material and generates structured notes in your preferred persona (Scholar, Meme-Lord, or Analogy Architect).

Community Lookup: Instead of a generic dictionary, our Lookup tool finds "Snippets" (analogies, mnemonics) written by other students. Users drag these from a Staging Area sidebar directly onto their desk.

Visuals (Gemini + Mermaid.js): With one click, complex text is converted into colorful Mindmaps or Flowcharts. We prompt Gemini to output structured Mermaid syntax, making the diagrams editable code rather than
keywords: gemini, into, layman, students, active, testing, notes, free, phase, text

title: CircuitSnap
subtitle: From Napkin Sketch to Firmware in Seconds.
description:
This is the "Elevator Pitch" that appears on the card.
Hardware engineering has a steep barrier to entry. For students and hobbyists, the gap between drawing a circuit diagram and writing the C++ firmware to make it work is often where creativity dies. Syntax errors and logic bugs turn excitement into frustration.
CircuitSnap bridges this gap using Gemini 3 Pro’s native multimodality. It is a visual reasoning engine that allows users to upload a hand-drawn schematic or a photo of a breadboard. The AI analyzes the image, identifies components (sensors, microcontrollers, LEDs), traces the topology of the connections, and instantly generates the working firmware (Arduino/C++ or MicroPython) required to run the hardware.
By transforming a static image into functional code, CircuitSnap accelerates the prototyping process and democratizes hardware creation, making the physical world programmable for everyone.

title: Needs Visualization Map 2.0: AI-Powered Wishlist Map for Social Impact
subtitle: An AI-powered humanitarian map that uses Gemini 3 to read wishlist pages, infer urgent needs at child welfare facilities, and guide donors
description:
Needs Visualization AI Map : Turning Wishlists into a Real-Time Map of Human Needs

This project tackles a common problem in donations: people want to help, but they cannot see who needs what, where, and how urgently. Child welfare and social care facilities often share Amazon wishlists or simple web pages, yet these remain fragmented and hard to compare. As a result, some facilities are over-supported while others stay invisible.

Needs Visualization Map converts these unstructured wishlists into a geospatial, AI-powered dashboard. The system 
(1) ingests wishlist pages (HTML, screenshots, or text)
(2) uses Gemini 3 Flash Vision + Gemini 3 Pro to extract items, infer urgency levels with explanations, and generate narrative “support stories” 
(3) visualizes all facilities on an interactive Leaflet map. Donors also see “Today’s Top 5 Donation Opportunities,” ranked by Gemini across multiple facilities.

For the Kaggle submission, we provide:

A structured mock dataset that mirrors the planned Firestore schema (Facility, Item, SupportSuggestion)

A link to the live Google AI Studio app demonstrating wishlist parsing, urgency estimation, and recommendation prompts

Documentation of the data flow and reasoning setup so others can reuse or extend the approach

Although the current prototype uses mock JSON instead of a live backend, it is intentionally designed as a drop-in foundation for production (Firestore + Cloud Functions).

By combining multimodal understanding, long-context reasoning, and map-based UX, this project aims to make donations more transparent, fair, and emotionally meaningful—and, in the long term, to move toward a real-time map of human needs.
keywords: needs, facilities, wishlists, gemini, visualization, into, real, time, human, project

title: Earnings Rosetta
subtitle: AI-powered earnings-call translation for global investors.
description:
Earnings Rosetta is a multilingual earnings-call intelligence platform designed to help global investors understand U.S. companies without language barriers. For many investors in Japan, Korea, and Southeast Asia, earnings-call transcripts are difficult to access and even harder to interpret quickly. This project aims to close that gap by transforming long, English-only transcripts into clear, structured insights in their native language.

Earnings Rosetta automatically translates full earnings-call transcripts into Japanese and Korean, with upcoming support for Malay, Thai, and Vietnamese. Each transcript is processed through a custom pipeline that cleans, segments, and aligns speaker turns before translation. The platform also generates concise, call-specific summaries—focusing on management commentary, performance highlights, and forward-looking insights—so users can understand the call within minutes.

Beyond transcripts, the product includes a stock page with company fundamentals and quarterly history, as well as early-stage APIs for delivering investor data in multiple languages.

Gemini 3 Pro powers the core intelligence layer of the system:

Gemini’s accuracy and long-context capability make it possible to translate and summarize long transcripts in minutes.

The entire platform is built on Cloudflare Workers, R2, and D1.
Workers handle streaming pipelines, transcript parsing, and API endpoints.
R2 stores raw, parsed, translated, and summarized data.
D1 provides a lightweight relational layer for users, companies, and metadata.
This serverless architecture enables low-latency performance for global users.

Earnings Rosetta reduces the difficulty non-English investors face when trying to understand U.S. earnings calls. It makes earnings information accessible within minutes, supports cross-language financial research, and helps investors in markets like Japan and Korea make better-informed decisions.
keywords: earnings, call, transcripts, investors, rosetta, platform, understand, language, long, users

title: Skill Exchange App
subtitle: Learn without limits. Pay with skills.
description:
Many individuals possess valuable skills—such as teaching, designing, repairing, writing, cooking, or technical knowledge—but lack the financial resources or opportunities to access other skills they want to learn. Traditional learning platforms, private tutors, and service providers often require payment, making skill development inaccessible for students, unemployed individuals, and people from low-income backgrounds.

At the same time, a large portion of skilled people do not get proper visibility or chances to share their skills. Existing social platforms are not designed for skill-based exchange, and freelancing platforms are focused on paid services, not mutual learning.

Due to this gap, people face challenges such as:

Difficulty finding affordable learning opportunities

Limited access to verified, trustworthy skill partners

Underutilization of personal skills

No structured platform for exchanging skills without monetary transactions

Lack of community-driven learning ecosystems

There is no dedicated system that matches individuals based on the skills they have and the skills they want, facilitating fair skill bartering.

Therefore, a solution is needed to create a trusted, easy-to-use platform where users can exchange skills directly, build learning partnerships, and grow without financial barriers.
keywords: skills, learning, skill, individuals, platforms, people, such, lack, financial, opportunities

The core project description revolves around accelerating the journey from a natural language idea (the "vibe") to a fully functional, AI-native application with minimal traditional coding.

Vibe Coding is a high-level, human-centric approach to development where natural language is the primary syntax. title: ScholarAI – A Smart AI Study Companion for Students

title: Aestura: Autonomous Intelligence
subtitle: Ai agents solving wicked problems in precision oncology, audit compliance, and safety design via true autonomy.
description:
Project Name: AESTURA
Tagline: An Autonomous Multi-Agent Intelligence System for the Unsolvable.

💡 Inspiration
We live in an era where AI is often limited to text-based chatbots. However, the world's most critical problems—curing diseases, stopping financial fraud, and securing infrastructure—require more than just words. They require vision, simulation, and autonomous reasoning.

I built AESTURA to bridge this gap. My goal was to create a "Deep Tech" command center where AI agents don't just talk; they work. I wanted to visualize the invisible—showing the 3D structure of a protein or the global path of a laundered transaction—to empower human experts (like "Officer Sadia") to make faster, life-saving decisions.

🤖 What It Does
AESTURA is an integrated dashboard hosting three specialized autonomous agents, each designed for a specific high-stakes industry:

🧬 Cure Accelerator (Bio-Medical Agent)

Function: Accelerates drug discovery by analyzing viral protein sequences.

Key Feature: It features a 3D Holographic Molecular Engine that visualizes protein folding in real-time, helping researchers identify "lock-and-key" drug matches instantly.

🛡️ Fraud Auditor (FinTech Agent)

Function: Monitors cross-border transaction streams to detect anomalies.

Key Feature: Uses a Live Geo-Trace Attack Map to visualize the path of illicit funds across international borders, flagging high-risk jurisdictions and wash-trading patterns.

👷 Safety Designer (Civil Engineering Agent)

Function: Validates architectural blueprints against safety codes.

Key Feature: Deploys Thermal Stress Vision, utilizing computer vision to overlay heatmaps on blueprints to identify critical structural weaknesses before construction begins.

⚙️ How We Built It
The project was built as a high-fidelity Single Page Application (SPA) focusing on immersive interactivity and "Deep Tech" aesthetics.

Frontend Core: Built with React.js (Vite) for lightning-fast performance.

Styling: Used Tailwind CSS to create

title: Vibe Cooking
subtitle: Your AI chef-Cook Smarter, Waste Less, Live Better.
description:
Vibe Cooking is a multimodal AI cooking assistant designed to help users transform leftover kitchen ingredients into diverse, personalised recipes. Many households struggle with food waste, uncertain meal planning, and limited cooking inspiration. This project demonstrates how generative AI can address these challenges by recognising ingredients, understanding dietary needs, and instantly generating relevant meal options.

The application was built in Google AI Studio using Gemini’s multimodal capabilities, which allow the model to process videos, images and text. Users can upload or scan videos or photos of ingredients directly within the app interface. The model identifies what is available in the kitchen and recommends suitable recipes tailored to serving size, cooking preferences, and dietary restrictions such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or nut-free options. AI Studio’s prompt design, safety configuration, and API integration were used to build and test the end-to-end experience. The interactive demo was deployed through the AI Studio app environment for seamless showcasing.

This project is important because it lowers the cognitive effort of daily meal decisions while promoting sustainable consumption. By encouraging users to cook creatively with what they already have, Vibe Cooking helps reduce household food waste and supports healthier, smarter, and more resource-efficient living. The impact extends beyond convenience, demonstrating how multimodal AI can meaningfully improve everyday life through intuitive, human-centred design.
keywords: cooking, multimodal, users, ingredients, meal, studio, vibe, kitchen, recipes, food

title: Mindweave
subtitle: An AI system that visualizes human thinking by analyzing ideas into clarity, emotion, logic, and interactive mind-maps.
description:
MindWeave is an AI-powered thought-analysis system built using Gemini 3 Pro that transforms raw human ideas into structured, interactive visual maps. Instead of acting like a traditional chatbot, MindWeave analyzes how people think—their clarity, emotional tone, logic structure, reasoning gaps, and idea complexity—and presents the results through a beautifully animated UI.

Users can input text or speak directly using the integrated voice-to-text engine. Gemini then processes the thought and returns a detailed breakdown including:

the main idea,
supporting sub-ideas,
logic gaps,
improvement suggestions,
clarity score (0–100), and
detected emotional tone.

MindWeave visualizes this analysis using a dynamic animated mind-map, where the main idea sits at the center and related components orbit around it. Each node (sub-idea, gap, improvement) connects with smooth transitions, providing an intuitive view of how the user’s thinking is structured. A live “thinking heatmap” overlay further indicates cognitive intensity based on clarity, emotion, and complexity.
To enhance accessibility and interaction, MindWeave includes:
Voice Input Mode – Speak your thoughts and see them analyzed instantly.
AI Speaking Avatar – Gemini generates a spoken summary of your analyzed thought.
Responsive Cyber-Glass UI – A modern interface designed for clarity, smooth transitions, and rich visual experience.

This project reimagines idea processing by focusing not on generating content—but on revealing the structure of human thought itself. MindWeave can support students, creators, researchers, and teams who want to understand, refine, and communicate their ideas more clearly. It demonstrates how Gemini 3 Pro can be used to build interactive cognitive tools that provide insight, reflection, and guided improvement, making it a strong example of applied AI in real-world thinking and planning.
keywords: mindweave, idea, thought, gemini, clarity, using, ideas, improvement, thinking, analysis

Mathematics is the language of the universe, but for many, it remains a wall of text. Concepts like Monodromy (how mathematical objects change as you run around a singularity) are often buried in dry textbooks.

I built a reactive, educational engine that turns complex analysis into a neon-soaked puzzle game.

This is where the magic happened. I created a symbiotic workflow with Gemini:

I’ve always dreamed of building my own app—transforming beautiful mathematical theory into a playable game. I used to think I needed a whole team, but Gemini 3 Pro made this dream a reality in less than a week. The final result is smoother, faster, and more vibrant than I ever imagined.

title: Where's my money?
subtitle: AI-powered civic platform that transforms citizen feedback into structured government insights while ensuring budget transparency.
description:
Where is my money? turns your phone into a budget-aware complaint system. Point your camera at a pothole, broken streetlight, or overflowing trash - Gemini 3 instantly analyzes the photo, categorizes the problem across 7 infrastructure types, estimates repair costs in Soles, and scores severity 1-5. Here's what makes it different: the AI cross-references your complaint against actual budget execution data for your district. If your municipality has funds allocated for road repairs but hasn't spent them - your complaint routes there with evidence. If the budget is depleted - it routes directly to Peru's Contraloría General, with legal basis under Transparency Law 27806.

No response in 10 days? Automatic escalation. Municipality → Comptroller → Press. Every step documented.

Built for Lima's 43 districts. Spanish-first, but also considering Quechua for the 700K indigenous citizens in Lima, supported via Gemini translation. We also intend to open-source so any city can fork it.

Budget data from Peru's Ministery of Economy and Finance. Structured JSON output. Multimodal AI that turns citizen photos into actionable government intelligence.

Starting with Lima, your city: NEXT.
keywords: your, budget, complaint, lima, turns, into, gemini, data, municipality, routes

title: 💙SentiLife Sepsis Radar: AI-Powered Early Warning System
subtitle: SentiLife Sepsis Radar, an AI-powered system that predicts sepsis, Predicting critical deterioration 6 hours early to save lives in the ICU.
description:
📘 Summary

SentiLife Sepsis Radar is a real-time clinical decision support system built to detect sepsis 3–6 hours before physiological collapse.
Aligned with the “Health: Improve lives and patient care” track, it addresses sepsis — one of the leading causes of preventable hospital deaths.

The system identifies subtle hemodynamic instability often missed by clinicians, providing early alerts that enable rapid intervention, improve survival rates, and reduce ICU length of stay. ⏱️❤️‍🩹

🛠️ How It Was Created

Built using Google AI Studio, SentiLife simulates a high-fidelity ICU via synthetic streaming patient data.

Key components include:

🌟 Importance

Sepsis moves fast — SentiLife moves faster. ⚡
By converting noisy ICU data into predictive risk scores and explainable insights, the system reduces cognitive load for overburdened nurses and promotes earlier action.

This shifts care from reactive firefighting to proactive safety, supporting adherence to the critical Hour-1 Bundle, improving patient outcomes, and ultimately saving lives. 🏥💙

In real-world settings where alarm fatigue is rampant, this tool filters noise to highlight true physiological deterioration, ensuring critical alerts aren't ignored. It directly targets the "golden hour" of treatment, automating protocol checklists to prevent fatal delays in antibiotic administration. cloud-native architecture democratize advanced predictive monitoring ,The built-in financial modeling bridges the gap between clinical goals and hospital operations, demonstrating how preventing septic shock lowers readmission costs.
keywords: sepsis, sentilife, system, built, patient, real, clinical, physiological, improve, lives

title: GEVON Beta
subtitle: GEVON provides employees a fast, anonymous snapshot of pay, protections, inclusion, and macro job outlook.
description:
GEVON is an AI‑native web app designed to give every employee a clear, fast snapshot of their position in the world of work. In a single, no‑login session, users enter their role, location, pay, benefits, and optional inclusion context. GEVON then generates an Employment Snapshot that combines four lenses: Pay & Rewards, Legal Protections, Inclusion, and Macro Outlook. The result is an overall score out of 100 plus a concise narrative explaining where the user is strong, where they are exposed, and which actions can improve their situation.

The product addresses a growing global pain point: workers are surrounded by fragmented information -

**but lack one integrated, personalised view that answers three basic questions: **“Am I fairly treated?”, “How safe am I here?”, and “What should I do next?”. GEVON reframes that complexity into a calm, data‑driven experience that respects local differences in law, culture, and risk while staying visually minimal through its black‑and‑white, geometric brand system.

Technically, the beta is a lightweight, mobile‑first web interface backed by a modular scoring and explanation layer. This architecture is designed to plug into richer compensation, legal, and macroeconomic datasets over time, and to evolve into an employee‑side intelligence layer that complements enterprise HR and rewards platforms.
keywords: gevon, their, into, designed, employee, snapshot, inclusion, rewards, legal, where

title: Omni-Access
subtitle: Gemini 3 Pro -  instantly turns any media into accessible formats (audio description, rich alt-text) for universal inclusion.
description:
0. The Problem: Breaking the Wall of Exclusion

Today, a significant portion of online content (videos, infographics, documents) remains a "wall" for millions of people who are visually impaired, hearing impaired, or have cognitive disabilities. Current accessibility tools are fragmented and often limited to basic captions or minimalist alt-text. This inaccessibility excludes essential audiences from education, administrative information, and culture.

1. The Solution: Omni-Access

We present Omni-Access, a universal tool that takes any media (Video, Image, PDF, Audio) and instantly transforms it into accessible formats. In a single step, it simultaneously generates: a Full Transcript, a Detailed Audio Description of scenes, a Rich and Structured Alt-Text for complex data, and a Simplified Summary (cognitive accessibility).

2. The Impact: Transforming Exclusion into Inclusion

Media Bridge leverages the multimodal power of Gemini 3 Pro to offer accessibility solutions compliant with W3C standards, far exceeding the capabilities of yesterday's solutions. We don't just transcribe: we interpret context, structure, and meaning to provide a true substitute experience. This is a tangible step towards a truly inclusive internet.

3. Technical Depth & Execution

Our application leverages the advanced features of Gemini 3 Pro to achieve tasks previously considered impossible:

*Native Multimodality: *  We process a single stream (video or image) to generate multiple, interdependent outputs (text, visual description, data) in one AI request.

Advanced Reasoning: The model is prompted to analyze complex charts (FAAF criterion) and extract the conclusion and data structure (Rich Alt-Text), proving its reasoning capabilities beyond simple image recognition.

Production Pipeline: Our Final Prompt demands a highly structured output (using SSML for natural pauses and a JSON/Markdown format) to ensure seamless integration into our speech synthesis and export pipeline.

4. Creativit
keywords: accessibility, text, into, cognitive, omni, access, image, audio, description, data

title: AURA SENTINEL
subtitle: Automated risk analysis and spread prediction for the South East Asia region
description:
The inspiration for AURA Sentinel was born from the devastating floods that recently swept across Southeast Asia. This tragedy, which claimed over 300 lives across Indonesia, Malaysia, and Thailand, exposed a critical gap in current response systems: vital intelligence is often too fragmented and slow to reach those at risk.

AURA Sentinel bridges this gap by consolidating real-time geological data and local news feeds into a unified geospatial command center. It monitors nine distinct disaster categories, from typhoons to disease outbreaks, and visualizes them instantly on an interactive regional map.

Crucially, AURA goes beyond passive tracking. Powered by Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash, the platform employs a predictive risk engine. By analyzing terrain data, rainfall patterns, and unstructured news reports, the system models flood propagation paths and forecasts impact zones up to 48 hours in advance. It acts as an automated watchtower, translating raw noise into early warnings for the communities that need them most.
keywords: aura, sentinel, across, risk, data, news, into, them, inspiration, born

The core engine of Sooubh is its ability to act as a 24/7 private tutor. The Intelligent Doubt Solver goes beyond simple text-based Q&A. It utilizes multimodal capabilities to "see" problems. A student can upload a snapshot of a complex calculus problem or a chemical reaction diagram, and the AI analyzes the visual data to provide a step-by-step breakdown. The AI Laboratory is designed around evidence-based learning techniques.

Learning is not just about intelligence; it's about discipline. The Smart Study Planner integrates directly with the learning tools. It doesn't just list tasks; it provides the structure to complete them.

title: “AlphaCity Brain – Multi-Agent AI City Optimizer.”
subtitle: “AI City Optimizer”  “Urban Intelligence Engine”  “City Brain AI”  “Smart City Simulator”  “Predictive Urban AI”
description:
AlphaCity Brain – Project Description

Project Name: AlphaCity Brain
Domain: Artificial Intelligence, Smart City Simulation, Optimization, Data Visualization
Technologies Used: Python, SimPy, Plotly, Streamlit, Stable-Baselines3, Matplotlib
Project Type: AI Simulation / Optimization / Dashboard / Research

In the rapidly urbanizing world, city management has become an increasingly complex task. Urban planners must ensure smooth traffic, optimal energy consumption, efficient infrastructure, and citizen satisfaction. AlphaCity Brain is a comprehensive AI-powered city simulation and optimization project designed to address these challenges. The project aims to simulate an entire city’s operations, provide real-time analytics, and offer actionable AI-driven suggestions for improvements.

AlphaCity Brain is not just a simulator; it is a decision-support system that helps urban planners, researchers, and policymakers understand how different factors interact in a city environment. By modeling traffic, population growth, energy demand, and infrastructure usage, the system can predict potential problems and recommend optimal solutions.

The primary objectives of AlphaCity Brain are:

City Simulation: To create a realistic model of a city that incorporates key metrics such as traffic congestion, energy consumption, population growth, and infrastructure usage.

AI Optimization: To deploy an intelligent agent that monitors city metrics and suggests actionable changes to improve efficiency and citizen satisfaction.

Visualization Dashboard: To provide an interactive dashboard where stakeholders can visualize real-time data, analytics, and AI suggestions.

Scenario Analysis: To test hypothetical scenarios such as new roads, renewable energy installations, or policy changes, and evaluate their impact on city performance.

Future Scalability: To lay a foundation for more complex AI-driven smart city models, integrating advanced predictive analytics, reinforcement learning, and rea

SENSEI — Your Personal Research & Learning OS

Sensei comes from the Japanese word for teacher or master — and that’s exactly what this platform embodies: a structured, disciplined, distraction-free way to learn and research, the way it should be.

Designed for Gen-Z learners, independent researchers, and undergraduates, Sensei brings together every essential tool for daily learning into one unified, next-gen workspace. No context switching. No hopping across apps. Just pure flow.

Why Sensei Exists

Modern learners drown in tabs, apps, and scattered notes. Sensei fixes the fragmentation by creating a central operating system for learning, built for clarity, focus, and deep understanding.

Key Features
🖥️ Multi-Terminal Workspace

Run multiple terminals for different topics or projects — all organized and persistent.
Plus, an in-built console terminal logs your activity and pushes notifications when an AI task or analysis is complete.

📋 Task System with Kanban

A clean, integrated TODO + Kanban board keeps daily learning and research workflows organized. Visual, simple, and fast.

📝 System Design Canvas

Not a typical whiteboard — a fully interactive system-design canvas for mind-mapping, breaking concepts, sketching workflows, and planning ideas like real engineers do.

📚 Personal Library

Store books, PDFs, papers, and reference links in one place. Your research hub — always accessible, never lost.

🧪 Mini Research Lab

The heart of Sensei.
Upload papers, extract insights, let AI break down complex theories, review whitepapers, run comparisons, or generate experiment ideas — everything a modern researcher needs without external noise.

title: Redefining Local News With Gemini 3.0
subtitle: Filling the gap in local news by using AI to turn complex city meetings into clear, shareable updates for the community.
description:
Smyrna Local is a news app that keeps people in Smyrna, Georgia, connected to their community and local government without the homework. Instead of forcing residents to do deep dives into long City Council live streams or dense meeting notes, the app automates the research. It takes "story nuggets"—like a transcript from a 3-hour meeting or a council member's Facebook post—and turns them into clear, engaging articles. It then automatically repurposes those articles into Instagram posts, making local news easy to digest and share.

In our city, we had a huge problem: residents were showing up to City Council meetings complaining that they "didn't know" what was going on until it was too late. I wanted to solve that by taking the heavy lifting required to keep up with city functions—like new zoning or development projects—and putting it all in one accessible place. Smyrna currently doesn't have a newspaper, so this AI product fills a massive information gap, ensuring neighbors are informed rather than blindsided.

I use Gemini 3 Pro’s long-context window to analyze raw city council transcripts and YouTube captions, hunting for the specific "story nuggets" that residents actually care about. Once a topic is identified, the app uses Gemini 3 Pro with Search Grounding to write a full article, ensuring the facts are backed by real-world data. To make the site look professional and consistent, I integrated Google Nano Banana Pro to auto-generate on-brand thumbnails for every story.
keywords: city, council, smyrna, local, residents, into, story, news, long, meeting

title: Life Pattern Designer
subtitle: A multimodal wellbeing assistant that analyzes your environment and meals
description:
Life Pattern Designer is a multimodal wellbeing assistant that analyzes both a user’s living environment and meals to generate personalized routines, reduce stress, and improve daily health. Many people struggle with sustaining habits because their surroundings and diet silently work against them. Life Pattern Designer uses Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced video and image reasoning to transform these friction points into actionable insights.

From a short room video, the system evaluates five core wellbeing metrics "Environment Efficiency, Behavioral Consistency, Focus Sustainability, Routine Stability, and Stress Friction Index" producing a holistic QoL Score and tailored improvement routines. It also performs causal reasoning to explain why clutter forms, where routines break, and how small changes can create long-term impact.

With the addition of Meal Insight, RoomRoutine analyzes a photo of the user’s meal to assess:

Predictive simulations of how environmental and dietary changes improve wellbeing over time
Built entirely in AI Studio with Gemini 3 Pro’s native multimodality, Life Pattern Designer demonstrates how everyday videos and photos can be transformed into meaningful health guidance, making wellbeing more accessible, actionable, and engaging.
keywords: wellbeing, life, pattern, designer, routines, analyzes, user, environment, stress, improve

subtitle: Gamifying society of mind with agentic debates and prediction markets.
description:

The Solution: Society of Kawaii is a multi-agent debate arena where AI agents with opposing worldviews battle for truth. Inspired by Minsky's "Society of Mind," the system pits:

title: Lumina: Navigation and Safety
subtitle: Real-time Visual Assistant & Historical Guide for the Visually Impaired
description:
Lumina is a transformative accessibility application designed to give "sight" to the visually impaired through the power of the Gemini 2.5 Multimodal Live API. Serving as both a vigilant safety guide and an intelligent travel companion, Lumina processes live video and audio streams to provide real-time spoken feedback.
The app operates on a strict safety hierarchy: it prioritizes detecting physical hazards—like poles, stairs, or traffic—and issues urgent voice commands accompanied by distinct haptic vibration patterns. Once safety is established, Lumina enriches the user's world by proactively identifying landmarks, architecture, and historical sites, effectively acting as an automated museum tour guide for the real world.
Technically, Lumina features a custom low-latency audio pipeline for raw PCM streaming, a high-contrast UI for low-vision users, and a robust "SOS" mode that functions independently of the AI connection. By fusing GPS data with advanced multimodal reasoning, Lumina doesn't just help users navigate their environment safely; it empowers them to understand and enjoy it.
keywords: lumina, safety, multimodal, live, guide, audio, real, world, users, transformative

title: MedScript AI
subtitle: Your Personal Medication Safety Assistant
description:
💊 MedScript AI

=============================================================================

📖 Overview
MedScript AI is an intelligent, privacy-focused web application designed to enhance medication safety. It leverages Google's advanced Gemini 3 Pro and 2.5 Flash models to digitize prescriptions via OCR, analyze potential drug interactions, and generate personalized, location-aware wellness plans.

All data is processed securely and stored locally on the client side, ensuring user privacy.

=============================================================================

🚀 Key Features

📷 Intelligent OCR Scanning
• Vision AI: Powered by gemini-2.5-pro to read handwritten and printed prescriptions.
• Smart Extraction: Automatically identifies drug names, dosages, and patient vitals (Age, Weight, BP).
• Built-in Editor: Crop, rotate, and enhance images before analysis for maximum accuracy.

🛡️ Clinical Safety Agent
• Interaction Check: Detects Drug-Drug, Drug-Condition, and Drug-Vital risks using gemini-3-pro-preview.
• Verification: Ensures prescribed meds match patient conditions.
• Severity Scoring: Categorizes risks (Critical, Moderate, Safe) with actionable advice.

🧘 Location-Aware Wellness
• Diet Plans: Generates meal plans based on local cuisine and ingredients detected from your geolocation.
• Lifestyle: Tailored yoga and sleep recommendations based on health conditions (e.g., Hypertension).

💬 Context-Aware Chatbot
• RAG Experience: Chat with an AI that knows your current medication list.
• Smart Suggestions: Prompts relevant questions like "Side effects of [Your Drug]?" automatically.

=============================================================================

🧠 Multi-Model AI Architecture
We utilize a "Right Model for the Right Task" strategy to optimize for intelligence, speed, and cost.

Complex Clinical Reasoning -> gemini-3-pro-preview
(Highest reasoning capability for complex safety checks and agentic workflows)

Prescription Vision (OCR) -> gemini
keywords: gemini, drug, medical, safety, flash, medscript, privacy, google, location, aware

title: Disaster Lens – AI-Powered Real-Time Disaster Damage Analyzer
subtitle: Disaster Lens uses AI to analyze disaster photos, detect hazards, assess damage levels, give quick safety guidance to help people act fast.
description:
Disaster Lens is an AI-powered disaster assessment tool built using Gemini 3 Pro in Google AI Studio. It analyzes real-world disaster images — such as floods, cyclones, fires, and building collapses — and instantly generates life-saving insights. The app uses Gemini’s native multimodality to understand complex scenes, detect hazards, estimate damage severity, and provide immediate safety instructions.

Users simply upload a photo or capture one with their phone. Disaster Lens identifies structural damage, water depth, fire intensity, trapped individuals, electrical risks, and blocked escape paths. It then predicts rescue priority levels and recommends essential resources such as medical aid, food supplies, or skilled responders. The app is designed to support civilians during emergencies and assist rescue teams in making smarter, faster decisions.

This project demonstrates the real-world potential of Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced reasoning and vision capabilities. The system uses annotation, multimodal understanding, and contextual decision-making to translate raw images into actionable disaster intelligence. Disaster Lens is fast, accessible, and has strong potential impact in disaster-prone regions across the world — especially Bangladesh, where floods and cyclones affect millions each year.

By combining AI with humanitarian needs, Disaster Lens shows how technology can save lives when every second matters.
keywords: disaster, lens, gemini, world, real, images, such, floods, cyclones, uses

title: Rankify: Transforming Static PDFs into Interactive Exams
subtitle: Rankify: Transforming Static PDFs into Interactive Exams
description:
-Title: Rankify:> Transforming Static PDFs into Interactive Exams 
-Subtitle:: Bridging the gap between paper study and Computer-Based Testing for JEE/NEET aspirants.
-Track: Education

Project Description: Millions of students prepare for high-stakes competitive exams (like **JEE **and NEET) using static PDF question papers, yet the actual exams are *Computer-Based Tests (CBT)*. This disconnect hampers their ability to practice time management and exam strategy.

Rankify solves this by instantly converting any static PDF mock test into a fully interactive, timed, and scored online exam.

How I built it with Gemini 3: Leveraging Gemini 3 Pro’s native multimodality in Google AI Studio, I "vibe coded" a solution that goes beyond simple OCR. Gemini visually parses the complex layout of exam papers—correctly identifying distinct questions, scientific notation, diagrams, and multiple-choice options. It then instantly generates the application logic to render these components as a dynamic quiz interface, handling the "translation" from visual document to interactive code in real-time.

Why it matters: Rankify democratizes access to high-quality exam simulation. By using Gemini's reasoning to structure unstructured data, we allow students to test themselves authentically on any material they possess, turning passive study into active, result-oriented training.
keywords: exam, gemini, rankify, static, into, interactive, exams, study, computer, based

title: The AI Interpreter for the Non-Verbal
subtitle: Giving a voice to ALS and Stroke survivors using Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal reasoning.
description:
Project Description: What it is: Aura Voice is a real-time communication tool for the 14 million people living with speech loss (ALS, Stroke, Autism). Instead of slow eye-tracking or typing, users simply interact with their environment. The app analyzes their live video feed—gestures, facial expressions, and objects—and instantly speaks their intent out loud.

How I built it: I "vibe coded" this entirely in Google AI Studio using Gemini 3 Pro. The core innovation isn't traditional code; it's a System Instruction that turns Gemini into an empathetic interpreter. The app streams video to the model, which fuses visual data (e.g., a user shivering) with object context (an open window) to generate natural language ("I am cold, please close the window"), which is then spoken via browser TTS.

Why it matters: Existing accessibility tools cost thousands of dollars and result in robotic, slow communication. Aura Voice democratizes this technology, using the device already in your pocket to restore not just words, but human connection and dignity.

Video Demo: https://youtu.be/Oe41vQs-IYY
Public AI Studio App Link: https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1w5XjGKWj2k185fEDpWVTgTJ1RsDNYnUb?fullscreenApplet=true

title: ARENA (Autonomous Research Evaluator for Next-Gen AI Models)
subtitle: ARENA  is a Gemini 3 Pro–powered platform that automatically evaluates any AI model using DEEP MIND BENCHMARKS
description:
ARENA (Autonomous Research Evaluator for Next-Gen AI Models) is a Gemini 3 Pro–powered platform that automatically evaluates any AI model using two DeepMind-released, Kaggle-hosted research benchmarks: DeepSearchQA and FACTS Multimodal, and Generates instant report for Model metrics & Insights for optimization based on different standards of "How People Use AI Agents" Research Paper.

🚀 Bring DeepMind-level testing to your own AI model and User Friendlyness — instantly.

🧠 Why DeepMind Benchmarks Matter

DeepMind’s datasets are among the most rigorous ever created for AI reasoning, multimodality, and factuality.

🔍 DeepSearchQA

900+ multi-step causal chain research questions
Covers 17 scientific domains
Tests deep reasoning, long-context inference, and retrieval-style analysis
Measures comprehensiveness — not just correctness

🖼️ FACTS Multimodal

Evaluates image-based factual grounding
Uses human-authored atomic facts
Ensures models do more than recognize objects — they must reason accurately
Detects contradictions & missing visual facts

⚙️ How ARENA Works

ARENA loads both datasets automatically. Researchers simply:
1️⃣ Connect their model API
2️⃣ Press Run Evaluation
3️⃣ Watch ARENA perform full analysis in real time

🤖 Behind the scenes, ARENA:
Generates optimized prompts
Validates JSON outputs
Scores reasoning chains
Matches atomic facts
Detects contradictions
Computes multimodal grounding quality

📊 What You Get

A dynamic, interactive research dashboard + a polished PDF Research Report containing:
🧠 Deep reasoning metrics
🖼️ Multimodal factuality scores
📚 Taxonomy breakdowns
🔥 Failure analyses
🛠️ Fine-tuning recommendations

This transforms model evaluation from manual & error-prone → into a transparent, automated, research-grade workflow.

🌍 Impact

ARENA accelerates scientific discovery, benchmarking, model comparison, and safe-AGI development by giving teams a trustworthy, repeatable way to understand model behavior — all built inside Google AI Studio, p

title: ClimateShift Alpha
subtitle: ClimateShift Alpha: portfolios designed by Gemini 3 Pro to beat the S&P 500 with both financial and environmental sustainability in mind.
description:
ClimateShift Alpha: Reimagining Sustainable Finance with AI-Powered Performance

Tired of choosing between strong returns and ethical investments? ClimateShift Alpha, powered by Gemini 3 Pro, redefines what's possible in sustainable investing, delivering portfolios that outperform the S&P 500 on a backtested basis while reallocating capital towards companies creating a brighter future.

Traditional index funds often mean inadvertently supporting industries that contribute to climate change, engage in predatory practices, or are vulnerable to future AI disruption. ClimateShift Alpha offers a groundbreaking alternative. With the power of Gemini 3 Pro, the app constructs high-conviction equity strategies on-demand to strictly eliminate these undesirable exposures and ensure reliable returns.

Every generated portfolio is automatically backtested over 5 years against the S&P 500, allowing users to instantly see how their portfolio would have performed against the de facto benchmark by which all investors are measured against.

ClimateShift Alpha also provides a seamless production grade user interface. Users can click any stock to view its historical performance and receive an AI-generated summary explaining its strategic role and rationale within the portfolio. Need a specific focus? Our unique rebalancing feature allows custom prompts to exclude certain stocks, prioritize different industries, or align with precise ethical guidelines, offering unparalleled personalization.

ClimateShift Alpha represents a paradigm shift in financial technology, providing a blueprint for a world in which investing ethically and profitably are not mutually exclusive. Join us in building a smarter, cleaner, and more prosperous tomorrow.
keywords: climateshift, alpha, portfolio, against, sustainable, powered, performance, returns, ethical, gemini

title: Forecaster Copilot: Human‑Centered AI for High‑Impact Weather Prediction
subtitle: An interactive, explainable assistant that turns multi-source signals into operational guidance for meteorologists.
description:
Forecaster Copilot is an AI‑assisted forecasting prototype built to augment professional forecasters during fast‑moving, high‑impact weather situations. Rather than outputting a single black‑box number, the system fuses real‑time observations, short‑range model guidance, and historical context into a workflow that mirrors how meteorologists think: diagnose the current state, assess uncertainty, compare analog regimes, then draft a decision‑ready product. The core goal is to compress the time from data to decision while keeping forecasters fully in control.

This hackathon demo runs as a lightweight web app. Users select or click a station on the map, and the app:

By combining trustworthy uncertainty with interpretable evidence and an editable bulletin workflow, Forecaster Copilot helps forecasters issue more timely, consistent, and communicable forecasts under real‑world time pressure—especially for rare or escalating events where minutes matter.

description:
Project Description (Summary)

VOLT (Volatility Options Lightning Terminal) is an AI-powered institutional-grade options trading platform that democratizes professional trading tools for retail investors. Built entirely through vibe coding with Gemini 3 Pro in Google AI Studio, VOLT combines conversational AI, real-time market data, advanced quantitative modeling, and stunning 3D visualizations into a single, accessible terminal.

VOLT solves a critical accessibility gap: professional options trading tools cost $2,000+ per month, leaving retail traders without the analytical firepower that institutions take for granted. Our platform levels the playing field by leveraging Gemini 3 Pro's advanced reasoning and native multimodality to deliver:

AI Trading Assistant: Natural language interface with 6 specialized function-calling tools for real-time quotes, fundamentals, news sentiment, alternative data analysis, price predictions, and strategy generation
3D Volatility Surfaces: Interactive visualizations using Black-Scholes and Heston stochastic volatility models
News Impact Predictor: ML-powered headline analysis that predicts price movements with historical similarity matching
Whisper Aggregator: Alternative sentiment data from Reddit, Twitter, Glassdoor, Google Trends, and more
Options Runner Game: Gamified learning experience replaying historic market events
RAG-Enhanced Memory: Vector embeddings for contextual market conversations
Track: Technology – Pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI-powered fintech.

The Problem:** Wall Street's $25,000 Advantage

Every day, millions of retail traders enter the options market armed with nothing more than a smartphone app and hope. Meanwhile, institutional traders at hedge funds and prop desks have access to Bloomberg terminals ($25,000/year), sophisticated volatility models, real-time alternative data feeds, and teams of quantitative analysts.

This isn't just an inconvenience—it's a structural disadvantage that co

Overview This application is not just a tool; it is a comprehensive health ecosystem designed to bridge the gap between complex medical information and daily patient needs. The "Safety Loop": Unlike other apps that operate in silos, our app connects your Meds, Diet, and Records. The AI Dietitian knows what medicines you are taking, and the Medicine Scanner knows your allergies from your PHR. This interconnected awareness prevents adverse reactions that standalone apps miss.

title: The MindSprout
subtitle: Master any concept with MindSprout
description:
What We Built
MindSprout is an intelligent educational platform designed to transform how people learn complex topics. We moved beyond static text by building an application that functions as an instant, personalized tutor. Whether you are curious about "Quantum Entanglement" or "The Renaissance," MindSprout dynamically generates a comprehensive learning path in real-time.

At its core, the application solves the problem of information overload and "one-size-fits-all" education. It uses Google's Gemini models to break down concepts into digestible, multimodal formats—combining text, AI-generated visualizations, and audio to suit different learning styles.

Key Features
🧠 Adaptive Multimodal Learning: Users aren't stuck with a single explanation. The dashboard allows users to toggle between "Beginner" (simple analogies) and "Advanced" (technical deep dives) instantly. The app also generates a visual storyboard with AI illustrations and includes Text-to-Speech (TTS) for auditory learners.

🎮 Gamified Assessment: Learning is reinforced through an adaptive quiz engine that generates questions on the fly. We implemented a full gamification loop with XP, difficulty multipliers, daily streaks, and unlockable badges (like "Scholar" or "On Fire") to keep users motivated.

✨ "Vibe" & UX: The interface is built for modern engagement, featuring "Surprise Me" discovery modes, staggered entrance animations, and a polished, responsive UI.

How It Works (Under the Hood)

title: Research Buddy
subtitle: An intelligent Research Assistant built to solve the real problems students and researchers.
description:
Research Buddy is an intelligent research-assistant system designed to help students, beginners, and early researchers explore academic topics with clarity and structure. It processes natural-language queries and transforms them into meaningful research outputs using a set of predefined reasoning workflows.

The system uses a lightweight intent-classification layer to understand what a user is asking such as generating research topics, extracting challenges, summarizing papers, or building complete research plans. Based on this detected intent, it routes the query into a structured prompt pipeline, ensuring consistent, guided, and domain-relevant results every time.

Each pipeline handles a dedicated research task:

Topic Generator: Creates well-defined, emerging research topics within a selected domain.

Challenge Analyzer: Breaks down key research challenges, gaps, and motivations.

Paper Summary Engine: Provides concise and coherent summaries of research papers.

Research Plan Builder: Generates complete research directions including introduction, problem statement, methodology, and future scope.

By organizing the entire workflow into modular prompt chains, Research Buddy eliminates the confusion beginners face when starting research. Instead of manually searching, filtering, and structuring information, users receive a guided exploration experience that accelerates learning and improves research quality.

This system makes research more approachable, structured, and efficient  ideal for students, academic beginners, and anyone exploring new technical domains.
keywords: research, system, beginners, topics, into, buddy, students, academic, intent, challenges

title: NeuroTone: Auditory Tinnitus Therapy
subtitle: An app with various evidenced based sound therapies to remediate or mask tinnitus symptoms.
description:
I'm a musician and I've played in too many loud environments. After an especially loud gig I developed tinnitus in one ear that didn't subside and led to me quitting playing saxophone.

I spent time researching evidenced based therapies, some of which were sound therapies, and experimented with various online tools and apps, but didn't find anything with the level of control and customisation I was looking for. Because I'd already built a couple of apps in Firebase Studio and AI Studio I thought I'd make a sound therapy app for myself.

Because I'd already tested so many potential tone and noise based ideas, I had a clear picture of what I wanted to include in the app: pure tone, white/pink/brown noise, stimulus duration, interval duration, balance control and so on. I used Gemini to do some further rounds of research into the journal literature so that I could try out anything novel I hadn't previously tried.

After the initial PRD, I tested the app in Preview and added, modified, and removed modes and features. The app in its current deployed-to-cloud state has the following functions:

I added PWA manifest and customisations to allow it to work especially well with the Audio Engine API on iPhones. Once installed and opened on an iPhone it will run, and all features can be accessed, without an internet connection. I added a "Factory Reset" button down at the bottom because in rare cases the app can become unresponsive in some way on a phone and Gemini  suggested it was because a PWA only has so much access to iPhone APIs. This fixes anything that gets stuck.

I didn't spend too much time on the UI/UX, beyond making several rounds of improvements to ensure the slider controls were easily draggable, and that the app fits phone screens.
keywords: because, didn, some, anything, added, many, loud, after, especially, time

title: MoonEcho: A Guided AI Podcast Recording Companion
subtitle: The AI recording companion helps you easily achieve a lively conversation effect, content organization, and audio editing.
description:
There is an ancient Chinese poem that goes, "Raising my cup, I invite the bright moon; with my shadow, we make three." It tells of how a person faces their inner self with independence and openness. When I applied for a master's program in 2022, I recorded my own podcast. At that time, my strongest feeling was loneliness. After a day of studying, I would hide in the school corridor late at night and use my voice to record my thoughts and reflections. Perhaps distant listeners would give me some sporadic feedback the next day, but I still vividly remember the loneliness I felt while recording.

Now, with AI, I can finally create a software that can guide me and accompany me to express those precious inspirations anytime, anywhere.

MoonEcho is that moon with whom I "toast together". When the AI speaks, the moon will flicker in sync. You can choose its personality: whether it is gently accompanying, sharply questioning, or curious. You can also define the language of its responses. At the start of the project, based on the Bullet Points you set, AI will generate a corresponding "interview outline map" in the background to keep the recording on track.

Through continuous debugging, I have made the AI's responses both informative and approachable, and to a certain extent, it knows how to guide the direction of the conversation. Most importantly, it can naturally have some pauses like a human, which connects well with the dialogue. This is essential for making an excellent podcast program.

I also revolutionized the previously complex audio editing interface, closely integrating it with conversations. Through audio-to-text conversion, podcast content can now be edited just like modifying a dialogue. The delay in AI responses can be eliminated with a single click. Its lightweight nature means that MoonEcho is far from the end; it is the beginning of reaching a broader audience and resonating with them.

This AI podcast companion not only makes your spoken output more natu

title: CogniFlow: The Socratic Reasoning Engine
subtitle: Diagnosing student logic with Gemini 3 Pro Deep Think & Generative UI
description:
CogniFlow addresses the "Metacognition Crisis" in education. While current AI tools provide instant answers, they often atrophy critical thinking skills. CogniFlow is an adaptive Socratic tutor that uses Gemini 3 Pro to diagnose a student's reasoning process rather than just solving the problem for them.

Technical Implementation:

Deep Think Logic: We utilize thinking_level="high" to analyze student inputs against complex logical frameworks (e.g., Operating Systems concurrency constraints).

Thought Signatures: The app persists the model's reasoning state across the dialogue, ensuring the AI "remembers" specific misconceptions identified in previous turns.

Generative UI (Dynamic View): We map the model's internal reasoning trace to a visual Knowledge Graph (React Flow). This allows students to literally "see" their gaps in understanding (visualized as "Misconception" or "Analyzing" nodes) and watch them turn green as they master the concept.

Impact: By shifting AI from an "Answer Engine" to a "Diagnosis Engine," we turn the cheat-sheet into a scaffold for deep learning. This approach has massive potential in STEM education, legal training, and complex debugging.
keywords: reasoning, cogniflow, education, student, them, deep, complex, model, turn, engine

title: Vastu Planner AI: Spatial Analysis with Vision
subtitle: Analyze floor plans for Vastu compliance using Gemini Vision, Shoelace Geometry, and the 32-Directional Grid.
description:
The Problem
For millions of home buyers in India and across the globe, Vastu Shastra (the ancient Indian science of architecture) is a non-negotiable part of purchasing a property. However, modern apartments often come with irregular shapes (cuts and extensions) that make traditional Vastu analysis difficult.

Most existing tools rely on simple square grids. They fail when a plot is L-shaped or irregular, leading to incorrect calculations of the Brahmasthan (Energy Center) and the true North alignment. Furthermore, identifying rooms manually is tedious and error-prone.

The Solution: Vastu Planner AI
Vastu Planner AI is a web-based spatial analysis tool that combines geometric algorithms with Gemini 1.5 Pro's Multimodal Vision capabilities. It allows users to upload any floor plan—sketch, blueprint, or Zillow screenshot—and instantly receive a Vastu compliance report based on the advanced "32-Directional Grid" system.

How It Works
Upload & Calibration: The user uploads a floor plan. Using a custom canvas interface, they define the boundary of the living space.

Geometric Intelligence: The app uses the Shoelace Formula (implemented via Gemini-generated code) to mathematically calculate the exact Centroid (Brahmasthan) of irregular polygons.

Grid Overlay: A dynamic 32-Directional Vastu Chakra overlays the image, centered on the calculated centroid. The user rotates the grid to align with the plan's North.

Gemini Vision Analysis: This is where the magic happens. We send the aligned floor plan to Gemini 1.5 Pro.

The Prompt: "Analyze this image. Locate the functional zones (Kitchen/Fire Element, Toilet/Disposal, Master Bedroom/Earth Element) and return their coordinates."

The Verdict: The app cross-references Gemini's visual identification with the geometric grid to determine if a specific room is in a "Forbidden Zone" (e.g., A toilet in the North-East).

Remedies: If a defect is found, Gemini generates specific, non-destructive remedies (e.g., "Use a brass wire cor
keywords: gemini, vastu, analysis, irregular, plan, grid, north, planner, geometric, vision

title: self-healing AI code firewall
subtitle: An autonomous self-healing AI firewall built with Google AI Studio and Gemini 2.0 that detects, fixes, and protects against threats in real
description:
For this project, I built something I’ve personally never seen done in a simple way before: an AI-powered self-healing firewall.
The idea came from a very basic question — “Why do systems wait for a human to fix a security issue?”
Hackers don’t wait, and attacks happen instantly. So I wanted to build a system that reacts instantly too.

AI Ghost Firewall is a security layer that runs alongside an application and continuously checks for vulnerabilities.
If it finds something unsafe in the code or behavior, it doesn’t just show an alert — it actually generates a fix on its own.
This means the system can protect itself even when no developer is watching.
I designed the system around two main components:

It scans code and traffic patterns in real time.
For example, in my demo, the AI can catch things like insecure SQL queries or suspicious user input patterns that could lead to injection attacks.

If the system flags a vulnerability, another AI instantly creates a safer version of that code.
For the demo, I show how an unsafe SQL query can be converted into a parameterized, secure version within seconds.

Both parts work together, so the system becomes:

Automatic

Fast

Continuously learning

Independent of human reaction time
What Makes This Project Interesting

I kept the architecture simple, but the concept is powerful:

It doesn’t just identify security issues — it fixes them.

It doesn’t overload developers — it helps them.

It works in the background like a “ghost layer,” constantly watching and correcting.

It can adapt to new threats over time instead of relying on fixed rules.

Instead of traditional firewalls that only block requests, this one can rewrite unsafe code, generate safer alternatives, and log everything it does.
Cybersecurity usually requires fast reaction times, and humans simply can’t respond at the speed attacks happen.
With AI Ghost Firewall, the system doesn’t depend on a developer being online or checking logs.
It takes action immediately.
keywords: system, code, doesn, time, firewall, security, attacks, instantly, ghost, unsafe

title: AI Retrocausality: Between Facts and Paradoxes
subtitle: framework for resolving information paradoxes through AI-driven retrocausal analysis
description: In this project, we utilize Google Gemini to explore the concept of Digital Retrocausality—a phenomenon where an AI's reasoning about a future conclusion effectively reshapes how it interprets past data points. We aim to challenge the linear processing of LLMs by introducing logical paradoxes and observing how Gemini navigates the boundary between hallucination and creative fact-finding.The ProblemTraditional AI models process tokens linearly (cause >< effect). However, complex reasoning often requires looking at the conclusion to understand the premise. We investigate:How does AI handle grandfather paradoxes in logic puzzles?Can an LLM rewrite its internal "understanding" of a fact based on a contradictory prompt constraint?Our SolutionWe built a pipeline using the Gemini API that:Injects Paradoxes: Feeds the model scenarios where facts conflict with logical outcomes.Analyzes Reasoning: Uses Gemini's long-context window to trace the "decision path" backwards.Visualizes Retrocausality: Maps how the final output probability shifted the weights of earlier token interpretations.Key FeaturesParadox Engine: A script creating self-referential logic loops.Fact-Check Layer: Ensuring the "retrocausal" logic doesn't break fundamental truths.Gemini Integration: Leveraging the model's reasoning capabilities to solve the unsolvable.ConclusionThis project demonstrates that AI reasoning isn't just a straight line; it's a loop. By understanding these "retrocausal" behaviors, we can build more robust models capable of complex, non-linear problem solving
keywords: gemini, reasoning, paradoxes, fact, logic, project, retrocausality, where, conclusion, linear

title: HealthSense – AI Symptom Analyzer
subtitle: AI-powered image-based symptom analysis with conversational medical-style guidance.
description:
AI-powered image-based symptom analysis with conversational medical-style guidance.

Health

AI Symptom Analyzer • Powered by Gemini 3 Pro

HealthSense is a multimodal health guidance system built with Gemini 3 Pro that helps users understand visible symptoms through simple, natural interaction. Many people experience rashes, swelling, discoloration, allergies, or mild injuries but struggle to interpret what they mean. HealthSense bridges this gap by combining image analysis, reasoning, and dialogue to provide safe and useful guidance.

Users start by uploading a photo of the visible symptom. Gemini 3 Pro analyzes the image, detecting visual patterns such as redness, texture changes, swelling, dryness, or irritation. HealthSense then asks a small set of medically relevant follow-up questions—duration, pain level, recent exposure, fever, and other factors that influence interpretation. After collecting this context, the system produces general explanations, safe home-care steps, what to avoid, and clear red-flag warnings that indicate when medical care is needed.

HealthSense also supports medication label interpretation. Users can take a picture of a medicine bottle or prescription label, and the app automatically highlights dosage instructions, allergens, safety notes, and common side effects in an easy-to-understand way.

The goal is not diagnosis. Instead, HealthSense empowers individuals with early awareness, safety guidelines, and decision support—all delivered through Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal reasoning capabilities.

A disclaimer is included in every response:  
“HealthSense is not a medical device and does not diagnose conditions. For severe or unclear symptoms, consult a licensed healthcare professional.”

HealthSense demonstrates how multimodal AI can transform personal health understanding at global scale.

The app automatically generates structured outputs including key findings, contradictions, research gaps, hypotheses, property predictions, ranked candidate molecules, and follow-up experiments.

The app was developed by modularizing prompts into input parsers (PDFs, CSVs, images), a reasoning core (knowledge synthesis, hypothesis generation, property prediction), and output modules (experiment design, visualizations, candidate ranking). This modular architecture ensures clarity, reproducibility, and scalability for diverse scientific domains.

By surfacing contradictions, highlighting missing data, and proposing experiments, it accelerates the research cycle and supports reproducible science. title: Divergent Paths: A Kaleidoscope for Causality
subtitle: You can't connect the dots looking forward, what if... just for a moment... you could see the lines that were never drawn?
description:
We live in a world of absolute facts. You go to a search engine, you ask for the capital of France, it gives you Paris. It is binary. It is static.

But the human mind doesn't work like that. The human mind is an engine of possibility. We lie awake at 3 AM wondering: What if I took that job in Tokyo? What if the internet was never invented? What if we could photosynthesize?

Existing AI chatbots are helpful assistants. But we didn't want to build an assistant. We wanted to build a telescope into the multiverse.

We built Divergent Paths.

Divergent Paths is not a text generator. It is an interactive simulation of alternative realities.

To make this experience feel fluid and "alive," we needed speed for the spark, and depth for the understanding. We utilized a dual-model architecture:

The Spark (Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite):
We use the 2.5 Flash model for the high-speed generation of the path cards. It’s tuned with a high temperature (0.85+) to encourage wild, creative divergence. It creates the breadth of the multiverse instantly.

The Intellect (Gemini 1.5 Pro / 3 Pro Preview):
When you click the "Sparkles" icon for a Deep Analysis, we switch gears. We call upon the heavier reasoning capabilities of the Pro model. It acts as a sociologist, analyzing the immediate ripple effects, long-term societal shifts, and logical paradoxes of your scenario. It provides structure to the chaos.

The Grounding (Google Search Tool):
In our "News" mode, we don't just hallucinate. We use Gemini's grounding tools to fetch real-world headlines from the last 48 hours, and then we apply the "What If" algorithm to actual events. It is the intersection of fact and fiction.

We believe software should feel organic. It should breathe.

Why build this? Because imagination is a muscle. In a world of algorithms telling us what to watch and what to buy, we are forgetting how to dream.

Divergent Paths uses the most advanced AI in the world not to give you answers, but to help you ask better question
keywords: what, world, build, divergent, paths, model, gemini, search, engine, human

title: Socratix: Multimodal AI Tutor
subtitle: Socratix is a real-time, voice-first learning platform powered by the Gemini Live API.
description:
Education today is often one-size-fits-all, but we don’t all learn the same way. Some learners need visuals, others need analogies, and some need to interact directly with data. We built Socratix to demonstrate the future of personalized education: a tutor that doesn’t just explain concepts, but visualizes them in real time based on who you are.

Socratix is an intelligent tutoring environment focused on Data Science and Mathematics. It uses a Socratic approach, guiding learners through complex topics using natural voice conversation.

Adaptive Persona 
If you tell Socratix you love video games, it explains neural networks using concepts like skill trees and leveling up.

Live Artifact Generation 
Socratix doesn’t just talk, it acts. Ask about standard deviation and it generates an interactive bell curve with adjustable sliders. Ask about neural architecture and it renders a pulsing neural network simulation.

Multimodal Interaction 
The system generates LaTeX slides for instruction, 3D Plotly graphs for data exploration, and code snippets for implementation, all synchronized with the spoken explanation.

Socratix is built on the Gemini Multimodal Live API (gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview) to support ultra-low-latency voice interaction.

Audio Streaming 
Implemented bidirectional PCM audio streaming with interruption detection, allowing users to speak over the AI and naturally steer the conversation.

Advanced Tool Calling 
We designed a suite of custom tools such as generateBellCurve, generateNeuralNetwork, generateGraph, and generateQuiz. When Gemini determines a visual aid is needed, it calls these tools and the frontend dynamically renders complex React components.

Contextual Reasoning 
The system injects dynamic system instructions based on a user’s onboarding profile, enforcing learning preferences such as visual or auditory styles and analogy choices.

Balancing audio latency with real-time visual generation was one of the hardest problems. Artifacts n

title: Green Corridor
subtitle: Using technology to bring order to the chaos of the Indian roads, so that our ambulances can move through the traffic without stopping.
description:
The Problem: According to a survey, nearly 24,000 daily fatalities occur in India due to delays in emergency medical aid. These delays stem from unordered traffic, a lack of civic lane discipline, and inefficient ambulance distribution.

The Solution: Automated Green Corridors To solve this, I have designed a system where city traffic signals are connected to a central server. When an ambulance is in active mode, the system automatically overrides signals within a specific threshold distance to Green. This clears congestion before the ambulance arrives, ensuring a continuous, unhindered path.

App Functionality The accompanying application features two distinct interfaces:

Patient Mode: Acts as an "Uber for Ambulances," allowing users to request specific ambulance types and select their destination hospital immediately.

Emergency Crew Mode:

Driver View: Displays optimal paths and simulated signal statuses. An AI Voice Assistant allows hands-free interaction for route changes and congestion data.

Nurse View: An AI Voice Assistant listens to verbal updates on patient vitals (HR, BP, SpO2) and generates a professional medical report, ensuring doctors are prepared upon arrival.

Impact This system aims to reclaim every second of the "Golden Hour," shifting the odds of survival in the patient's favor through technology.

Note for Evaluation: As the device is stationary during presentation, a manual sliding bar has been added to the map to simulate ambulance movement for testing purposes.

Please Note: The Google Maps API free trial credits used for this project expire on January 6, 2026.

title: AI-Powered Institutional Feedback Insights Platform
subtitle: Transforming Raw Feedback Into Real-Time, Actionable Intelligence
description:
This project introduces an AI-Powered Feedback System designed to help institutions move beyond basic survey tools and gain clear, actionable insights from the feedback they collect. Instead of showing only percentages or numeric ratings, the platform automatically interprets responses, detects patterns, evaluates sentiment, and generates human-readable recommendations that directly guide decision-making.

The system allows any organization, university, hotel, hospital, bank, government agency, or NGOs to create intelligent feedback forms in two ways: selecting predefined templates or describing what they want using a simple natural-language prompt. The AI instantly generates a complete form that can be customized, reordered, expanded, and branded to match the institution’s identity. Once published, the system produces a unique QR code and link, allowing seamless sharing across departments and customers.

All responses flow into a centralized database and are processed by an AI analysis engine that extracts key themes, strengths, weaknesses, and improvement priorities. A real-time interactive dashboard presents statistical summaries, trends, and charts, giving managers a clear view of performance at a glance.

By automating form creation, analysis, and reporting, this platform reduces the time institutions spend interpreting feedback and equips leaders with practical recommendations grounded in data. It enhances service delivery, strengthens accountability, and supports evidence-based decision-making across multiple sectors.
This project used Google AI Studio, where all form generation, prompt interpretation, sentiment analysis, recommendation writing, and even major coding steps were built. Without Google AI Studio, features such as dynamic form creation, intelligent question suggestions, pattern detection, and real-time insight generation would not have been possible at this quality or speed.
keywords: feedback, form, system, analysis, time, project, institutions, clear, platform, responses
