title: The Bureaucracy Bulldozer
subtitle: An AI-powered spatial attorney that demolishes red tape by reading the fine print and seeing your physical reality.
description:
The Bureaucracy Bulldozer addresses a critical barrier to housing and economic growth: the inaccessibility of municipal zoning laws. For the average homeowner or small business, navigating thousands of pages of "legalese" and complex spatial requirements is paralyzing. This project transforms that "dark data" into immediate, actionable approvals.

Powered by Gemini 3.0, the application acts as an autonomous Spatial Attorney. Unlike traditional RAG systems that fragment context, we utilize Gemini’s 1M+ token window to ingest entire municipal codes into active memory, ensuring zero hallucinations on legal clauses. Crucially, we leverage Multimodal Reasoning to bridge the gap between text and physical reality. The AI analyzes user-uploaded site photos to visually audit compliance—estimating setbacks, identifying protected trees, and detecting terrain constraints—then cross-references these "visual facts" against the written law.

The result is an instant, legally-grounded "Go/No-Go" verdict and a pre-filled permit application. By automating the intersection of legal analysis and visual inspection, "The Bureaucracy Bulldozer" empowers individuals to build, renovate, and grow, effectively "bulldozing" the red tape that stifles innovation.
keywords: bureaucracy, bulldozer, municipal, spatial, into, gemini, application, legal, visual, addresses

title: MyClassroom

title: Create, Hunt, Earn,Claim From Any Part In The World

title: GREEN AI INTEGERATED VEHICLE RECYCLING PROCESS
subtitle: CarBasket is not just a recycling company - it is a catalyst for change in the Indian automotive landscape with its blend of AI technology
description:
CarBasket is a Bangalore-based automotive solutions company specializing in the end-to-end vehicle recycling industry, committed to driving India’s transition toward a sustainable, circular economy. The company was founded with a mission to make vehicle scrapping more organized, transparent, and environmentally responsible, addressing the growing challenges of automotive waste and pollution in modern cities. By combining innovation, technology, and a customer-centric approach, CarBasket ensures that every stage of the vehicle’s end-of-life process contributes positively to environmental conservation and material recovery.

With a strong presence across multiple Indian states, CarBasket offers a comprehensive range of eco-friendly vehicle disposal and recycling solutions. The company provides hassle-free pickup, authorized dismantling, and certified scrapping services for cars, two-wheelers, and commercial vehicles. Each process is carried out in compliance with the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) guidelines and the Vehicle Scrappage Policy of India, ensuring safety, legal transparency, and traceability. CarBasket also partners with authorized recycling facilities and government-approved centers to ensure that vehicles are dismantled and processed using sustainable methods, minimizing landfill waste and promoting metal reuse.

CarBasket’s core strength lies in its technology integration and operational efficiency. Through advanced data systems, GPS tracking, and digital customer interfaces, the company manages the recycling workflow seamlessly — from customer booking to green certificate issuance. The backend operations are powered by AI-based logistics and optimized route planning, ensuring minimum carbon emissions during transportation. This technology-driven approach not only enhances service efficiency but also aligns with CarBasket’s mission of reducing CO₂ emissions and conserving resources.

Beyond recycling, CarBasket plays a proactive role in

title: evolve-code
subtitle: an ai tutor to help kids and beginners learn coding
description:
Date: 2025-05-20
Author: ANTHONY LOPEZ/GOOGLE GEMINI 3

EvolveCode is designed to address the "Cliff Problem" in coding education: the steep drop-off when students move from block-based games to syntax-based coding. Our architecture separates the Task Model (what the user needs to do) from the Scaffolding Model (how we help them do it).

We introduced the LevelConfig type to formalize the Zone of Proximal Development (ZPD).

The Tutor Logic is kept pure and deterministic to ensure consistency.

Implemented "Instant Feedback Loop" for Kids Stage.

Tutor: "Go to the flower!"
  User: [Move] [Move]
  (Bee moves, stops short)
  User: [Move]
  (Bee moves, hits flower)
  Tutor: "Great job!"
keywords: move, user, tutor, coding, based, model, flower, moves, date, author

title: Nirthya Vasthra: AI-Powered Tradition by Shanthi Tailors
subtitle: Revitalizing 1960s craftsmanship with Gemini 3: An AI assistant for bespoke Indian classical dance costumes.
description:
Indian classical dance costumes (Bharatanatyam, Kuchipudi) require precise tailoring and strict adherence to aesthetic traditions. For decades, Shanthi Tailors (est. 1967) has served dancers manually. However, the traditional process is time-consuming: dancers struggle to visualize color combinations, communicate complex customization needs remotely, and ensure precise measurements without visiting the shop in Chennai. We needed a way to bring this 57-year-old legacy into the digital age without losing its personal touch.

The Solution: Nirthya Vasthra
Nirthya Vasthra ("Dance Attire") is an AI-powered web application that acts as a digital tailor’s assistant. It leverages Gemini 3 Pro to bridge the gap between traditional craftsmanship and modern convenience.

Key Features:

Intelligent Costume Visualization: Users can describe their desired look (e.g., "A traditional Bharatanatyam saree in mango yellow with a contrasting pink border and annapakshi motifs"), and the app visualizes the concept.

Smart Sizing Guide: The AI analyzes user-inputted measurements to flag potential errors (e.g., if a hip measurement seems disproportionate to the waist for a specific dance style), reducing fit issues.

Cultural Context Awareness: Powered by Gemini's deep knowledge, the assistant can recommend historically accurate accessories and jewelry to match specific dance items (Margam).

How I Built It (Vibe Coding with Gemini)
I built this application using Google AI Studio and the Gemini 3 model.

Vibe Coding: I used the "Build" feature in AI Studio to generate the frontend and backend logic. I prompted Gemini 3 to "Create a modern, culturally rich web interface for a dance costume shop that accepts complex user measurements and design prompts."

Multimodal Capabilities: I integrated Gemini to process text descriptions of fabrics and styles, converting them into structured order details that our tailors can execute.

Deployment: The code was iterated upon within AI Studio and deploy
keywords: gemini, dance, tailors, dancers, traditional, measurements, without, digital, studio, classical

title: A2A World | Galactic Storybook
subtitle: MVP of a novel methodology for encoding human heritage onto the planetary surface, preserving our shared human story for future generations.
description:
The Galactic Storybook is a "cockpit of culture" designed for long-duration spaceflight. It serves as a psychological anchor for astronauts, combating the "Overview Effect" detachment and sensory monotony of deep space travel.

By overlaying ancient mythological narratives onto high-resolution Earth observation data, we transform the planet into a living library. This tool allows future Martians to connect with their heritage, ensuring the stories of Earth are preserved not just in text, but in the very geography of the home world.

In accordance with Competition Rule 2.5.a, this entire Submission (code, curated data, and methodology) is licensed under CC BY 4.0.

We utilize a custom dataset (constants.ts) manually curated to map specific Earth coordinates to corresponding mythological narratives ("As Above, So Below").

We employ Gemini 3 Pro via the Google GenAI SDK to act as a "Keeper of Heritage," dynamically generating oral-tradition style retellings based on the static coordinate data.

We utilize Gemini 3 Pro Image to generate high-fidelity, culturally accurate artistic representations of the myths, functioning as a "Cosmic Iconographer."

The curated "Heaven on Earth" database included in this submission is a sample of the original external data created by the team and is hereby made publicly available under CC BY 4.0 for use by all.

Tech Stack:

Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS (Academic Theme)
AI Core: Google Gemini 3 Pro (Narrative Engine), Gemini 3 Pro Image (Iconography Engine)
Geospatial: Google Maps Embed API, Custom "Chronoscope" Dual-Layer Rendering
Audio: Web Speech API for auto-narration
keywords: earth, data, gemini, curated, google, mythological, narratives, high, heritage, submission

title: MyGreenMirror
subtitle: Gamifying Personal Carbon Footprint Tracking with Multimodal AI
description:
MyGreenMirror is a web application that helps individuals understand environmental cost of their daily choices. It acts as a personal carbon footprint analyzer, using Google's Gemini models to process multimodal inputs and provide scientific estimates of carbon emissions (CO₂e).

Built in <48 hours entirely with Gemini 3 Pro vibe-coding → one prompt → iterative refinement → one-click Cloud run deploy.

Multimodal Carbon Analysis: I used gemini-3-pro-preview to process user uploads (Images, Video, Audio). The model identifies specific objects (e.g., plastic types), analyzes complex activities (e.g., estimating emissions from a bus ride vs. car), and outputs structured JSON data containing carbon scores (g CO₂e) and bounding box coordinates for AR overlays.
Impact Visualization: To make the data resonate emotionally, I utilized gemini-2.5-flash-image to generate a "3D Isometric Diorama". Low-carbon activities generate lush, green islands; high-carbon ones generate industrial, smoggy landscapes.

Live demo: [https://mygreenmirror-989792641782.us-west1.run.app/]

AI Studio Link: [https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1xq8OT_qj_7fc9B07HsIDkA4is_06kdCD?fullscreenApplet=true]

Video walkthrough: [https://www.loom.com/share/ed48b2bdd1f7428585959ae2e1a9f2ee]

Understanding one's individual contribution to climate change is the first step toward mitigation. MyGreenMirror solves common barriers to eco-tracking:

title: AI-Driven DevOps Workflow and Automation
subtitle: Intelligent CI/CD: Leveraging AI/ML for Automated, Proactive, and Optimized DevOps Workflows
description:
Project Title:Ai driven devops workflow and automation

The complexity of modern software delivery demands a more adaptive and intelligent approach than traditional DevOps methodologies can provide. 
This project, Intelligent CI/CD, the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) into every phase of the DevOps lifecycle—from planning and development to deployment and monitoring.

Key Focus Areas & Innvations:
AI-Powered Code Review and Quality:Implementing an ML model trained on historical codebases and defect reports to predict potential bugs and security vulnerabilities before they enter the build pipeline. This drastically reduces technical debt and improves code quality.
Intelligent Test Automation:Using AI to dynamically optimize test suite execution, prioritizing tests based on the nature and scope of code changes, leading to faster feedback cycles.
-Predictive Deployment and Resource Scaling:Developing ML models that analyze real-time production metrics (traffic, latency, resource utilization) to automatically predict optimal deployment windows and proactively scale infrastructure to handle anticipated load changes, minimizing downtime and costs.
AIOps for Proactive Incident Management:Building an AIOps layer that uses pattern recognition across logs, metrics, and traces to detect anomalies and root causes in real-time. The system automatically triggers remediation actions (e.g., rollback, restart) or provides highly actionable insights to SRE teams, moving from reactive troubleshooting to proactive issue resolution.This project showcases a complete paradigm shift, transforming the traditional, manual-intensive DevOps pipeline into an autonomous, self-healing, and continuously optimizing system.

🎯 Key Features
      Predictive Code Analysis: 
     ML model identifies common bugs during pre-commit checks.Dynamic Test Selection: Reduces CI build time by up to 1-2 minutes for small change and for big change it should be 3-5 minutes by
keywords: devops, deployment, code, project, intelligent, test, time, minutes, automation, traditional

title: The Problem: The "Black Box" of Modern Bureaucracy.
subtitle: The "Daily Frustration" Solver
description:
Track 1: The "Daily Frustration" Solver
The Problem: The "Black Box" of Modern Bureaucracy.
Dealing with insurance claims, visa applications, tax audits, or disputing a bill is a nightmare. It involves distinct modalities: reading dense PDFs, understanding visual evidence, sitting on hold (audio), and navigating complex logic trees.
The App Idea: "Advocate AI"
A fully autonomous agent that fights your administrative battles for you.
How Gemini 3 Pro Solves It:
Multimodal Ingestion: You dump a photo of a letter, a PDF of a bill, and a voice memo of your frustration into the app. Gemini 3 Pro understands the full context instantly.
Agentic Voice Capabilities: The app literally calls customer service for you. It navigates the IVR (press 1 for…), waits on hold, and speaks to the representative using your details, transcribing the result in real-time.
Vibe Coding Implementation: You don't write scripts for the phone call. You code the persona: "Be polite but firm; do not accept a store credit, only a refund."

Track 2: The "Global Challenge" Solver
The Problem: The Educational "Flow" Gap.
Global education is stuck in a "one-size-fits-all" model. Students lose interest when they hit a roadblock they can't solve, or they get bored when the pace is too slow. We lack a tutor that can read emotional and cognitive states in real-time.
The App Idea: "Synapse – The Empathic Tutor"
An education platform that watches you learn and adapts the curriculum second-by-second based on your confusion, excitement, or fatigue.
How Gemini 3 Pro Solves It:
Ultra-Low Latency Video Analysis: The AI uses the webcam to read micro-expressions (furrowed brows, distracted eyes) and screen interaction (hesitant mouse movement).
Dynamic Content Generation: If you don't understand a physics concept, it doesn't just repeat the text. It instantly generates a visual metaphor, a mini-game, or a code snippet based on what it knows you already like (e.g., "Explain Quantum Entanglement using Minecraft metapho

title: VISIONBRIDGE
subtitle: Real-Time Environment Narrator for Blind/Low-Vision Users
description:
VisionBridge: See the World Through AI

For 285 million visually impaired people worldwide, everyday tasks like crossing a street, reading a menu, or recognizing a friend's face remain daily challenges. VisionBridge changes that.

Built with Gemini 3 Pro's advanced multimodal capabilities, VisionBridge transforms any smartphone into an intelligent visual assistant that describes the world in real-time through natural conversation.

How It Works:

Users simply point their camera and choose from four specialized modes:

Why Gemini 3 Makes This Possible:

VisionBridge leverages Gemini 3's native multimodality to process live video with unprecedented accuracy. Its advanced spatial reasoning understands not just what objects are, but where they are relative to the user. The model's natural language capabilities deliver descriptions that feel conversational, not robotic.

Real Impact:

Unlike existing apps that simply label objects, VisionBridge understands context. It knows the difference between "there's a chair" and "there's an empty seat next to your friend who's waving at you."

Independence shouldn't depend on sight. VisionBridge proves that with the right AI, everyone can navigate the world confidently.

title: EarlySteps – AI-Powered Early Disability Detection & Developmental Screening Ass
subtitle: Empowering parents with early insights for healthier child development.
description:
Early Steps is an AI-powered digital assistant designed to help parents identify early signs of developmental delays in children aged 0–6 years. Many children with autism, ADHD, speech delays, or motor challenges are not identified until much later missing the window where early intervention is most effective. Early Steps offers a compassionate, accessible way for parents to understand their child’s behaviors sooner.

Parents enter simple observations about their child, choose a developmental domain (Speech, Social, Movement, Attention, etc.), and Early Steps uses the advanced reasoning model to compare these behaviors with established childhood developmental milestones. The system produces a clear, structured report that includes:

Insight Summary: A friendly explanation of what the behaviors may indicate

Flagged Indicators: Signs that may need closer monitoring

Home Activities: Simple, age-appropriate exercises parents can try immediately

Professional Guidance: When to consult a specialist and what questions to ask

The interface is designed with a calming palette of soft teal, slate blue, and warm sand, providing emotional reassurance for parents who may already feel anxious about their child’s development.

Built using React + Tailwind CSS, Early Steps ensures a clean, responsive experience across devices. All AI processing uses structured JSON for consistent rendering and future integrations.

Early Steps does not diagnose—it guides. By empowering families with early clarity, it supports healthier developmental outcomes and promotes equitable access to early childhood support, especially in low-resource communities.
keywords: early, steps, parents, developmental, their, child, behaviors, designed, signs, delays

title: eZ-Bill AI-powered invoicing and billing application
subtitle: eZ-Bill — the smart, AI-powered invoicing and billing application built for freelancers and small businesses.
description:
Administrative overhead remains a significant constraint for freelancers and small business owners, who must balance client communication, invoicing, payment tracking, and financial reporting alongside their core services. Existing invoicing solutions are often functional but lack the intelligence and natural interaction required to meaningfully reduce this burden.

eZ-Bill is a next-generation invoicing and billing application designed to address this gap. Rather than serving solely as a document-generation tool, eZ-Bill functions as an intelligent financial assistant powered by Google’s Gemini AI models. By embedding Large Language Models (LLMs) directly into the billing workflow, the platform replaces manual data entry with natural text and voice interactions. Users can manage clients, generate invoices, track payments, and send reminders through conversational commands.

Built using a modern technology stack—React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS—and leveraging the Gemini API (gemini-3-pro-preview for complex reasoning and gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview for low-latency voice interaction), eZ-Bill demonstrates the practical application of AI-driven interfaces in small business software.

eZ-Bill provides end-to-end support for the billing lifecycle through a cohesive set of features.

A dedicated client registry allows users to create, update, and maintain client profiles, ensuring consistent and efficient invoice generation.

The central innovation of eZ-Bill is its AI Assistant, which unifies all application capabilities within a conversational interface. Unlike a conventional chatbot, the assistant operates as an agent with direct access to application data through defined function calls.

The application is implemented as a React-based Single Page Application (SPA) using TypeScript. Global application state is managed centrally and persisted via localStorage for demonstration purposes, with a design that supports future migration to a full backend (e.g.,

title: Vut'Elimu
subtitle: Vut'Elimu leverages Gemini 3 to transform voice, signs, and slates into an inclusive Tug-of-War for African schools & children.
description:
Education / Accessibility

Vut'Elimu (Swahili for "Pull Education/Knowledge") transforms the African classroom into an inclusive, digital arena. It is a real-time, multiplayer "Tug-of-War" game where students compete by answering curriculum questions to pull a digital rope toward victory. 
How we built it: We leveraged Gemini 3 Pro’s native multimodality to create an adaptive engine that bridges the physical and digital worlds. Built in AI Studio with React and Firebase for real-time synchronization, the app uses Gemini to analyze diverse inputs based on the child's needs:

Why it matters: In many African schools, a lack of resources and a rigid curriculum often exclude children with disabilities. Vut'Elimu solves this by turning "analog" inputs (chalkboards, voice, signs) into game controllers. It proves that technology doesn't require expensive hardware to be effective—it just requires intelligence. 
By gamifying inclusion, we ensure that whether a child writes, speaks, or signs, their contribution powers the team's success. Vut'Elimu isn't just a game; it is a proof-of-concept for a classroom where no child is left behind.

Across the world, agriculture faces a massive challenge:

Farmers struggle with climate change, unpredictable rainfall, and unstable markets.

Consumers suffer from rising food prices and lack of access to fresh, safe produce.

Developing regions lack data-driven tools to guide crop selection and farm planning.

title: Aura wellness
subtitle: AURA WELLNESS is an advanced AI-powered mental wellness platform that functions as a Cognitive Digital Twin
description:
AURA WELLNESS

AURA WELLNESS is an AI-driven mental health and burnout-prediction system designed for healthcare professionals.
Our goal is to address the rising burnout crisis among doctors, nurses, and paramedics by building a model that can understand emotional patterns, predict burnout risk, and deliver personalized wellness interventions using multimodal intelligence.

🔹 What We Built

We developed a Cognitive Digital Twin, an AI profile that learns from users’ stress logs, sleep history, work patterns, and physiological signals. This twin analyzes behavioral trends and predicts future stress trajectories, helping identify early warning signs of burnout.

At the core is a simulated Explainable AI burnout classifier that combines work hours, sleep quality, heart rate variability, and shift timing to calculate a Burnout Risk Score. The model provides transparent factor-level explanations so users understand why their risk is rising.

Alongside prediction, we integrated several multimodal features to support the emotional and professional needs of healthcare workers:

Symptom Analyzer (Vision Model) for basic image-based medical pattern interpretation

Scan & Translate for clinical documents

Calm Space Generator for AI-generated soothing imagery

Aura Buddy, a multilingual empathetic assistant

Cognitive reframing and AI-generated bedtime stories

The project runs on a React + TypeScript frontend and uses Google Gemini (Flash, Pro, TTS, and Image) for reasoning, generation, and multimodal tasks.

🔹 Why This Matters

Healthcare workers face the highest rates of chronic stress, sleep disruption, and late detection of burnout. Our system provides:

Early burnout forecasting

Explainable reasoning behind mental-health predictions

Emotionally adaptive AI interactions

Multimodal tools that assist both personal wellness and clinical workflow

This makes AURA WELLNESS not just a wellness app, but a predictive, proactive, AI-powered emotional support system.

🔹 Impact
keywords: burnout, wellness, aura, multimodal, emotional, stress, mental, health, system, healthcare

title: Jamont Vibe -The AI Curriculum Companion
subtitle: Upload a textbook page—get instant lessons, summaries, and adaptive quizzes powered by Gemini 3.
description:
Jamont Vibe is a multimodal AI learning companion built with Gemini 3 that transforms any textbook page or curriculum material into a complete, personalized learning session.
My goal was to create a simple tool that gives students instant understanding—especially in places where quality learning resources are limited.

With Jamont Vibe, a learner begins by uploading a photo or screenshot of a textbook page. Gemini 3 Pro reads the image, extracts the concepts, identifies the topic, and generates a tightly structured learning breakdown. The system produces:

A clear explanation of the topic

A simplified explanation for early learners

Step-by-step worked examples

A set of practice problems

Auto-graded mastery questions

A summarized study note (NotebookLM style)

Every output is generated dynamically using Gemini’s multimodal understanding and reasoning. The app works entirely in AI Studio using a carefully designed prompt pipeline: (1) OCR + concept extraction, (2) topic tagging, (3) structured learning output, (4) quiz generation and grading. No external tools or code were required-only Gemini and a set of reusable prompt modules.

The project is designed for real-world impact. Many students across Africa, including here in Kenya, rely heavily on textbooks and have limited access to personalized support. Jamont Vibe gives every learner an instant, adaptive tutor that understands their curriculum directly from the materials they already use.

This prototype is the foundation of a larger vision: building an accessible, curriculum-aware AI learning platform for global education. With Gemini 3’s multimodal abilities, this is now possible inside a single lightweight workflow.
keywords: learning, gemini, jamont, vibe, multimodal, curriculum, topic, textbook, page, personalized

title: MetaboLens AI: The Live Metabolic Digital Twin
subtitle: See exactly what food does to your organs—before you take the first bite.
description:
MetaboLens AI is a predictive Metabolic Digital Twin that makes invisible biological processes visible.  
While traditional health apps passively track what you ate in the past, MetaboLens uses Gemini 3 Pro to simulate what food will do to your body before you eat it.

Leveraging Gemini’s advanced reasoning and multimodal capabilities, users can scan meals, nutrition labels, or even raw DNA text. The app instantly generates a biological simulation—visualizing predicted glucose spikes, insulin load, organ stress, and cognitive performance (brain fog risk) over the next 8 hours.

The What-If Lab 
Simulates physiological scenarios, such as:  
“How does this pizza affect me if I’m sleep-deprived vs. post-workout?”

Genetic Integration 
Parses raw genetic data (e.g., FTO, APOE variants) to hyper-personalize the metabolic model.

Live Bio-Coach 
Uses the Gemini 2.5 Live API for real-time, low-latency voice coaching.

Smart Chef 
“Bio-hacks” recipes from fridge photos to minimize inflammation.

MetaboLens is a nutrition and metabolic modeling app that shifts healthcare from reactive monitoring to proactive intervention, democratizing precision nutrition to help users optimize metabolic resilience, longevity, and everyday performance.
keywords: metabolic, metabolens, what, gemini, nutrition, biological, uses, users, performance, genetic

title: Vox Slides
subtitle: Turn your voice into a slide deck. Record a pitch, lecture, or meeting. We'll transcribe it, summarize it, and generate a beautiful, exporta
description:
Vox-Slides is an AI-powered Voice-to-Presentation generator that transforms spoken ideas into beautifully designed slide decks within seconds.
Users simply record or upload audio, choose a visual theme, and Vox-Slides automatically creates structured slides with clean titles, concise bullets, speaker notes, and optional AI-generated images.

Powered by Google Gemini 3 Pro, Vox-Slides provides accurate transcription, intelligent content summarization, and on-the-fly visual enhancement — all inside a smooth, React + TypeScript interface with live slide preview and instant export (PPTX & PDF).

Designed for creators, educators, professionals, and students, Vox-Slides eliminates the time-consuming process of designing presentations and lets users focus purely on their ideas. Speak → Preview → Download. Your slides, reimagined by AI.

Vox-Slides turns your voice into a ready-to-share presentation.
Talk for a minute… and watch AI transform your speech into an organized, theme-styled slide deck with visuals — like magic for presentations.

With real-time preview, smart slide structuring, automatic bullet generation, customizable themes, and AI-generated graphics, Vox-Slides becomes the fastest way to create pitch decks, lectures, and reports.

Powered by Gemini 3 Pro and built with React + TypeScript, Vox-Slides is designed to impress with visual polish, blazing-fast generation, and a demo that feels like futuristic productivity.
You speak. It builds. You present.

Vox-Slides is an AI-driven Voice-to-Presentation tool that converts recorded or uploaded speech into professional slide decks with structured content, clean themes, and optional AI-generated images. Built with React + TypeScript and powered by Google Gemini 3 Pro, it offers live slide previews, multiple themes, and one-click export to PPTX/PDF. Vox-Slides simplifies presentation creation — speak your ideas, and get beautiful slides instantly.

title: ClassLens: Local-Language Classroom Co-Teacher
subtitle: ClassLens turns photos of classroom materials into grade-level English, Sinhala, Tamil explanations and practice questions using Gemini.
description:
ClassLens is a Gemini-powered co-teacher that turns whatever a teacher already uses blackboard notes, textbook pages, or worksheets into instant, local-language learning materials for students.

A teacher simply snaps a photo in the classroom. Using Gemini 3’s native multimodality, ClassLens reads the image, identifies the key concept, and generates:

We built ClassLens in Google AI Studio, connecting a lightweight web frontend to a Gemini 3 multimodal endpoint. The app sends the captured image plus metadata (grade, subject, target language) to Gemini, which returns structured JSON that we render as editable lesson content.

Demo available in the AI Studio app: https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1gC94E-iaSGToVf5gTz1mBlK8Yfi2nDRs?fullscreenApplet=true

Video Demo: https://youtu.be/QP0XwqsONZU

ClassLens focuses on high-impact, low-friction change: it doesn’t ask teachers to adopt new curricula only to take a photo of what they already use. In low-resource classrooms where teachers are overworked and students struggle with English-only materials, ClassLens helps bridge the gap between global textbooks and local understanding, freeing teachers to spend more time actually teaching and supporting their students.

title: Samaveshi: The Universal Learning Bridge

description:
Breaking Every Barrier to Learning

Education should be a right, not a privilege determined by language, ability, or geography. Yet 300 million students across India face invisible walls— diagrams inaccessible to blind learners, lectures lost on deaf students, complex concepts disconnected from their lived reality.

Samaveshi (meaning Inclusive in Sanskrit and Hindi) shatters these barriers with one elegant solution: photograph any educational content, receive it transformed for your needs.

The Innovation:
Leveraging Gemini 3 Pro's native multimodality, Samaveshi performs sophisticated cross-modal translation that was impossible before. A single uploaded image triggers simultaneous visual analysis, contextual reasoning, and cultural adaptation. The same physics diagram becomes a spatially-aware audio description for visually impaired students, a Telugu explanation using local pickle-making analogies, simplified text for dyslexic readers, and parent-friendly notes—all from one input.

See Sound: Lecture transcripts with emotional context and visual cues
Easy Read: Simplified text with regional analogies and adjustable formatting

A rural student in Karnataka photographs an English textbook and learns photosynthesis through rice paddy farming. A blind student accesses complex diagrams. title: LifeStream OS: The "Reliability Sandwich" for Blind Navigation
subtitle: Combining reflex-speed awareness with deep-reasoning safety using Gemini 3 Pro.
description:
Tracks: Accessibility, Technology

For the 2.2 billion people with visual impairments, AI-assisted navigation has historically been a dangerous trade-off between speed and safety.

In accessibility, latency isn't just an inconvenience; it's a physical hazard. A user cannot pause their walk to wait for an API response. They need the reflexes of a guide dog combined with the reasoning of a human assistant.

LifeStream OS is a multimodal navigation system that solves this trade-off using a novel architecture I call the "Reliability Sandwich." It creates a cognitive prosthetic that operates at two speeds simultaneously:

This project creates a seamless fusion of Gemini's multimodal capabilities:

I utilized Gemini 3 Pro specifically for its deep reasoning capabilities in the Guardian Layer. Standard object detectors identify objects; Gemini 3 Pro understands situations.

Example: A simple model sees "a wet floor sign." Gemini 3 Pro infers "Slip hazard ahead, path blocked, reroute left."

The Reflex Layer relies on the low-latency WebSocket API. I engineered a robust audio/video streaming pipeline that sends PCM audio and Base64 image frames simultaneously, handling connection state management (reconnecting on drops) to ensure the user is never left "blind" due to a network glitch.

LifeStream OS demonstrates that accessibility tools don't have to be limited to basic OCR or slow Q&A. By leveraging the specific strengths of different Gemini models—the raw speed of Flash and the deep reasoning of Pro—we can build assistive technology that is both safe and fluid.

This architecture essentially gives a visually impaired user a "super-sight": the ability to walk confidently with reflex-speed feedback, while a super-intelligence watches their back for dangers they didn't even know were there.
keywords: gemini, accessibility, speed, user, reasoning, technology, navigation, trade, latency, hazard

title: LingoVision: Bridging Language Learning with Real Life
subtitle: Visual language learning that connects your world to words - making language education accessible and contextual for learners everywhere.
description:
LingoVision is an AI-powered visual language learning application that transforms everyday surroundings into personalized language lessons. By simply uploading or capturing a photo of any object, scene, or moment from daily life, learners receive instant, contextual language content including natural captions, essential vocabulary, pronunciation guides, and interactive quizzes - all powered by Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash with multimodal vision and text-to-speech capabilities.

Live App: View on AI Studio

Many people experienced firsthand what we call Mute English - years of studying vocabulary lists, grammar rules, and textbook dialogues about airplanes, renewable energy, and global economics, yet struggling to describe the simple things around me: the street food vendor's steaming baozi, the shared bicycle on the corner, or the potted plants on my balcony.

Across the developing world, language education often feels abstract and detached from daily reality. Students in rural India, Indonesia, or Latin America memorize words for "helicopter" and "solar panel" from standardized curricula, but don't know how to talk about the clothes they wear, the meals they eat, or the neighborhoods they live in.

The gap is clear:

LingoVision turns this paradigm upside down by making your real life the curriculum.

A student in rural Kenya can now learn English by photographing the matatu (minibus) they take to school, the ugali their mother cooks, or the acacia tree outside their home. Language becomes a tool for describing their reality, not someone else's.

Traditional language apps teach the same vocabulary to everyone. LingoVision adapts to your environment:

Instead of learning generic vocabulary divorced from context, students learn to describe their culture, food, traditions, and daily routines in another language - preserving identity while building bridges.

For students who grew up with "mute English," hearing and practicing pronunciation of words that matter to their li

title: The Feynman Mirror
subtitle: An introvert-friendly AI that builds confidence by letting you teach it.
description:
The Problem: Traditional education penalizes anxiety. Brilliant students often fail oral exams not because they lack knowledge, but because they lack "performance confidence." We currently measure loudness, not logic.

The Solution: Inspired by The Feynman Technique ("If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it"), this app flips the classroom. Instead of the AI lecturing you, you teach the AI.

How It Works: Built on Gemini 3 Pro, the app acts as a "Mirror" for your thoughts:

Multimodal Reasoning: It watches for rote memorization (reading scripts) vs. genuine understanding, using video to detect eye-tracking and audio for tone.

Anxiety Filtering: It explicitly ignores stuttering or lack of eye contact. Instead, it builds a real-time "Clarity Graph" based purely on the semantic coverage of your explanation.

Active Recall: If you get stuck, it doesn't give answers; it gives Socratic hints, forcing you to bridge the gap yourself.

Universal Access: It auto-detects and speaks 40+ languages, allowing students to learn in their mother tongue.

The Impact: By separating anxiety from aptitude, The Feynman Mirror unlocks the potential of the "quiet genius." It transforms AI from a passive chatbot into an empathetic, active learning partner.
keywords: anxiety, lack, students, because, feynman, instead, mirror, your, active, problem

KalaMitra is a digital marketplace system that enables artisans to create, manage, and sell both physical and digital cultural products using AI-assisted tools. Automated backend processes manage auctions, content updates, user activity cleanup, and personalization using vector embeddings. Multilingual support, real-time notifications, and AI-shopping assistants further enhance accessibility and usability for both artisans and buyers.
The system uniquely enables users with limited physical resources to earn through virtual craft creation and supports NGOs and cultural bodies by facilitating collaborations, material donations, and artisan discovery.

title: Deskscape: From Chaos to Curation
subtitle: Deskscape uses Gemini 3's multimodal AI to bridge the gap between your chaotic reality and dream workspace with vision-based reasoning.
description:
▶ Deskscape: Your AI Workspace Architect
"From Chaos to Curation." Deskscape is not just a cleaning tool; it is a multimodal AI consultant that leverages Gemini 3’s advanced reasoning to bridge the gap between your chaotic reality and your dream workspace.

▶ Inspiration
We often rationalize our messy desks, thinking, "Maybe this chaos just suits my creative process." But do you remember the spark you felt when you first bought that desk? The joy of setting it up perfectly? That memory proves that the current chaos isn't a style—it's complacency.

Deskscape was born from this realization. We wanted to recapture that "Day 1" feeling. Guided by timeless wisdom like "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication" and "The objective of cleaning is to feel happiness," we realized that organization isn't just a chore—it's a way to reclaim our original mindset. We asked: "What if AI could help us navigate back to that clarity? What if it could bridge the gap between our messy reality and the curated sanctuary we truly desire?"

▶ What it does
Deskscape creates a personalized feedback loop for your environment using three core pillars:

Multimodal Context Injection (Vision + Voice) Deskscape uses Gemini 3 to process visual and audio inputs simultaneously. It doesn't just see a messy desk; it listens. When a user captures their desk and says, "I need a dual monitor setup for coding, but keep the books," Gemini synthesizes the visual data with the user's intent to generate a context-aware action plan.

Target-Driven Gap Analysis We moved beyond static analysis. With the "Set Goal" feature, users can select an aspirational "Wannabe Desk." Gemini 3 then performs a Gap Analysis, comparing the user's current setup (As-Is) with the target image (To-Be), providing specific steps to bridge the aesthetic and functional gap.

Gamified Growth & Wellness To drive retention, Deskscape gamifies the process with the "My Journey" tracker and achievement badges (e.g., "7-Day Streak," "Perfection

title: AI Dev Academy
subtitle: AI Dev Academy turns your custom app ideas into a personalized coding course, where AI architects the plan but you write the code.
description:
Project Name: AI Dev Academy

The Concept: Reverse Vibe Coding

"Vibe Coding" implies letting AI write the software while you relax. We built the opposite. AI Dev Academy is the "Anti-Autopilot" for learners.

Inspiration:

Inspired by teaching Computational Thinking in Python, this project recognizes that while the method may slow deep coding dives, it is foundational and critical for success. We built an architecture that prioritizes this foundational logic over speed.

How It Works:

We orchestrated a Multi-Agent pipeline to mimic a strict Technical Lead that forces you to think:

The Architect (Gemini 2.5 Flash): Interviews you about your app idea, then instantly synthesizes a "Project Manifest" containing a custom syllabus and hidden unit tests.

The Tutor: A Socratic agent that uses the manifest to guide you. It knows the solution but refuses to output code, forcing you to type and learn.

The Reviewer (Gemini 3 Pro): Analyzes your final code for logic and style, grading you like a Senior Dev.

The Tech:

We focused on optimizing latency and reasoning by chaining Gemini 2.5 Flash for the interactive stages and Gemini 3 Pro for deep analysis. We also deployed an experimental client-side Python sandbox (Pyodide) to explore running AI-generated tests directly in the user's browser.
keywords: gemini, project, coding, academy, vibe, while, built, python, deep, foundational

title: SignSpeak AI
subtitle: AI-powered sign-to-speech and speech-to-sign translation for everyone, everywhere.
description:
Across the world, more than 70 million Deaf and hard-of-hearing individuals rely on sign languages as their primary mode of communication. Yet, despite being rich, expressive, and fully-fledged languages, sign languages remain inaccessible to most hearing people. This creates communication gaps in essential places such as hospitals, schools, workplaces, government offices, customer service, and everyday interactions. Interpreters are often unavailable, too expensive, or not trained in specific sign languages. Even in countries with strong accessibility laws, interpreters cannot be present 24/7.

At the same time, millions of people want to learn sign language—teachers, nurses, customer support agents, emergency responders, and family members. But traditional sign language learning relies heavily on human instructors, one-way video tutorials, or static images that don’t show expressive movement, transitions, or context.

SignSpeak AI solves these problems with a real-time, multimodal AI interpreter powered by Gemini 3 Pro. It enables fluid, two-way communication between Deaf and hearing individuals by translating sign language into speech/text and generating AI-driven animated sign demonstrations from spoken or typed input. It also works as an interactive tutor, helping people learn sign language through explanations, gesture breakdowns, and visual animations.

What We Built

SignSpeak AI is an AI-powered sign language translation and learning system built in Gemini 3 Pro on AI Studio, using its multimodal understanding and real-time conversation features. Unlike simple sign-learning apps or dictionary-style tools, SignSpeak AI focuses on live, natural, conversational communication.

Core Idea

The platform takes sign-language input (video from camera) and turns it into real-time speech or text, and also takes speech or text and converts it into animated, human-like sign gestures. This creates a powerful communication loop that works instantly and naturally.

SignSpe
keywords: sign, language, signspeak, communication, deaf, gemini, hearing, time, languages, real

The solution demonstrates deep multimodal reasoning by combining vision understanding, concept extraction, content reorganization, pedagogical explanation, and assessment generation in a single workflow. This showcases the powerful capabilities of Gemini 3 Pro in real educational scenarios.

Smart Board Mentor is especially impactful for students with limited access to coaching or well-organized study material. "Makanai (meaning 'staff meal' or 'family meal' in Japanese) is an intelligent mobile application that turns your leftover ingredients into delicious, healthy recipes instantly. It doesn't just give you a recipe; it acts as a personal nutritionist, visualizing the health impact of every meal."

How I Used Gemini (The "Vibe Code" Story):

"I used Google AI Studio and Gemini 3 Pro to 'Vibe Code' the brain of my application.

Generative Chef: I iterated on prompts in AI Studio to create an AI that doesn't just list instructions but understands cuisine types and cooking times based on simple ingredient lists.

Nutrition Engine: The killer feature is the 'Nutrition Analysis.' I used Gemini to parse unstructured recipe data into structured JSON, calculating macros (Protein, Fat, Carbs) and micros (Vitamins, Minerals) which are then rendered as beautiful visual progress bars.

This Vibe Coding process allowed me to rapidly prototype the logic in the browser before deploying it to my native Android application built with Kotlin and Firebase."

title: TherapyTune
subtitle: TherapyTune designs music journeys using the ISO Principle — meeting you where you are.
description:
TherapyTune: Music That Meets You Where You Are

ISO Principle-based emotional journey design using multimodal AI

Health

https://youtu.be/sWofTMwks3A?si=UsjGSRO14HSOaB8C

https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1xePUbo9RknmdSYUmM2qhBmRjF_sr5u-m?fullscreenApplet=true

The Problem

When you're feeling down, everyone says "listen to happy music." But research shows this approach often backfires — your brain resists the sudden emotional jump, making you feel worse.

The Solution

TherapyTune applies the ISO Principle from music therapy: meet the listener where they are, then gradually guide them toward balance. Instead of recommending a single song, it designs a 5-song emotional journey.

How It Works

Users adjust five psychological axes (Energy, Reality, Temporal, Repetition, Hedonic) using sliders, visualized in real-time on a radar chart. They can optionally add voice recordings or text for AI-assisted refinement. After selecting preferred genres, Gemini generates a personalized playlist where each song shifts emotional coordinates by maximum 0.2 — ensuring gradual, non-jarring transitions.

Key Features

Why It Matters

Music's psychological effects are scientifically proven. Even perceived alignment ("this feels right for me") creates comfort. TherapyTune transforms vague emotional states into structured journeys, making self-understanding accessible.

Gemini 3 Pro Usage

TherapyTune sits at the intersection of psychology, interaction design, and music — a tool for self-understanding disguised as a playlist generator.

title: Gmini Triage AI
subtitle: TriageAlert AI is a voice-enabled medical triage simulator that leverages Google's Gemini Live API for real-time patient interviews and webc
description:
Conversational AI Nurse: The app connects to Google's Gemini Live API (specifically gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview). It acts as a persona named "ER-TriageGPT" to conduct a medical interview using a strict protocol (Chief Complaint -> Safety Check -> OPQRST -> Medical History).
Real-Time Voice Interaction: Users speak naturally to the app, and it responds with low-latency audio. It supports interruptions (if the user speaks while the AI is talking, the AI stops).
Contactless Vitals Monitoring (rPPG): This is the most advanced technical feature. It uses Remote Photoplethysmography.
It captures the video feed from the user's webcam.
It analyzes the green light intensity changes on the user's face (which correlates with blood pulse volume).
It calculates the Heart Rate (BPM) locally in the browser and feeds this data to the AI agent.
Report Generation: Once the interview is complete, the AI generates a structured Triage Report containing:
Patient demographics & history.
Red flags (critical symptoms).
ICD-10 Codes (medical billing/classification codes).
Triage Priority (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green).

title: MerckLens: AI-Powered Multimodal Medical Triage
subtitle: Bridging the Gap Between Symptom Onset and Professional Care Using Gemini 3 Pro's Native Multimodality
description:
MerckLens transforms emergency medical triage by harnessing Gemini 3 Pro's advanced reasoning and native multimodal capabilities. When patients face critical decisions—self-care, urgent care, or ER—MerckLens provides instant, evidence-based guidance grounded in authoritative medical sources.

The Problem: Traditional symptom checkers rely on text-only input, missing vital diagnostic clues in images, voice patterns, and movement. This causes delayed care and ER overcrowding, costing billions annually while leaving billions of people globally without medical access.

Our Innovation: MerckLens analyzes what patients show (rash photos, lab reports), say (respiratory distress in voice), and demonstrate (gait abnormalities in video). Gemini 3 Pro cross-references symptoms against Merck Manuals, WHO, and CDC guidelines via integrated Google Search—ensuring hallucination-resistant medical guidance.

Breakthrough Feature - Clinical Logic Lens: Real-time visualization of AI reasoning displays differential diagnoses with likelihood scores, evidence sources, and transparent triage recommendations (Green/Yellow/Red). This explainability builds trust in medical AI.

Global Impact: Supporting 5 languages, MerckLens democratizes medical expertise for underserved communities, reduces unnecessary ER visits significantly, and generates professional referral letters for seamless physician handoff. Built entirely through vibe coding in AI Studio—proving Gemini 3 Pro can solve complex real-world healthcare challenges.
keywords: medical, mercklens, gemini, care, triage, reasoning, patients, evidence, guidance, sources

title: Vaani - The voice
subtitle: When you can’t speak, Vaani speaks for you.
description:
Millions of people struggle to communicate during critical moments—patients recovering from surgeries, individuals with speech disabilities, elderly users with limited motor control, or anyone unable to express pain or needs. Vaani is built for them.

Vaani is a real-time, multimodal AI system that understands gestures, body cues, voice, and language to assist individuals who cannot speak.
Using the device camera, Vaani identifies simple hand gestures, body-region indicators (head, chest, stomach), and contextual surroundings (medical or restaurant environments). It then converts these signals into clear, natural spoken sentences in English or Hindi, giving a voice to those who need it most.

Vaani is designed around safety, accuracy, and dignity.
It uses gesture stability checks, confidence scoring, and severity levels to avoid false communication. Medical-related gestures are mapped to high-alert responses, while restaurant or daily-life gestures trigger polite, contextual phrases. All interpreted actions appear in a Live Understanding Panel—a clean, medical-style log that caregivers and family can instantly read.

A simple Tap-to-Speak button enables multilingual voice input, while wake-word “Vaani…” support is available as an experimental option.

Vaani adapts to the user with personalized greetings—
“Hello Krishna” or “नमस्ते Krishna”—
and remembers frequently used phrases for faster communication.

Vaani’s mission:
To provide a reliable, human-centered bridge between people who cannot speak and the world around them.
Accessible. Real-time. Designed with empathy.

title: Career Compass 3.0
subtitle: Career Compass 3.0
description:
Project Title: Career Compass 3.0 – Your Multimodal AI Career Co-Pilot

Career Compass 3.0 is an AI-powered career co-pilot that analyzes everything a student or early professional already has—marksheets, project screenshots, LinkedIn profile, GitHub repos, certificates, and even written answers about interests—and turns it into a personal skill graph, missing-skill roadmap, best-fit career paths with expected salary bands, a daily learning plan, and an auto-generated CV + portfolio.

It uses Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal and advanced reasoning capabilities to understand unstructured, real-world data from multiple sources and convert it into actionable, personalized career guidance that feels like talking to a personal mentor who has read your entire academic and project history.

Students and young professionals struggle with three major problems:

Scattered Profile Data:
Grades live in PDFs, skills in GitHub, projects in Google Drive screenshots, achievements in random certificates, and experience in LinkedIn. No single system integrates all of this to understand who they really are.

Confusing Career Choices:
They see vague labels like “Data Scientist”, “Product Manager”, “Backend Engineer” but don’t know:

Am I actually ready for this role?

What exactly am I missing?

What salary level is realistic for my current skill set?

Action Gap (What should I do today?):
Even when they know their career goal, they don’t know:

Which courses to take in what order

What projects to build to stand out

How to structure their CV and portfolio for that specific role

Most tools solve only one small piece: resume builders, generic roadmaps, or static job descriptions. There is no unified, AI-first system that eats all your real data (marksheets, code, certificates, LinkedIn, etc.) and outputs a grounded, personalized career map.

Career Compass 3.0 is a web/mobile application that acts as a multimodal career intelligence layer for each user.

User uploads/provides:

College marks

title: OncoSwarm
subtitle: Current AI thinks in a straight line. My system, OncoSwarm, thinks like evolution. It generates a decision tree of possibilities, exploring
description:
"Traditional AI looks for a needle in a haystack. OncoSwarm burns the haystack and builds a magnet."

In standard drug discovery, failure is a dead end. When a candidate molecule fails a lab test due to toxicity or poor binding, the research path is often abandoned.

OncoSwarm fundamentally changes this paradigm. It is an Agentic AI System powered by Gemini 3 that treats failure as data. Instead of thinking in a linear line, OncoSwarm thinks like an Evolutionary Tree.

When a drug fails, OncoSwarm triggers a massive Parallel Bifurcation:

Keeps the core structure but tweaks it to fix the specific failure (e.g., "Add a hydroxyl group to reduce liver toxicity").

####Path B (The Innovator):
Pivots to a completely new chemical scaffold or mechanism (e.g., "Switch from inhibitor to PROTAC degrader").

By simulating thousands of these "What If" scenarios simultaneously, we turn a single failed data point into a roadmap for a cure.

The system does not use one agent; it uses a **Swarm of Agents **operating in parallel.

Input: Raw medical data (PDF Pathology Reports, CT Scans, Genetic Sequencing logs).

Action:  Uses Gemini 3's multimodal capabilities to OCR and parse complex medical data.

Output: Identifies the precise "Enemy" (e.g., NSCLC with KRAS G12C mutation and TP53 resistance).

Instead of a chat interface, the core logic is a Decision Tree.

Root: The Cancer Target.

Branches: Every hypothesis spawns 5-10 parallel branches.

Leaves: Each leaf is a generated 3D molecular structure (PDB/SDF).

Pruning: "Critic Agents" automatically kill branches that violate laws of physics or chemistry, saving compute for promising paths.

Scenario: A Doctor/Researcher marks a drug as FAILED.

Reaction:The system does NOT apologize. It asks "Why?"

Action: If the reason is "Hepatotoxicity," the swarm automatically searches global databases for structural analogs that solve hepatotoxicity in similar compounds and generates a new branch.

AI Core: Google Gemini 3 (Pro/Flash)

Reaso
keywords: drug, oncoswarm, data, tree, failure, candidate, system, gemini, parallel, core

title: DermoAssist AI: A Multimodal Dermatology Assistant for Doctors
subtitle: An AI tool that analyzes skin lesion images and symptoms to generate differential diagnoses and clinical reports.
description:
I built DermoAssist AI because skin issues are incredibly common - more than one in three people deal with a dermatology concern every year. But getting real help is slow. In many places, seeing a dermatologist can take three to six months, and early detection makes a huge difference. For example, melanoma caught early has a 99 percent survival rate, but that drops dramatically if it’s found late.

DermoAssist AI is a simple tool for doctors: upload a lesion photo, add any symptoms, and hit Analyze. Gemini 3 Pro looks at both the image and the text together, then gives a differential diagnosis with confidence percentages, a plain-language explanation of its reasoning, and suggestions for next steps like monitoring, biopsy, or referral. It’s not meant to replace a clinician - just help them make faster, clearer decisions.

I also optimized it so it feels fast and clean. The app compresses images by over 90 percent before sending them to the model, and it includes a one-click PDF report generator. The interface follows a minimal, Apple-style design that looks and feels professional for clinical use.
keywords: dermoassist, three, help, early, percent, looks, them, feels, built, because

title: PromptNote: The Social Network for Vibe Coding. Discover. Swipe. Remix.
subtitle: A visual community platform to browse AI prompt results, swipe for code, and adapt any use cases instantly using Gemini-powered Smart Remix.
description:
PromptNote reimagines prompt engineering as a visual, social experience, essentially "Github meets Instagram" for the AI era.

The Problem Existing: Prompt libraries are static text lists. They fail to show context, a prompt that works for coding in Gemini might fail for writing in GPT-4. Users struggle to see the result before they copy prompts, and adapting other's prompt to your own needs is difficult.

Solution: PromptNote solves this with a "Result-First" UI. Users browse a feed of generated images or code. A simple Swipe Left reveals the exact prompt, model settings (e.g. Gemini 3), and scenario tags. The killer feature is "Smart Remix": a button that uses AI to instantly rewrite a shared prompt to fit the user's specific topic.

How I Built It: I built PromptNote using Google AI Studio’s "Vibe Coding" workflow.

Vibe Coding Architecture: I used Gemini 3 Pro to architect a complex Single Page Application with a simulated backend. The model handled state management and design logic entirely through natural language intent.

Agentic "Smart Remix": The core innovation uses Gemini 3 Pro’s reasoning capabilities. I instructed the model to act as a semantic agent that "transfers" the logic of a prompt to a new domain while preserving the original structure.

Multimodal Data: I used Gemini to generate a synthetic dataset of 50+ high-fidelity posts across English and Chinese, demonstrating the model's ability to maintain cultural nuance and technical accuracy.

Impact PromptNote democratizes advanced prompting, turning it from a technical skill into a shared, creative culture.
keywords: prompt, gemini, promptnote, model, coding, fail, users, result, smart, remix

title: Geo-Decision Copilot
subtitle: Location-Aware Business Intelligence
description:
Geo-Decision Copilot is a multimodal AI agent that democratizes high-end spatial intelligence. Traditional GIS tools (like ArcGIS) are too complex for average business leaders, while standard dashboards lack spatial reasoning. This application bridges that gap using Gemini 3 Pro.

It functions as a strategic partner: users can upload sales data (CSV/GeoJSON) or site plans (images), and the agent analyzes them to answer critical questions like "Where should we expand?" or "Assess flood risk for these assets."

Key capabilities include:

This tool empowers small businesses and NGOs to make sophisticated, data-driven location decisions without needing a data science team.

How I created it:

I built the frontend with React 19 and Tailwind CSS, using Leaflet for the interactive map interface.
The core intelligence is powered by the Google GenAI SDK (gemini-3-pro-preview).

System Prompting: I engineered a robust system prompt that instructs Gemini to output a strict JSON schema. This allows the AI to "control" the map placing markers, drawing polygons, and adjusting zoom levels, while simultaneously generating a Markdown strategic analysis.

Multimodality: I used Gemini's vision capabilities to process user-uploaded images (base64 encoded) alongside text prompts, enabling the model to "see" the map or site plans.

Data Handling: I integrated papaparse for client-side CSV handling and created a mock "Data Cleaning" pipeline to demonstrate how AI can assist with data quality.

Visualization: I implemented custom Leaflet rendering for heatmaps and complex polygons based on the AI's structured output.

Impact:
Location is the #1 factor for success in retail, logistics, and real estate, yet quality analysis is expensive. Geo-Decision Copilot makes this accessible. By translating complex spatial data into plain English and visual recommendations, it helps users minimize risk (e.g., avoiding flood zones) and identify hidden opportunities, fostering smarter urban planning and b

title: Gemini 3 Anti-Phishing Tool
subtitle: Anti-Phishing Tool
description:
# Gemini 3 Anti-Phishing Tool

Scams are getting too realistic, especially for older people. We built this tool to catch what human eyes might miss, using Gemini 3 Pro to analyze threats like a real security expert.

It doesn't just say "Dangerous." It draws red boxes right on the screenshot to show exactly what’s fake (like a weird logo or a bad URL).

You can upload a screenshot and paste the message text. The AI compares them to see if they match or if it's a trap (like a shipping SMS leading to a bank login).

It’s simple to use. Just drag, drop, and get a clear answer instantly.

title: VitalVibe- AI Triage Assistant
subtitle: VitalVibe: An AI nurse that uses video to detect visible symptoms, analyze history, and auto-book the right doctor instantly.
description:
The body speaks a language of subtle signs, but in a world of text-based tools and waiting rooms, we have lost the ability to listen until it is often too late.

Healthcare today faces a strange paradox. We have access to more medical knowledge than ever before, yet the "first mile" of getting sick—that vulnerable moment when you realize something is wrong—feels lonelier and more confusing than ever.

When you wake up feeling awful at 2 AM, your options are limited and stressful. You can panic-search your symptoms online, usually leading to terrifying and incorrect conclusions. You can struggle with rigid "symptom checker" apps that feel like interrogations. Or, you can wait it out, hoping it’s nothing serious, potentially missing critical warning signs.

We built VitalVibe to change this story. VitalVibe isn't just a smart app; it’s a compassionate, observant health partner. It is designed to bridge the gap between that first moment of uncertainty and the professional care you actually need.

The core issue isn't a lack of information; it’s that we expect sick people to act like doctors.

Most digital tools today rely on what we call "Passive Input." They assume that when you are sick, anxious, or in pain, you can perfectly describe what is happening to you. They assume you know which symptoms matter. But that is rarely true.

The "Silent" Symptoms When we are unwell, we focus on what hurts the most—like a stomach ache. But we often miss the visible signs that tell the real story. We might not notice that our skin looks a bit pale, our eyes are slightly yellow, or that we are subconsciously protecting one side of our body when we move. Text-based apps are "blind" to these clues. If you don't type it, they don't know it.

The Burden of Explaining Yourself Every time you see a new doctor or use a new app, you have to start from scratch. You have to remember the name of that surgery you had three years ago or the exact dosage of your medication. It’s exhausting, espec
keywords: your, vitalvibe, doctor, when, like, just, health, more, first, what

title: VibeGo: The Image-to-Reality Engine
subtitle: Turn any static image—movie scene, painting, or photo—into a bookable, real-world adventure using Gemini’s multimodal reasoning.
description:
We all experience "Vibe Envy"—wishing we could step inside the world of a breathtaking image. Traditional travel tools are broken; they search by text, not by feeling.

VibeGo is an Image-to-Reality Autonomous Agent built with Gemini 3 Pro and Google Search Grounding. It translates abstract aesthetic intent into objective, bookable experiences.

The Agentic Workflow
Visual Reasoning: The agent analyzes a user-uploaded image to extract its "Aesthetic Coordinates"—mood, lighting, and architectural style. The Agent Reasoning Log displays its real-time, step-by-step decision-making process.

Geospatial Grounding: It acts as a logic engine, cross-referencing these aesthetic traits with real-world data to find "Earthly Doppelgangers"—locations that perfectly match the Vibe.

Constraint Optimization: VibeGo handles complex conflicts. The Budget Doppelganger feature automatically swaps high-cost logistics for affordable alternatives, strictly maintaining the core aesthetic. It also performs Feasibility Scans to validate opening hours and weather.

Creative Output: It offers two plans: a Structured Itinerary, and the Anti-Itinerary—a mood-based, free-form map designed for exploring the physical world via aesthetics.

VibeGo proves the future of search is not about keywords, but about aligning our reality to our aesthetic intent.
keywords: aesthetic, step, world, image, search, vibego, agent, vibe, reality, grounding

title: ResQ-Ai- Disaster Response System
subtitle: ResQ Ai is an disaster response system using Gemini 3 Pro to detect risks from text, images & videos and give real-time disaster guidance.
description:
AI Disaster Guardian is a multimodal disaster-response assistant powered by Gemini 3 Pro, designed to help individuals, communities, and rescue teams prepare for and respond to natural disasters in real time.

The app analyzes text, images, and videos to detect hazards such as floods, fires, storms, structural damage, or other emergencies. Using Gemini’s reasoning and multimodal capabilities, it generates risk scores, safety instructions, resource recommendations, and location-specific guidance.

During crises, users can upload photos or describe their situation, and the system instantly interprets the scenario, providing actionable survival steps. It can summarize emergency guidelines, translate content into local languages, and create personalized safety plans. A threat map and downloadable PDF report offer users a full disaster overview.

AI Disaster Guardian also features a chatbot powered by Gemini, capable of answering user questions with context-aware, prompt-based responses. Built entirely in Google AI Studio with vibe coding, the app demonstrates advanced reasoning, visual understanding, and real-time decision support in one unified tool.

By delivering accurate and timely insights, AI Disaster Guardian reduces response time, supports better decision-making, and has the potential to save lives. This project highlights Gemini 3 Pro’s ability to tackle real-world challenges, combining creativity, technical depth, and practical impact into a single, powerful solution.
keywords: disaster, gemini, guardian, real, time, multimodal, response, powered, reasoning, safety

Flash Congress is an agentic web application that simulates the legislative process of the United States Congress. By leveraging the Google Gemini API, the application creates hundreds of distinct AI agents—each representing a currently active member of the House or Senate—to debate, reason, and vote on user-proposed legislation in real-time.

title: EcoLogistics AI: Where Green Becomes Gold
subtitle: AI-powered logistics transforming from cost center to climate advantage
description:
Project Title: EcoLogistics AI

Tagline: AI-Powered Logistics Optimization That Turns Sustainability into Competitive Advantage

What I Built:
EcoLogistics AI is a logistics optimization platform that eliminates the "profit versus planet" dilemma. I built a GenAI-powered orchestrator that simulates real-world constraints to demonstrate how a live digital twin would optimize routing, turning carbon emissions into a strategic, optimizable variable.

The Core Innovation:
Traditional logistics solvers treat optimization as rigid mathematical calculations. EcoLogistics AI introduces contextual reasoning with Gemini's multi-modal capabilities, creating a system that understands the "why" behind optimization decisions, not just the "what."

How It Works:

Real-World Data Ingestion:

Simulated System Context (AI-Powered):

AI Orchestration Layer:

Executive Decision Interface:

Three actionable scenarios:

Demonstrated Impact (From Our Dashboard):
✅ Financial Transformation:

✅ Environmental Leadership:

✅ Operational Excellence:

AI Orchestration with Gemini's Differentiators:
Traditional vs. Gemini Approach:

Weather Handling:
Traditional Solver: Applies numerical speed penalty (speed × 0.8)
Gemini in EcoLogistics: Understands semantic impact - rain increases accident risks and affects EV battery efficiency due to HVAC usage

Traffic Optimization:
Traditional Solver: Simple distance/time calculation
Gemini in EcoLogistics: Processes "construction" context with routing alternatives based on semantic understanding

Constraint Handling:
Traditional Solver: Returns "infeasible" for conflicting constraints
Gemini in EcoLogistics: Performs Pareto optimization via reasoning, finds compromises like a human manager

Adaptability:
Traditional Solver: Requires equation rewrites for new vehicle types
Gemini in EcoLogistics: Updates via text in prompt (Zero-shot adaptation)

Decision Explanation:
Traditional Solver: Black box calculations
Gemini in EcoLogistics: Natural language "why"
keywords: gemini, ecologistics, optimization, traditional, logistics, impact, solver, strategic, calculations, cost

Title: Animal Colonies: The Community Platform for Coordinated Street Feeding
Animal Colonies is a dedicated web application focused on the essential, day-to-day welfare of stray animal colonies by centralizing and coordinating feeding efforts. It serves as a real-time digital logbook for volunteers, ensuring transparency, consistency, and accountability in the care of street animals.

Key Features & Impact for Contest Judging:

Verified Feeding Tracker: The core functionality allows registered users (volunteers) to log every feeding visit to a colony. Users record when and where the feeding took place.

Photo and Comment Verification: Every feeding entry is enriched with user-uploaded photographs. These mandatory visual proofs verify the visit, document the condition of the feeding station, and offer a quick status check on the animals themselves. Volunteers can add comments to alert others about urgent matters (e.g., an animal's injury, need for a trap, or low food stock).

Coordinated Care: By providing a clear, chronological history of feeding visits, the platform prevents overfeeding, avoids unnecessary duplicate trips by multiple volunteers, and immediately highlights colonies that may have been missed.

Community Accountability: The platform fosters trust and efficiency within the volunteering network. The public record of feeding sessions provides a clear audit trail, demonstrating consistent commitment and promoting responsible management to local authorities and donors.

Animal Colonies transforms scattered, individual acts of kindness into a highly organized, verifiable, and sustainable system of daily care, ensuring no street animal goes hungry while empowering the compassio

title: The Plant Therapist
subtitle: A premium AI companion that gives your garden a voice, translating biological health into a unique, personality-driven care experience.
description:
The Plant Therapist

🚀 The Pitch
We all talk to our plants, but what if they could talk back? The biggest friction in plant care isn't lack of information—it's a lack of connection. A yellowing leaf is silent; it doesn't tell you if it's drowning or thirsty. "The Plant Therapist" solves this by using Gemini 3 Pro to bridge the interspecies communication gap. We don't just diagnose your plant; we give it a voice, a personality, and a medical history.

🌿 The Problem
Houseplants are booming, but plant mortality is high. Most owners fail because they misinterpret visual cues. Existing apps are sterile databases—they tell you what is wrong, but they don't make you care until it's too late. They lack the "vibe" that makes plant parenthood rewarding.

💡 The Solution
The Plant Therapist is a premium, multimodal web application that combines high-precision visual diagnostics with creative persona generation.

Visual Bio-Feedback: You snap a photo. Gemini 3 Pro analyzes biological markers (turgidity, chlorosis, soil texture) with expert precision.

Persona Translation: The AI doesn't just output data; it "roleplays" the plant based on its health and species.

A thirsty Peace Lily becomes a dramatic diva: "I am literally fainting. The drama is real. Water me now."

A healthy Cactus becomes a stoic introvert: "I'm thriving. Please continue to ignore me."

Longitudinal Care: It turns a static photo into a dynamic relationship.

✨ Key Features

The "Vibe" Diagnosis Gone are the boring error messages. Our AI analyzes the plant's condition and translates it into a first-person message delivered with attitude. It turns anxiety-inducing problems into engaging conversations.

"My Garden" Patient History (New!) Plants are living things, not static objects. The "My Garden" feature allows users to:

Save & Track: Create a digital sanctuary of your specific plants.

Historical Health Curves: Re-visit past diagnoses to see if that Fiddle Leaf Fig is actually recovering or just being stubbo
keywords: plant, plants, care, gemini, just, visual, vibe, therapist, lack, using

title: Slidy — Idea-to-Deck in Minutes, Not Hours
subtitle: From messy notes, docs, and voice to cinematic, text-in-image decks powered by Gemini 3 Pro, Nano Banana Pro, and Live.
description:
Slidy turns rough ideas, notes, and transcripts into a complete slide deck in minutes. Gemini 3 Pro, Nano Banana Pro, and Live work together to understand your content, design the story, and render each slide as a single text-in-image frame.

You start with what you already have: a project brief, meeting notes, or a spoken recording. Gemini 3 Pro acts as the strategic brain: it digests the long context, asks clarifying questions through Gemini Live when needed, and designs a slide-by-slide narrative tailored to your audience and goal. The result is a clear arc from problem to vision to proof to call-to-action.

For visuals, Slidy uses Gemini 3 Image (Nano Banana Pro) to render each slide as a single artwork where layout, illustration, and typography are fused together. Titles, bullets, and key metrics are baked directly into the image itself, so there are no broken fonts, overlapping elements, or fragile HTML overlays.

When something feels off, you open the Studio. You can erase artifacts with an inpainting brush, tweak the scene description, or fork an alternate version. Slidy keeps a copy-on-write history and uses reverse prompting to keep the underlying text description in sync with every visual change, so future generations stay stylistically consistent.

Slidy showcases the Gemini ecosystem end to end: Gemini 3 Pro for reasoning and planning, Nano Banana Pro for text-in-image rendering, Gemini Live for full-duplex voice, and Gemini 2.5 Flash for grounding and TTS.
keywords: gemini, slide, slidy, image, nano, banana, live, text, notes, into

title: MathMaster AI: Intelligent Lesson Plan Diagnostics
subtitle: Powered by Gemini 3.0, MathMaster AI optimizes math lessons via 5-dim diagnostics, pain point scanning, and real-time data grounding.
description:
The release of new educational curriculum standards presents a global challenge: how do teachers translate abstract core competencies into concrete classroom activities? MathMaster AI is the missing link between policy and practice.

Built on Gemini 3.0 Pro, MathMaster acts as a virtual senior researcher. Unlike generic summarizers, it performs a deep "CT scan" of lesson plans (PDF/Text) using a proprietary 5-Dimensional Evaluation Matrix (Target, Content, Activity, Evaluation, Tech).

Key Innovations:

MathMaster AI moves beyond simple correction; it standardizes teaching quality and fosters educational equity by making expert-level feedback accessible to every teacher.

In Junior High School mathematics, teachers often struggle with:

MathMaster AI leverages the advanced reasoning capabilities of Gemini 3.0 Pro to solve these issues:

We engineered a complex prompt that forces the model to think like a "Senior Teaching Researcher." It analyzes content against a strict knowledge base of curriculum standards, ensuring feedback is pedagogical, not just grammatical.

Teachers can upload PDFs directly. The system extracts text and uses KaTeX to perfectly render complex mathematical formulas ($ax^2+bx+c=0$) in the analysis report, ensuring a professional experience for math educators.

We utilize Gemini's Google Search tool to solve the "Outdated Data" problem.

The app outputs a structured JSON response that drives a dynamic Recharts Radar Chart, providing an immediate visual health check of the lesson plan across:

Built with ❤️ for the Global Gemini API Developer Competition.
