title: Multimodal Life Planner
subtitle: An AI-powered planner that transforms natural prompts into structures tasks across voice, text, and images
description:
Managing daily tasks across different formats—voice notes, text reminders, and images—can be overwhelming. Our Multimodal Life Planner solves this frustration by using Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced reasoning and native multimodality to unify task management in one intelligent app.
With this planner, users can simply speak, type, or upload an image, and the app automatically converts the input into structured tasks, calendar events, or reminders. For example, a voice note like “Remind me to call mom when I get home” becomes a scheduled reminder, while a photo of receipts is organized into expense-tracking tasks. Gemini’s reasoning ensures context is understood, while multimodality allows seamless integration of text, audio, and visuals.
This project demonstrates how AI can reduce everyday friction points and improve accessibility for people who rely on different input modes. By bridging natural prompts with structured planning, the Multimodal Life Planner empowers users to stay organized, save time, and focus on what matters most.
Thesolution highlights the potential of Gemini 3 Pro to reinvent productivity tools, showing how multimodal AI can transform simple ideas into powerful, real-world applications.

title: MediScanAI
subtitle: Faster and more accurate diagnoses for medical radiologists
description:
The Problem:
There is an acute shortage of radiologists in the health systems worldwide, with more than 30,000 specialists being required all over the globe. This results in:

2-4 hour wait times for diagnostic imaging analysis in emergency departments
30% burnout rate among practicing radiologists due to overwhelming workloads.
12 million Americans are affected by diagnostic errors annually.

Rural and underserved communities without access to specialized radiological expertise

Our Solution:
MediScan AI taps into the native multimodal capabilities of Gemini 3 Pro to instantaneously provide intelligent medical image analysis. While most AI tools rely solely on pattern recognition, MediScan AI combines visual analysis with clinical context, providing comprehensive diagnostic insights along with full reasoning chains.

How It Works:
Uploading Images: Healthcare providers upload chest X-rays, though support for other imaging modalities is planned.
Clinical Context: Patient symptoms, medical history, and vital signs are provided along with the image.

Multimodal Analysis: Gemini 3 Pro simultaneously processes both the radiological image and patient information.

Intelligent Reasoning: AI generates findings with detailed explanations of why certain patterns indicate specific conditions.

Actionable Results: Provides primary diagnosis, differential diagnoses with confidence levels, clinical reasoning, and evidence-based recommendations.

Key Innovation: Multimodal Clinical Reasoning

What makes MediScan AI unique is how it thinks like a physician:
Visual Analysis: Identifies anatomical structures, abnormalities, and pathological patterns.
Contextual Correlation: Connects imaging findings with patient symptoms and medical history
Reasoning Chain: Describes the diagnostic thought process, not just the conclusion.

Evidence-Based Recommendations: Suggests next steps, including additional tests, treatments, and follow-up protocols.

Technology Stack
AI Engine: Gemini 3 Pro f
keywords: diagnostic, analysis, image, clinical, reasoning, multimodal, medical, imaging, mediscan, gemini

title: FixIt AI - AI Powered Visual Troubleshooter
subtitle: A multimodal system that detects real-world problems from images/videos and provides step-by-step fix instructions.
description:
FixIt AI is a multimodal troubleshooting assistant that identifies real-world problems directly from images or videos and generates clear, safe, step-by-step instructions to fix them. Whether it's a dirty mirror, tangled cables, a loose component, a misaligned object, or a small everyday hardware issue, FixIt AI analyzes the scene using Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced vision, reasoning, and context capabilities.

The app is designed to remove a major daily friction point: searching through long videos or forums for simple fixes. Instead, users upload a photo or short clip, and FixIt AI instantly detects what’s wrong, explains why it happened, and provides easy repair steps that anyone can follow. It also includes safety notes and optional annotated visuals that highlight the exact regions of concern.

FixIt AI leverages Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodality to interpret objects, materials, spatial relationships, and environmental cues. This makes it capable of diagnosing issues that traditional rule-based tools cannot. The entire workflow—from visual inspection to repair guidance—is performed in real time through a single, accessible interface.

The impact is practical and immediate: millions of people struggle with small but annoying everyday problems that waste time, cause stress, or require external help. FixIt AI empowers users to solve these issues independently, lowering friction, saving time, and making troubleshooting more intuitive and accessible for everyone.

title: CLARA, your Clinical & Analysis Reporting Assistant
subtitle: CLARA is a user friendly medical companion that explains symptoms, gives smart diagnoses, and supports everyday language for accessible care
description:
What CLARA Is

CLARA is a Clinical and Analysis Reporting Assistant. She is an intelligent medical companion designed to help people understand symptoms, record health information, and receive structured, medically grounded insights. CLARA does not replace doctors. She improves how patients communicate their symptoms, and how clinicians receive information, leading to faster, clearer, more accurate care.

CLARA works as a bridge between the real world and the healthcare system. She transforms messy, everyday language into clear medical summaries, differential diagnoses, and structured reports.

How CLARA Affects People

CLARA:
• Reduces anxiety by giving people a first layer of understanding before seeing a doctor
• Helps users explain themselves clearly
• Catches concerning patterns early
• Supports people in remote areas where healthcare access is limited
• Encourages follow-up and responsible medical behavior

Most importantly, she empowers users who feel overwhelmed, shy, or unsure how to describe medical issues.

CLARA gives people clarity, especially those who:
• don’t know how to describe symptoms
• mix medical terms in multiple languages
• tend to forget important details
• have limited health literacy

This alone solves one of the biggest problems in global healthcare.

CLARA gives clinicians clean, accurate reports that save time and reduce errors.

Doctors receive:
• structured summaries
• timeline of complaints
• relevant positives and negatives
• differential diagnosis list

Instead of wasting time figuring out what a patient means, they instantly understand the case.

CLARA improves:
• efficiency of medical consultations
• accuracy of data
• patient engagement
• early detection workflow

This leads to:
• reduced workload
• less overcrowding
• higher satisfaction on both sides

Why CLARA Is User-Friendly

Users can speak naturally. No need for medical knowledge.

Examples:
“my stomach is killing me since yesterday”
“بحس بحرقة وانا ببول”
“my kid is cough

title: Human + AI Delivery Mesh – Powered by PostAI
subtitle: Bringing human–AI collaboration to every doorstep on Earth.
description:
PostAI Assistant is a multimodal AI assistant built with Gemini 3 Pro that supports postal workers in real time through vision, speech, geolocation and rule-based reasoning. It identifies parcel labels, damaged items, inaccurate addresses, incorrect locations and route hazards, while providing instant customer-facing explanations, service recommendations and multilingual assistance.

Beyond logistics, national postal networks are one of the few remaining public-facing infrastructures that interact with almost every citizen, in almost every country. By giving postal workers worldwide an AI-powered assistant on their delivery device, PostAI becomes a mechanism for AI sensitization, helping customers understand and trust AI through direct human interaction. Each delivery becomes a micro-moment of digital education. Postal employees act as the human interface of a global, distributed intelligence network.

This creates a distributed, data-driven human–AI mesh, where knowledge flows from central systems to the edge (postal workers) and back through real-world feedback. The system continuously learns from images, locations, workflows and spoken interactions—turning traditional postal operators into adaptive, living intelligence ecosystems.

Gemini 3 Pro powers the entire workflow:
• Vision: address reading, damage detection, entrance identification
• Audio: hands-free support for customers
• Reasoning: route optimization, rule compliance, delivery decisions
• RAG: postal knowledge base (services, pricing, delivery rules and exceptions)

PostAI is not just an app. It is a blueprint for global-scale AI adoption, enabling millions of citizens to encounter AI safely, transparently and with human guidance.

title: RoomGen AI
subtitle: RoomGen AI leverages Google Gemini to auto-catalog furniture and generate optimized 3D room designs from text prompts.
description:
Project Summary
RoomGen AI is a web-based design tool that blends technical room planning with artistic AI presentation. Developed to address digitalization needs within the furniture sector, this project allows users to add 3D models to a catalog in seconds and create automatic designs using both manual tools and "text-to-room" technology.

Inspiration
As a Digitalization Specialist at a furniture company, I closely observe the time lost to manual product data entry (dimensions, colors, descriptions) and the challenges of creating custom room designs for clients. I wanted to use Google Gemini's multimodal capabilities to automate this process, empowering anyone to work like a professional interior designer in a matter of seconds.

Key Features and Workflow

Process: The user simply drags and drops a 3D furniture file (.glb) into the system.

AI Analysis: The system sends a snapshot of the model to Google Gemini 2.5 Flash.

Auto-Fill: Gemini analyzes the image to automatically generate the product name, a detailed description, and the category (e.g., Sofa, Table).

Physical Data: The model processor calculates physical dimensions (width, depth, height) with millimeter precision from the file's bounding box and automatically generates a studio-lit "thumbnail" for the catalog.

Room dimensions (width, depth) and wall/floor materials can be customized.

Products from the catalog are added to the plan via drag-and-drop.

Synchronized View: While the user works on the 2D plan, the 3D preview screen, powered by React Three Fiber, updates in real-time.

Prompt-Based Design: The user enters a prompt, such as "A luxury reading room" or "A modern, spacious living room."

Semantic Selection: The AI selects the most suitable furniture from the existing catalog based on the input description.

Algorithmic Placement: Selected items are placed with a flow optimized for the room's geometry and furniture type.

Collision Detection: The system prevents furniture from overlapping, pri

title: Wonder Scanner: The "Why?" Engine for Kids
subtitle: Turn the real world into a fun, interactive classroom using Gemini 3's vision and reasoning.
description:
The Problem: Children ask an average of 73 questions a day. "What is that?" "How does it work?" "Why?" Parents aren't always available—or knowledgeable enough—to explain complex concepts like photosynthesis or car engines in a way a 5-year-old can grasp.

The Solution: Wonder Scanner transforms the world into an interactive classroom. It is an AI companion that allows children to snap a photo of anything—a bug, a machine, a cloud—and receive an instant, fun, and age-appropriate lesson.

How We Built It: We used Gemini 3 Pro in Google AI Studio to "vibe code" an experience that goes beyond simple image recognition.

Native Multimodality: We leverage Gemini's ability to "see" and identify not just objects, but the context around them (e.g., distinguishing a "sleeping" cat from a "hunting" one).

Advanced Reasoning: The app doesn't just return a Wikipedia summary. It reasons about the child's intent and generates an "Explain Like I'm 5" narrative, breaking down complex systems (like how gears work) into simple analogies.

Wonder Scanner empowers children to explore their environment independently, ensuring that their curiosity is never met with "I don't know," but always with a moment of wonder.
keywords: children, like, wonder, work, always, explain, complex, scanner, into, gemini

title: MindfulPath – An Intelligent Android Mood Tracker
subtitle: A Smart, AI-Assisted Mood Monitoring and Mental Well-Being Application Built Using Kotlin, Firebase, and MVVM Architecture
description:
Mental health has increasingly become a crucial aspect of modern living, especially in a world where stress, anxiety, and emotional fluctuations are part of everyday life. Recognizing this need, MindPulse was designed and developed as a comprehensive Android-based mood tracking and psychological guidance application. It combines intuitive user experience design with intelligent data analytics, providing users with timely insights, behavioral trends, and personalized well-being recommendations. The app aims to empower individuals to better understand their emotional patterns and take actionable steps toward self-improvement and mental clarity.

MindPulse serves as a personal mood diary, an emotional wellness coach, and a psychological assessment tool—all integrated seamlessly into one mobile application. The app records the user's emotional state multiple times a day, analyzes the inputs using a structured inference model, and generates daily psychological summaries. Through Firebase Authentication and Firestore, MindPulse ensures secure and scalable cloud data management, while the MVVM architecture and Jetpack Compose UI build offer a modern, clean, and maintainable codebase.

Purpose and Vision of the Application

The primary goal of MindPulse is to help users proactively track and understand their moods while receiving meaningful guidance to enhance emotional well-being. Instead of relying on overwhelming analytics or complex health dashboards, the app employs simple, friendly interfaces and a minimalistic design to encourage daily engagement. Users can log their mood up to three times a day, provide short notes on their emotional experience, and rate their energy levels on a simple slider. These small, consistent entries collectively form a powerful reflection of the user’s psychological state over time.

The vision behind MindPulse is to create a tool that balances accessibility with psychological insight. Many individuals struggle with articulating their emoti

title: Operate: The AI Interface Assistant
subtitle: Just point, shoot, and control.
description:
Operate is a mobile-first visual action agent that translates human intent into physical action. It empowers users to control complex physical interfaces—from confusing thermostats to industrial control panels—simply by looking at them through their camera.

How I Created It: Built using React and Tailwind CSS for a futuristic, industrial aesthetic, the app leverages Gemini’s native multimodality. When a user snaps a photo of a device and types a command (e.g., "Make it warmer"), the app sends the visual data and natural language intent to Gemini. Gemini analyzes the interface's topology, identifies the specific controls required, and returns a structured JSON response containing step-by-step instructions and spatial coordinates for target buttons, which the UI renders as an augmented reality-style overlay.

Why It Matters: We live in a world cluttered with bad design. Elderly users struggle with digital remotes; travelers struggle with foreign appliances; technicians struggle with new machinery. Operate solves the "interface friction" problem. By using Gemini to bridge the gap between "what I want" and "which button to press," we make the physical world accessible and instantly learnable for everyone.

title: AI Codebase Navigator
subtitle: AI Codebase Navigator is an intelligent system that lets developers upload an entire codebase and instantly analyze, search, and understand.
description:
AI Codebase Navigator

AI Codebase Navigator is a powerful AI assistant that transforms how developers understand and work with large codebases. Using Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced reasoning and multimodality, the system allows anyone to upload a repository and instantly ask natural-language questions about the code—“Where is this bug coming from?”, “How do these modules interact?”, “What does this API actually do?”. The backend parses every file, generates high-quality embeddings, and builds a vector-search index that feeds a robust RAG pipeline designed to prevent hallucinations. The result is precise, citation-based answers that point directly to the relevant files and line numbers.

The platform features a clean React interface for browsing folder structures, previewing code, and chatting with the AI. Under the hood, FastAPI, ChromaDB, and Gemini 3 Pro work together to deliver real-time code intelligence, architecture insights, refactoring suggestions, and debugging guidance. By turning complex repositories into easy-to-understand conversations, AI Codebase Navigator helps developers ship faster, onboard quicker, and eliminate hours of manual code reading—making deep code understanding accessible to everyone.
keywords: code, codebase, navigator, developers, understand, work, gemini, powerful, assistant, transforms

description:
Every day, millions of Americans living in rural areas face a stark reality: access to specialist medical care isn't just inconvenient—it's often impossible. When a patient in rural Montana needs a chest X-ray interpreted, they don't wait hours. They wait days or weeks.

The Scale of the Crisis:

The Human Cost:
A farmer with chest pain waits 3 days for their CT scan results. A child's fractured bone goes untreated because the X-ray sits in a queue. A woman's breast cancer is caught weeks later than it should be. This isn't theoretical—this is daily reality for rural America.

Why Existing Solutions Fall Short:

RuralRadAI is an AI-powered diagnostic assistant that brings expert-level medical imaging interpretation to the point of care. Built on Gemini 3 Pro's state-of-the-art multimodal capabilities, it transforms rural general practitioners and nurse practitioners into confident diagnosticians with instant access to specialist-level insights.

Core Innovation:
Unlike traditional AI diagnostic tools that provide simple classification, RuralRadAI leverages Gemini 3 Pro's deep reasoning and conversational abilities to engage in genuine diagnostic dialogue—just like consulting with a radiologist colleague.

Upload any medical image (X-ray, CT, MRI, ultrasound) and receive:

Powered by Gemini 3 Pro's:

Engage in natural dialogue with the AI:

The AI doesn't just answer—it reasons through the differential diagnosis with clinical context, just like a human specialist would.

Advanced Prompt Engineering:
We developed a sophisticated prompt architecture that transforms Gemini 3 Pro into a virtual radiologist:

Multi-Turn Diagnostic Dialogue:
The system maintains conversation state to enable natural follow-up questions, context refinement, and collaborative reasoning between provider and AI.

title: RegulonForge: Simulating the Dark Genome with Gemini 3 Pro
subtitle: Multimodal regulatory genomics simulator for exploring non-coding mutations, TF networks, and chromatin logic.
description:
While coding variants benefit from well-established interpretation frameworks, non-coding mutations remain a critical bottleneck in cancer genomics and precision medicine. These regions, enhancers, promoters, silencers, control gene expression and harbor disease-driving variants, yet researchers still rely on fragmented annotations, static databases, and indirect statistical signals. Most regulatory logic remains unresolved, leaving clinically relevant variants uncharacterized.

RegulonForge demonstrates how multimodal reasoning can help close this gap. Built with Gemini 3 Pro, it offers an interactive environment for exploring the regulatory consequences of non-coding variants:

Multimodal Analysis: Input sequences alongside genome browser screenshots (UCSC, IGV). Gemini identifies chromatin tracks, predicts motifs, and correlates visual and sequence context — true vision-language reasoning for genomics.

Perturbation Sandbox: Compare wild-type and mutant sequences side-by-side. Visualize how motifs, TF binding logic, and regulatory network topology shift upon mutation.

Sketch-to-Sequence: Draw regulatory elements freehand. Gemini interprets the sketch, infers the underlying grammar, and generates synthetic DNA prototypes for further exploration.

Evolution Viewer: Explore inferred evolutionary constraints acting on regulatory motifs without requiring alignments.

Teaching Mode: Interactive quizzes transform mechanistic explanations into accessible learning experiences.

Non-coding variants are increasingly implicated in cancer predisposition, drug response, and disease progression, yet they remain the "dark matter" of clinical genomics. As precision medicine advances, the ability to interpret regulatory mutations will become essential for diagnosis and therapeutic targeting. RegulonForge shows how general-purpose multimodal models can perform domain-specific mechanistic reasoning, offering transparent, stepwise explanations of regulatory function to researchers,
keywords: regulatory, variants, coding, genomics, multimodal, reasoning, gemini, motifs, mutations, remain

Tholnokku (தொல்நோக்கு : "Ancient Vision") changes everything.

Tholnokku transforms anyone with a smartphone into a guardian of Tamil heritage. 🪷

title: Little Plant Explorer: Turning Nature Walks into AI Adventures
subtitle: Helping children turn every plant photo into a fun, curious learning moment with Gemini.
description:
In an age where "Nature Deficit Disorder" is a growing concern, children often learn about the world through screens rather than direct experience. Existing plant identification apps are designed for adults—they are encyclopedic, text-heavy, and often dry. They give you the Latin name and a Wikipedia link, but they don't spark wonder.

We wanted to build a "Pokédex for the real world"—an app that speaks to children, not at them. By leveraging the multimodal and real-time capabilities of Gemini 2.5, we built Little Plant Explorer. It transforms a simple photo of a flower into an interactive, voice-driven educational adventure, encouraging kids to run outside, complete "missions," and have actual conversations with a nature expert.

Little Plant Explorer is a web-based "Digital Nature Diary" designed specifically for children aged 5-8.

The application is a React 19 Single Page Application (SPA) styled with Tailwind CSS, built entirely around the @google/genai SDK (v1.31.0).

We used gemini-2.5-flash for the core identification engine. To support the gamification features, we couldn't just ask for text. We utilized JSON Schema enforcement in the generateContent call.

We integrated the Gemini Multimodal Live API (gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview) via WebSockets.

We used gemini-2.5-flash with the googleSearch tool for the "Smart Search" feature.

For non-live interactions, we utilized gemini-2.5-flash-preview-tts with the "Puck" voice configuration. This specific voice profile provided the energetic, playful tone necessary for a children's app.
keywords: gemini, children, flash, nature, plant, voice, often, world, identification, designed

title: DawaMom| AI-powered cervical cancer screening tool
subtitle: DawaMom is an AI-powered cervical cancer screening tool that augments primary healthcare providers with fast, accessible, and accurate early
description:
Project Title: DawaMom: AI-Powered Cervical Cancer Screening for Low-Resource Settings

Cervical cancer remains a leading cause of death among women in Sub-Saharan Africa due to limited access to timely, accurate screening. Conventional Visual Inspection with Acetic Acid (VIA) is low-cost but highly subjective, operator-dependent, and often misses precancerous lesions.

DawaMom is an AI-powered screening solution designed to address these barriers by delivering specialist-grade, real-time diagnostic support directly to frontline healthcare providers such as nurses and midwives. Leveraging a fine-tuned MedSigLIP computer vision model trained on 5,500 cervix images, DawaMom achieves 96.7% accuracy and F1-scores of 0.95–1.00 across Normal, CIN1–3, and Suspected Cancer categories. The system runs on accessible, low-cost devices — any smartphone with a 16M+ pixel camera, enabling task-shifting, standardized assessments, and immediate clinical guidance without reliance on laboratories or specialists.

By providing automated image quality checks, multi-class lesion classification, triaged risk scoring, and actionable recommendations, DawaMom overcomes VIA’s limitations of subjectivity, poor lesion granularity, and lack of documentation. All AI outputs are stored digitally, supporting quality assurance and remote specialist review.

Illustratively, in Zambia, DawaMom could reduce missed pre-cancer cases from 19,000+ to about 5,000, preventing an estimated 700 deaths annually, and save the government over $1.5 million by shifting treatment from late-stage cancer to early intervention.

DawaMom strengthens health systems, advances equity by delivering high-quality screening to underserved communities, and generates data for informed public health planning. It aligns with WHO cervical cancer elimination goals, offering a scalable, cost-effective solution that transforms reproductive healthcare in low-resource settings.
keywords: dawamom, cancer, screening, cervical, cost, quality, powered, resource, settings, solution

title: New WriteupScriptGuard: The Global AI Pharmacy Safety Agent
subtitle: A multimodal AI agent that solves the global drug shortage crisis by verifying safe medication substitutes, cross-referencing patient lab re
description:
Project Description
ScriptGuard is a multimodal AI agent designed to combat the global drug shortage crisis and medication safety gap. In 2024, supply chain failures force patients to switch to generic substitutes they don't recognize, creating anxiety and dangerous dosing errors. While existing apps act as passive text scanners, ScriptGuard is an active safety auditor that bridges the gap between doctor's orders and pharmacy reality.

Powered by Gemini 3.0 Flash Experimental, ScriptGuard digitizes handwritten prescriptions and generates a "Visual Standard," showing patients exactly what their pill should look like. Its core innovation, the Substitute Verification Portal, allows patients to photograph a generic medicine box when their brand is unavailable. The AI acts as a clinical pharmacist, analyzing active ingredients and release mechanisms to Approve or Reject the swap instantly.

Uniquely, ScriptGuard integrates a Lab Report Dataset, "reading" past blood work to create a personalized safety baseline (e.g., warning against NSAIDs if kidney markers are high). It features a Global Smart-Login that auto-configures emergency numbers (SOS) and native languages for 40+ countries. If the Multilingual Voice Nurse detects life-threatening keywords like "pain" or "collapse," it triggers an instant One-Tap Emergency Call and simulates real-time alerts to caregivers.

Built with Streamlit and Python, ScriptGuard transforms the patient from a vulnerable victim of shortages into an empowered, safety-checked user
keywords: scriptguard, safety, patients, global, generic, active, their, like, emergency, project

title: Reimagining Teaching & Learning through Interactive AI Experiences
subtitle: Transforming classes 8 to 12 with real time simulations, concept extraction and a unified teaching platform already reaching 300+ students.
description:
Transforming classes 8 to 12 with real time simulations, concept extraction and a unified teaching platform already reaching 300+ students.

1. Introduction: Why We Started This

Every school today has access to smart boards, digital content and the internet. But the actual classroom experience looks almost identical to what it was 20 years ago. Teachers still rely heavily on pages of NCERT textbooks. Students still struggle to visualise what they read. Concepts become harder from grade 8 onwards and by grade 11 and 12, large portions of science become purely abstract.

Across chemistry, physics, biology and mathematics, students repeatedly face the same problem:
they can read the definition but cannot see the idea.
Teachers try their best but often don’t have the tools or time to create meaningful visual aids.

This gap is not small. It affects millions of learners in India alone.

Our goal was simple: turn every NCERT concept into an interactive experience that finally makes sense.

2. The Core Problem

• Smart boards are being used like projectors, not learning tools
• Students memorise diagrams instead of understanding concepts
• Teachers struggle to explain complex topics without a visual aid
• Advanced concepts like FCC, BCC, chemical bonding, reaction mechanisms or physics phenomena cannot be shown live
• Educational content is scattered across textbooks, PDFs and YouTube videos

The result is predictable. Confusion increases, interest drops and learning becomes passive.

3. Our Approach: Turning Textbooks into Interactive Modules

We built a system that starts with the NCERT textbook and converts each chapter into a complete learning experience. The pipeline works like this:

a. Concept Extraction with NotebookLM

We use NotebookLM to extract:
• key formulas
• core definitions
• textbook explanations
• important diagrams
• step wise reasoning
• teacher friendly notes

This ensures that the content stays aligned with NCERT and remains authentic and accurate.
keywords: students, concept, teachers, ncert, into, interactive, classroom, learning, real, time

title: MedTranslate: The AI-Powered Real-Time Medical Communication Bridge
subtitle: Using the Google AI studio and Expert Prompt Engineering to Prevent Diagnostic Errors and Bridge Healthcare Disparities for Millions.
description:
The Challenge & The Solution
Language barriers are a silent crisis in healthcare, leading to thousands of adverse events and tragic diagnostic errors annually. Current interpreters cause delays, and general-purpose tools like Google Translate miss vital medical nuance. MedTranslate is a HIPAA-compliant, real-time, context-aware translation system designed to solve this.

The AI Breakthrough
We leverage the Gemini API with specialized System Prompt Engineering to create the Medical Context-Aware Interpreter. Unlike traditional translators, MedTranslate is trained on medical terminology, anatomy, and cultural health concepts, ensuring nuance preservation and critical accuracy.

Key features enabled by Gemini's reasoning:

Smart Clarification: The AI interjects when detecting jargon or ambiguity (e.g., "Doctor, the patient may have understood X, but you meant Y. Should I clarify?").

Multimodal Support: It translates not just speech, but also screen annotations and diagrams in real-time.

Technical Implementation
The core translation and clarification logic is powered by a fine-tuned Gemini model via a simple Python/Streamlit prototype. The prompt ensures a professional, low-latency, and privacy-first conversational flow.

Impact and Future
MedTranslate immediately addresses healthcare inequity for over 67 million Americans with limited English proficiency. By ensuring accurate communication, we are building a tool that will save lives, reduce medical errors, and scale globally to make quality healthcare a universal right.
keywords: medical, healthcare, medtranslate, gemini, errors, nuance, real, time, context, aware

title: EZID: Secure Digital Identity Shortener
subtitle: Replacing error-prone handwritten emails with verified Short IDs.
description:
Across trade fairs, retail stores, and schools, millions of leads are lost daily due to illegible handwriting. Sharing a complex email like rahul.kumar.official@zohomail.in on paper is slow, error-prone, and exposes personal data to prying eyes.

**EZID **is the bridge between offline interactions and digital data. It allows users to claim a unique, memorable handle (e.g., ezid.in/rahul) linked to their verified email. Instead of writing long emails, users simply share their EZID or show their unique QR code.

Key Features:

How I Created It

Built entirely using Google AI Studio Vibe Coding,  EZID demonstrates how complex full-stack logic—including authentication, database transactions, and credit-based billing systems—can be generated and deployed rapidly. It transforms a messy manual process into a sleek, secure digital workflow.

I built EZID using Google AI Studio's Vibe Coding capabilities. I started with a prompt defining the "Handwritten Email Problem" and iteratively built a full-stack React application backed by Firebase.

Backend-as-a-Service: utilized Firebase Authentication for identity and Firestore for the NoSQL database.

title: kikipounamu (ASR System)
subtitle: Enterprise-grade distributed microservices ASR system. Features dynamic scaling and high-concurrency resilience. Built on Event-Driven Archi
description:
Project kikipounamu is a production-ready, high-performance Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) system architected as a distributed microservices platform. Built from the ground up to solve the critical pain points of traditional monolithic ASR systems, this project delivers enterprise-grade reliability, scalability, and performance for real-time speech-to-text processing.

At its core, kikipounamu represents a paradigm shift in ASR system design: by leveraging Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) with Go language high-performance gateways and Redis Streams message bus, I've achieved complete decoupling between compute-intensive operations (ASR inference) and I/O-intensive operations (network connections). This architectural innovation enables the system to handle massive concurrent loads while maintaining exceptional reliability and responsiveness.

Traditional ASR systems face three fundamental challenges in production environments:

Concurrency Bottleneck: Monolithic Python-based systems struggle under high concurrent loads due to Global Interpreter Lock (GIL) limitations, leading to degraded performance and service crashes when handling hundreds of simultaneous audio streams.

Resource Isolation Failure: When network I/O and heavy computation share the same process space, network saturation can starve GPU resources, while GPU computation can block network responses - creating a cascading failure scenario.

Scalability Limitations: Vertical scaling hits hardware limits quickly, while horizontal scaling of monolithic systems wastes resources by duplicating both lightweight network handlers and heavyweight AI models.

My solution delivers:

I made a strategic technology choice that leverages each language's strengths:

Go Gateway Layer:

Python Worker Layer:

This separation enables me to scale each layer independently based on actual bottlenecks: spinning up more lightweight Go instances for network I/O, or provisioning GPU-equipped machines for computation.

I innovate
keywords: redis, streams, system, systems, architecture, network, kikipounamu, performance, time, concurrent

title: Vitalis AI
subtitle: The Personalized Fitness Ecosystem
description:
Vitals AI: The Personalized Health Coach Powered by Gemini 3 Pro
Executive Summary
Vitals AI is a next-generation fitness and wellness platform leveraging Gemini 3 Pro to create deeply personalized workout and nutrition plans. The key innovation is the AI Form Correction System, where the app analyzes the user’s exercise video and, using Gemini, provides instant, human-like corrective feedback. Vitals AI offers an adaptive, truly intelligent coaching experience that goes beyond simple tracking.

Process: The user records or live-streams themselves performing an exercise.

title: Space：Multi-agent interaction for studying the philosophy of physics

description:

By integrating Google's Gemini API with a pixel-art open world, we have resurrected 10 of history's greatest physicists—from Newton and Einstein to Bohr—as independent AI agents with distinct personalities, memories, and philosophical dogmas.

title: SlideCrunch: Slides to Study Pack
subtitle: We built SlideCrunch, a multimodal study copilot that converts slide decks, PDFs, and posters into a complete study pack in seconds. Using G
description:
SlideCrunch - Slides to Study Pack

Subtitle: Any slides, PDF, or poster transformed into a summary, a concept map, a 20-question quiz, flashcards, and a five-minute recap in seconds.

Project Description
SlideCrunch is a study copilot built in Google AI Studio with Gemini 3 Pro Preview. It converts presentations, PDFs, posters, and screenshots into a coherent, exportable study pack. The goal is not merely to compress text, but to rebuild the learning experience around the original content. Users upload a file and receive a two-layer summary that preserves coverage while staying readable, a concept map that reveals relationships between ideas, a twenty-question short-answer quiz suitable for quick formative checks, an Anki-ready flashcard set for spaced repetition, and a five-minute recap script that supports time-boxed review or voice-over. All artifacts are generated in English, Dutch, or Turkish and respect two style modes: Simple for short sentences and minimal jargon, and Detailed for slightly longer sentences with brief rationale. The pipeline is engineered so that every artifact is produced from aligned intermediate structures, which keeps the outputs consistent with each other and easy to export or audit.

Impact and Motivation
Learners and educators routinely spend more time preparing materials than engaging with ideas. A typical deck of twenty to thirty slides demands an hour of skimming to identify core points, more time to draft practice questions, and even more time to assemble flashcards. Instructors often need a concept overview for class discussion and a quick quiz to check understanding, while students want something they can study immediately before or after class. SlideCrunch collapses this workflow into a single step. The summary takes the place of manual note consolidation. The concept map substitutes for whiteboard diagrams and connects otherwise isolated facts. The quiz and flashcards supply retrieval practice without extra authoring. The reca

title: OmniBase Architect
subtitle: A next-generation Backend-as-a-Service dashboard demonstrating Unified Trust Layer orchestration, multi-token identity mapping, and AI-assis
description:
Overview
OmniBase is a next-generation Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) designed to solve the "Integration Hell" of modern web development. Unlike traditional BaaS platforms (like Firebase or Supabase) that act as walled gardens, OmniBase operates as a Universal Identity Broker. It unifies authentication from any provider, maps it to a single internal permission system, and securely orchestrates direct access to databases, storage, and external 3rd-party APIs—eliminating the need for complex backend "glue code."

The Problem
Modern developers suffer from Identity Fragmentation and Service Sprawl.

They use Auth0/Clerk for login, Postgres for data, and Stripe/OpenAI for logic.

Connecting these requires writing and maintaining insecure "glue code" (Lambda/Cloud Functions) just to manage API keys and translate user tokens between services.

The Solution: OmniBase
OmniBase provides a single, high-performance control plane that sits between the Frontend and the fragmented backend ecosystem.

Key Features
Universal Trust Layer (BYO-Auth):

Accepts identity tokens from any provider (Auth0, Clerk, Firebase, Cognito, or custom legacy systems).

Automatically validates, normalizes, and maps these external identities to a unified internal User ID.

Benefit: Zero vendor lock-in for authentication. Switch auth providers without rewriting your database policies.

Outbound API Proxy (The Glue-Code Killer):

Allows frontend clients to call third-party APIs (e.g., /proxy/stripe/charge, /proxy/openai/completion) securely.

OmniBase intercepts the request, validates permissions, and injects the secret API keys server-side before forwarding the call.

Benefit: Build complex integrations securely from the client side without managing a backend server.

Unified Data & Realtime Engine:

Built on PostgreSQL. Auto-generates REST and GraphQL APIs from your schema.

Enforces access control via native Row Level Security (RLS) using the unified identity.

Streams database changes to clients via Web
keywords: omnibase, backend, identity, data, unified, service, single, securely, external, apis

title: Multi-Agent Dev Studio
subtitle: Web IDE that turns a single prompt into a live, editable web app using parallel multi-agent workflows powered by Gemini 3 Pro.
description:
Multi-Agent Dev Studio is a web-based IDE built with Gemini 3 Pro.
From a single, simple prompt, it generates a high-quality web page with a live preview and full source code directly in the browser. Behind the scenes, multiple specialized agents run in parallel to take the roles of planner, designer, and engineer.

Problem

Developers, indie hackers, and creators often want to quickly try ideas as working web pages. However:

Writing HTML/CSS/JS from scratch is time-consuming.

Typical single-agent AI tools often produce unstructured or low-quality code.

Switching between a prompt tool, editor, and preview window breaks the creative flow.

As a result, many ideas never make it past the “sketch in your head” stage.

Solution: Multi-Agent Dev Studio

Multi-Agent Dev Studio reduces this friction.
The user types one high-level instruction such as:

“Create a landing page for a new AI productivity app with a hero section and three feature cards.”

The app then:

Interprets the request and plans the page structure.

Generates copy and layout suggestions.

Produces clean, editable HTML/CSS/JS.

Renders an instant web preview in the same interface.

Users can inspect or copy the code, tweak it with follow-up prompts, and immediately see the result.

How it uses Gemini 3 Pro

The core of the app is a parallel multi-agent workflow built on top of Gemini 3 Pro:

A planning agent that understands the prompt and defines the sections of the page.

A UI/content agent that writes the text and suggests layout patterns.

A coding agent that turns the plan into structured HTML/CSS/JS.

A review agent that checks and refines the output to keep it consistent.

Because these agents run in parallel, the user gets fast feedback from a single prompt, instead of waiting for multiple separate conversations.

Target users & impact

The primary target users are people who want to “get running code and source quickly” without setting up a local environment:

Hackathon participants

Solo develo
keywords: agent, multi, studio, page, code, prompt, gemini, single, live, preview

title: IdeaLaunch
subtitle: IdeaLaunch is an AI-powered divergent thinking engine that leverages Google Gemini  to transform a single input theme into a spectru
description:
Project Name: IdeaLaunch – The AI Divergent Thinking Engine

Short Description:

IdeaLaunch is an AI-powered creative incubator designed to break cognitive fixation. Leveraging Google’s Gemini 2.5 models, it transforms a simple text input into a spectrum of distinct visual concepts—from practical evolutionary upgrades to surreal, experimental abstractions.

What I Built:

I built a web-based “Divergent Thinking Engine” that acts as a brainstorming co-pilot. Unlike standard image generators that merely illustrate prompts, IdeaLaunch first uses gemini-2.5-flash to deeply deconstruct the user’s theme semantically. It then applies one of three creative strategies—Evolution (optimization), Revolution (structural transformation), or Experimental (abstract logic)—to generate unique conceptual frameworks. Finally, gemini-2.5-flash-image renders these ideas into high-fidelity visuals instantly.

Key Features:

Three-Tier Divergence Architecture: Control creativity “temperature”—from safe functional tweaks to physics-defying reimaginings.
Infinite Semantic Adaptation: Generates dynamic, context-aware prompts (e.g., treating “Chair” and “Cloud” with entirely different design logics).
Concept Board Export: Auto-compiles ideas into professional PDF mood boards for design reviews or classroom use.
Local Persistence: Securely saves creative history locally via IndexedDB.
Technical Stack:

Frontend: React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS (Neo-Brutalism design)
AI Core: Google Gemini 2.5 Flash (reasoning) + Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (visualization)
Storage: IndexedDB
Value:

For designers, writers, and educators, IdeaLaunch eliminates “blank canvas paralysis.” It doesn’t just show you an image—it reveals six radically different ways to think about your subject, expanding the realm of possibility before you even draw the first line.
keywords: gemini, idealaunch, image, flash, creative, into, design, divergent, thinking, engine

Context-Aware Analysis: Users can select specific protocols (General Ward, ICU Infection Control, or ER Trauma). The AI analyzes the image strictly against that specific text.

AI Consultant Chat (New Feature): After the audit, users can chat with an AI Consultant to ask follow-up questions like "How do I fix this cable issue cheaply?" or "Which JCI chapter does this violate?".

Instant Scoring: It generates a quantified Safety Score (0-100%) and an executive summary for hospital management.

title: ContractShield Enterprise: The First Multimodal Agentic Legal Guardian
subtitle: erifying the whole truth by cross-referencing legal contracts with multimodal evidence (audio & images) using Gemini 3Pro.
description:
1. The Problem
Contracts are the operating system of the modern world, yet the review process is critically broken. We sign static PDFs, but the real agreements often happen in unstructured formats: verbal promises made during meetings, casual email threads, or handshake deals.

Traditional Legal AI is "blind" to this reality. It only analyzes the text within the four corners of the document. If a landlord verbally promises "pets are allowed" but the contract says "no pets," a standard AI reviewer will mark the contract as safe. The tenant signs, and gets evicted.

2. The Solution
ContractShield Enterprise is an agentic workspace that uses Gemini 1.5 Pro’s advanced multimodal capabilities to bridge the gap between what is signed and what was actually promised.

It is not just a document reviewer; it is a Forensic Truth Engine. By ingesting the contract (PDF) alongside external evidence (Audio recordings of meetings, Screenshots of emails), ContractShield detects "Multimodal Conflicts"—contradictions between written terms and verbal/informal agreements.

3. How We Use Gemini (Technical Depth)
We leverage the unique capabilities of the Gemini API to power three core engines:

Multimodal Reasoning (Audio-to-Text Cross-Check):

We utilize Gemini’s native ability to process audio and images alongside text without external transcription tools.

Workflow: The system feeds the lease agreement (Text) and the meeting recording (Audio) into Gemini's context window. We prompt the model to identify specific contradictions.

Result: Gemini identifies that at timestamp 00:42 of the audio, a verbal consent was given that contradicts Clause 5 of the text.

Long Context Window:

Legal diligence requires analyzing dozens of files simultaneously. Gemini’s 1M+ token context window allows ContractShield to hold the entire "Deal Room" (Contract + History of emails + Hours of audio) in memory at once to perform holistic reasoning.

Agentic Drafting (The Lawyer Persona):

We use Gemini not

title: Resolve: Relationship Health Mentor
subtitle: "Love is not just a feeling, it's a practice."
description:
Resolve: Relationship Health Mentor

Mental Health · AI · Flutter · Social Impact · Privacy · Relationships

One-Sentence Elevator Pitch

Resolve is an AI-powered relationship mentor that blends psychology with Nonviolent Communication (NVC) to transform emotional conflict into structured connection—guiding couples from destructive fights toward restorative dialogue.

Project Description

In modern relationships, we communicate more than ever—but truly connect far less. Text messages filter out tone and emotional nuance, allowing minor misunderstandings to escalate. In face-to-face conflict, the amygdala hijack pushes partners to say things they later regret. Most couples lack a safe buffer zone to process disagreements, leading to emotional erosion over time.

Resolve is not just another messaging app—it is a relationship health mentor. Inspired by the philosophy of Kintsugi, the art of repairing cracks to create something more beautiful, Resolve intervenes at the communication moments that matter most.

We built two core phases:

Phase 1: The Mediator (Conflict Resolution)

During conflict, Resolve introduces a unique Cool-down Buffer—a required period of emotional labeling and countdown that helps partners decelerate out of the emotional storm.
Then, the AI Copilot transforms blaming or aggressive statements (e.g., “You always do this!”) into NVC-aligned sentences structured around Observation / Feeling / Need, ensuring messages carry needs and care rather than hurt and accusation.

Phase 2: The Gardener (Relationship Nurturing)

To prevent emotional overdraft, Resolve includes a Daily Connection ritual. Each day, partners receive a psychologically grounded prompt—ranging from memories to values. Through a Blind Reveal mechanism, both answers remain hidden until each partner submits, encouraging curiosity and establishing a pattern of high-quality daily interaction.

Trust is the foundation of every relationship—so Resolve is built with privacy-first architecture
keywords: resolve, emotional, relationship, conflict, health, mentor, privacy, into, connection, couples

PhishHunt Pro transforms Gemini 3 Pro into a senior threat analyst that delivers instant, production-ready threat intelligence. Analysts paste raw email content and headers, and the app generates:

The app compresses hours of expert work into seconds while maintaining transparency through structured JSON outputs and human-readable narratives. Security teams get immediate detection deployment capability plus strategic foresight into where attacks could escalate.

Built entirely in AI Studio, PhishHunt Pro demonstrates how Gemini 3 can serve as infrastructure for specialized AI agents in high-stakes domains like cybersecurity.

title: DSA Tutor AI
subtitle: DSA Tutor AI is an interactive learning assistant.
description:
What the app is
DSA Tutor AI is an interactive learning assistant that helps students understand Data Structures and Algorithms concepts and solve coding problems step by step using Gemini 3 Pro. The app runs entirely in AI Studio and provides a focused space to ask doubts, generate explanations, and practice problems in a conversational way.

Core features
Concept tutoring: Users can ask theory questions (e.g., arrays, trees, DP) and get clear, structured explanations, examples, and intuition tailored to their level.

Guided problem solving: For a given DSA problem, the app walks through approach, edge cases, time–space complexity, and then helps refine solutions or debug code.

Multiple learning modes: The app can act as an explainer, interviewer (mock interview Q&A), or code reviewer, so learners can switch between understanding, practice, and feedback.

Context-aware chat: The conversation keeps track of earlier questions so the tutor can build on previous explanations instead of starting from scratch each time.

How it is built with Gemini 3
The app uses Gemini 3 Pro in AI Studio with a custom system prompt that defines the tutor’s role, teaching style, and response structure for DSA topics. It leverages the app UI to accept natural language questions, pass them to Gemini 3 Pro, and render the model’s responses as formatted, readable explanations and code snippets.

Value for users
DSA Tutor AI reduces the friction of learning DSA by turning Gemini 3 Pro into an always-available personal tutor instead of a generic chatbot. It is especially helpful for students preparing for interviews or courses who need quick, targeted help on specific topics, problems, or code bugs.

The app also includes a programming language selector (such as Python, C++, and Java), so Gemini 3 Pro can adapt code examples and solutions to the user’s preferred language, making it easier to connect DSA concepts with real interview-style implementations.
keywords: gemini, tutor, code, explanations, learning, problems, questions, language, helps, students

title: AI Teammate for Kaggle EDA with Gemini 3 Pro in Google AI Studio
subtitle: An AI-powered teammate that, given a Kaggle competition or CSV, automatically plans and writes beginner-friendly EDA and modeling code using
description: This Kaggle notebook project builds an “AI teammate” to help with tabular Kaggle competitions by automatically generating a high‑quality prompt for Gemini 3 Pro in Google AI Studio. Instead of calling Gemini from Kaggle, the notebook analyzes a tabular dataset (like an income classification dataset), summarizes its schema and sample rows, and then produces a detailed prompt that asks Gemini to: identify the ML problem, design an EDA and baseline modeling plan, write pandas/seaborn/sklearn code, and explain everything in simple, beginner‑friendly language. The project targets beginners who struggle with deciding which EDA steps and models to start with, and it currently focuses on binary classification tabular problems while suggesting extensions to regression, time series, and direct Gemini API integration in the future.

title: AIHealth Navigator
subtitle: Multimodal Clinical Triage & Doctor Assistance Powered by Gemini 3 Pro
description:
AIHealth Navigator transforms hospital triage by using Gemini 3 Pro to instantly analyze multimodal patient data—symptoms, voice, and medical documents—reducing waiting times and preventing misdiagnosis.

The Problem:Emergency rooms are overcrowded. Doctors waste hours manually reviewing paperwork, leading to burnout and delayed care for critical patients. Traditional hospital systems are passive data stores that cannot "see" or "think."

The Solution: AIHealth Navigator is an intelligent clinical copilot. Patients simply upload a photo of a prescription or lab report and describe their symptoms. The app uses Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal vision capabilities to extract structured medical data (medications, lab values) and its reasoning engine to correlate these with reported symptoms.

How It Uses Gemini:

Multimodal Triage: We feed text, images, and OCR data into Gemini to calculate a clinical "Urgency Score" (1-5).

Chain-of-Thought Reasoning :The AI provides a transparent medical rationale for its decision, helping doctors trust the output.

Doctor Dashboard: Critical cases are auto-prioritized. The system drafts clinical summaries and differential diagnoses, allowing doctors to focus on treatment rather than triage.

Impact: By automating the initial clinical assessment, AIHealth Navigator ensures high-risk patients are seen first, democratizes access to expert-level triage in rural areas, and streamlines hospital workflows end-to-end.
keywords: triage, gemini, data, clinical, aihealth, navigator, hospital, multimodal, symptoms, medical

title: Justice friend - Indian Consumer Complaint generator
subtitle: AI tool that helps Indian consumers create ready-to-file consumer court complaints with guided steps, low cost, and no lawyer needed.
description:
We built an AI-powered tool that helps Indian consumers create ready to file  consumer court complaints in a simple, affordable, and guided way, without needing to hire a lawyer.

In India, millions of consumers face unfair treatment every year. These include defective products, denied refunds, poor service, hidden charges, delayed deliveries, and unresponsive companies. While consumer courts exist to protect citizens, most people never use them. The reason is not lack of merit but lack of access. Legal language is intimidating, processes feel complex, lawyers are expensive for small claims, and people do not know where to start.

Our project directly addresses this gap.

Today, an average Indian consumer experiences three major barriers when seeking justice:

1) Fear and confusion
People do not understand legal terms or court processes. Even when they are right, they worry about doing something wrong.

2) High cost relative to loss
For a loss of five thousand or ten thousand rupees, paying an advocate does not feel worth it. So consumers give up.

3) Complex procedures
Consumer courts require structured complaints, proper formatting, jurisdiction selection, annexures, and timelines. For first time users, this is overwhelming.

As a result, many valid cases never get filed. This weakens consumer protection and allows unfair practices to continue.

Our tool acts like a calm, intelligent assistant that guides a consumer step by step from frustration to action.

Instead of asking users to understand the law, the system asks simple questions in everyday language, such as what went wrong, when it happened, how much money was involved, and whether any proof exists.

Behind the scenes, AI organizes this information into a legally acceptable structure used by Indian consumer courts.

At the end, the user receives a complete consumer court complaint document, ready to be filed online through the government e Daakhil portal or submitted physically.

The user remains in full c
keywords: consumer, tool, court, users, user, legal, system, when, consumers, people

title: Doctor Ai
subtitle: Doctor AI is an intelligent medical assistant that analyzes symptoms, provides possible conditions, and guides users with safe next-step .
description:
DoctorAI is an intelligent medical assistance platform that simplifies how users understand symptoms, prescriptions, and health documents. The system combines a powerful Large Language Model with a document-processing pipeline to extract key information from prescriptions, lab reports, uploaded PDFs, and user-typed queries.

Users can enter their symptoms or upload a medical document, and DoctorAI instantly analyzes the content, identifies important medical terms, and provides clear explanations, possible conditions, and recommended next steps—without offering medical prescriptions. The system helps users understand medicines, tests, reports, and which specialist they may need to consult, bringing clarity to complex healthcare information.

DoctorAI also includes secure authentication, a user dashboard, history tracking, and a clean, easy-to-use interface. The platform is designed with safety and explainability in mind, showing how answers are generated and ensuring users know this is guidance—not a replacement for a doctor.

By transforming confusing medical information into simple, actionable insights, DoctorAI empowers users to make informed decisions and reduces anxiety caused by unclear reports or prescriptions. It is especially useful in areas where medical help is limited or delayed, making healthcare understanding more accessible and transparent.

title: ~EmpathOS
subtitle: An app that changes tone, content, and communication style dynamically based on inferred emotional state
description:
Empathos Adaptive AI is an intelligent, emotionally-aware communication system designed to bridge the gap between human expression and digital interaction. Built for environments where clarity, empathy, and personalization are essential, Empathos enhances how individuals communicate with technology—and with each other—by adapting its responses, tone, and interaction style to the emotional and contextual needs of the user. In a world increasingly shaped by AI systems, Empathos stands apart as an engine not only of intelligence but of understanding.

At its core, Empathos Adaptive AI leverages a multi-layer emotional inference model that analyzes text, voice, and interaction patterns to derive a real-time “emotional signature.” This signature, a combination of sentiment, intent, intensity, and behavioral context, allows the system to modify its language, pacing, guidance, and support strategies dynamically. Rather than relying solely on pre-built sentiment analysis, Empathos incorporates a hybrid architecture combining transformer-based natural language processing with a lightweight, rule-augmented emotional state graph. This gives the system the flexibility of neural networks while maintaining precision, transparency, and controllability—crucial for ensuring emotionally safe interactions.

Empathos was developed during this hackathon with a single question in mind: How can AI become more human-attuned without compromising responsibility, safety, or user autonomy? The project grew from the observation that traditional digital communication tools—chatbots, support agents, recommendation engines—often fail not because their data is inaccurate but because their tone or delivery doesn’t match the user’s emotional state. People react not only to what technology says but how it says it. Empathos Adaptive AI aims to close that gap through emotional intelligence, personalization, and adaptive conversational design.

Core Components

The system consists of four integrated modu
technologies: FastAPI, Redis, react, React, MongoDB, express, Python

title: TroSpot: AI-Powered Coordination for the Informal Economy
subtitle: Harmonizing Ghana’s Trotro system with Gemini 3 Pro’s spatial reasoning.
description:
In Ghana, the trotro (minibus) system moves 70% of the population, yet it operates on chaos. Commuters wait hours in queues while empty drivers circulate nearby, unaware of the demand.
TroSpot is an AI-first application that bridges this gap. Unlike standard ride-hailing apps, TroSpot respects the informal nature of the sector. It utilizes Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced reasoning to interpret geolocation contexts using a unique "Smart Station Snapping" engine.
Key Innovation: The "Smart Station Snapping" engine. Raw GPS data is often dangerous in African cities (leading cars to highways or private lots). TroSpot intelligently "snaps" a user’s GPS location to the nearest safe, recognized bus stop, directing drivers to legal loading zones rather than causing traffic. The app integrates with Firebase Firestore to sync demand and show drivers real-time data.
Built entirely in Google AI Studio, the app creates real-time heatmaps of passenger demand and tracks driver availability. By visualizing the invisible hand of the market, TroSpot reduces wait times, saves fuel, and brings dignity to the daily commute.

Traditional interview preparation is stressful and unstructured. Candidates often struggle to understand what a job requires, what questions to expect, and how well they are performing. Intervify AI solves this problem by using Gemini 3 Pro’s advanced reasoning capabilities to deliver an intelligent, adaptive interview coaching experience.

Job Description Analyzer
Users paste any job description, and Gemini 3 Pro automatically extracts the role summary, required skills, responsibilities, seniority level, and key interview topics. This gives candidates immediate clarity about what the role demands.

Dynamic Interview Question Generator
Using both the job description and the candidate’s background, the system generates a set of highly relevant technical, behavioral, system-design, and coding interview questions. Each question includes difficulty level and an ideal answer outline.

AI-Powered Answer Evaluation
Candidates can write or speak their answers. Gemini 3 Pro evaluates the response and provides a score, strengths, weaknesses, actionable improvement suggestions, and a short summary verdict. This offers instant, high-quality feedback similar to a real interviewer.

WHY GEMINI 3 PRO?

Gemini 3 Pro provides strong reasoning power, multimodal capabilities, and structured output generation. These strengths allow the system to:

deeply understand job descriptions

generate context-aware interview questions

evaluate complex, open-ended answers

return clean JSON for UI and application integration
This project demonstrates how Gemini 3 Pro can power real-world career-tech products.

title: FormAlly-v1
subtitle: Accessible AI form companion that reads any PDF, explains it in your language, and guides you field by field with voice and signatures.
description:
FormAlly is an accessibility-first assistant that turns complex, bureaucratic PDF forms into a guided conversation, especially for blind, elderly or multilingual users.

The user simply drags a paper scan or PDF into the app. Gemini 3 Pro’s multimodal vision reads the document, detects the document language, and builds a structured schema of fields, constraints and sections. FormAlly then drives a one-question-at-a-time flow: a floating prompt card asks the next question, while a smart todo bar shows current, next and completed fields so the user never gets lost.

The assistant speaks and listens. Users can answer with their voice or keyboard; screen-reader-friendly messages stay short and clear; and browser text-to-speech can read out each question. Signature fields open a canvas where a helper can sign with a mouse or pen. FormAlly links that signature to the signer’s full name and automatically stamps today’s date for the final PDF.

Under the hood, three Gemini calls power the app: one to extract the form schema from the PDF, one to manage conversational state and validation across turns, and one to generate a structured summary plus machine-readable export. No backend or auth is required; everything runs through AI Studio.

The result is a small, focused tool that can sit in front of any insurance, health or government form and make it understandable and fillable in the user’s preferred language, opening bureaucratic processes to people who currently depend on others.
keywords: formally, user, fields, question, assistant, turns, bureaucratic, into, users, gemini

title: Agenra: One for All (Frontend)
subtitle: The AI-Native Operating System for Indian Enterprises — Unifying HR, Finance & Support with Gemini-powered Agents.
description:
Agenra is an AI-native enterprise workspace designed for Indian mid-market businesses. Today, MSMEs rely on 5–7 disconnected tools for hiring, HR, IT assets, finance, and support. This fragmentation slows decision-making and creates operational blind spots. Agenra unifies these functions into a single interface, with Gemini models powering the intelligent workflows behind each module.

The submitted app (AI Studio Link) demonstrates the Recruiting, HR, Finance, and Support experiences using frontend logic, structured AI prompts, and mocked responses. The UI and interaction flows are fully functional and illustrate how Gemini would parse resumes, generate job descriptions, summarize financial ledgers, and analyze support patterns. The frontend was built inside AI Studio using Gemini 3 Pro Preview for Vibe Coding, while runtime interactions are optimized for Gemini Flash models known for low-latency structured output.

This approach allows us to show the complete product vision while keeping backend orchestration, credentials, and multi-tenant infrastructure out of the public environment. The app highlights what becomes possible when everyday business workflows are redesigned with multimodal AI: faster hiring, clearer financial insight, and more proactive support operations.

Agenra’s long-term vision is an AI-native OS for Indian businesses — one workspace, powered by Gemini, orchestrating all operations end-to-end.
keywords: gemini, support, agenra, native, workspace, indian, businesses, hiring, finance, models

title: Autonomous Model Builder: End-to-End AutoML System
subtitle: A fully automated ML system that selects features, optimizes architectures, and tunes hyperparameters using intelligent search and meta-lear
description:
The present project utilizes AutoGluon to perform a purely automated end-to-end AutoML pipeline, which is able to handle dataset ingestion, exploratory analysis, preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and ensembling, then generating predictions with minimal human intervention.
Having uploaded a dataset of 891 rows, the pipeline automatically evaluated multiple model families, optimized their hyperparameters, and constructed a final ensemble. It resulted in a Random Forest model, which gave an accuracy of 93.6%.

The system streamlines the entire machine-learning workflow-from raw data to a production-ready model-by intelligently automating every step along the way. Each stage of the pipeline-EDA, feature transformations, model search, and ensemble building-is orchestrated to maximize predictive performance without requiring extensive manual tuning. Although deployment is optional, the pipeline is structured for immediate scaling into real-world applications.

Fundamentally, this is a project that demonstrates how modern AutoML can transform conventional ML development by reducing its complexity, accelerating experimentation, and outputting high-quality models with just a few clicks.
keywords: model, pipeline, project, automl, which, dataset, feature, ensemble, present, utilizes

title: Fluento: Master Any Language By Actually Talking
subtitle: Voice-first AI language practice with phoneme-level feedback powered by Gemini 3 Pro
description:
The Problem

Language apps teach vocabulary, but learners still freeze in real conversations. The gap between "completing lessons" and "speaking confidently" is massive. Traditional apps lack authentic dialogue practice and fail to provide the detailed pronunciation feedback needed to sound natural. Fluento bridges this gap.

Our Solution

Fluento transforms language learning through real-time AI conversations. Users choose from three distinct AI personalities—each with customizable gender and mood—then practice realistic scenarios like job interviews, speed dating, or casual Gen Z slang exchanges.
After each conversation, Gemini analyzes their speech at the phoneme level, identifying exact pronunciation errors, grammar mistakes, and vocabulary improvements. It's like having a native-speaking tutor available 24/7, tailored to your exact skill level.

Why Gemini 3.0 Makes This Possible

Fluento is built on React and powered directly by the **Gemini Live API (Gemini 2.5 Flash Native Audio).

This integration creates a seamless learning experience impossible with single-modal systems.

Impact

Fluento democratizes advanced language education. For the 1.5 billion people learning new languages globally, it provides:

Judgment-free practice environments
Instant, detailed feedback unavailable in traditional classrooms
teaches how people actually speak, including slang and idioms, which are often ignored by standard curriculam
Accessibility for learners without native speaker access
keywords: fluento, gemini, language, practice, learning, native, apps, vocabulary, learners, real

title: CiviX Fix India – AI-Powered Civic Issue Triage System
subtitle: Using AI to classify, prioritize and route civic problems for faster city-level response.
description:
CivicFix is an AI-powered triage system designed to modernize how citizens report civic problems like potholes, water leakage, garbage overflow, electricity faults, and more. Currently, these reports are manually reviewed, causing delays, misrouting, and long resolution times.

CivicFix solves this through an intelligent AI pipeline. Users submit an image or short text describing the issue. The system immediately analyzes the input using Gemini’s multimodal capabilities and returns:
Issue Category (Road, Water, Electricity, Sanitation, Environment, etc.)

Severity Score

Recommended Department Routing

This automation cuts down on manual sorting and enables faster, more organized action by municipal teams. The MVP demonstrates how AI can transform civic management—providing instant triage, structured reporting, and clear prioritization. CivicFix can be integrated into public grievance systems, mobile apps, or smart city dashboards to create transparent, responsive, and citizen-friendly governance.

By streamlining civic issue identification, classification, and routing, CivicFix reduces the burden on civic authorities, empowers citizens, and helps cities respond to problems before they escalate. It represents a step toward smarter, cleaner, and safer urban living in India and beyond.
keywords: civicfix, civic, issue, triage, system, citizens, problems, water, electricity, more

title: Numeriya - Bridging the Financial Literacy Gap with Autonomous AI Accounting
subtitle: The AI-Native Accounting & Finance Software
description:
This project was born out of a specific, personal necessity. As a business owner, I found myself in a position common to many entrepreneurs: I had no financial officer, I hated to manual accounting, and I simply did not have the time to manage complex spreadsheets. Consequently, tax reporting periods became a nightmare of disorganized records and anxiety.

I decided to build a software solution that would solve this problem instantaneously, an AI that acts as a Financial Officer at some degree.

However, upon researching the landscape, I realized this was not just my problem. It is a systemic crisis affecting the backbone of Indonesia's economy.

The barrier to entry for proper financial management in Indonesia is dangerously high, creating a gap that threatens the survival of Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs).

The Financial Literacy Gap
Approximately 34.57% of Indonesia's population lacks adequate financial literacy. More critically, data from the Ministry of Cooperatives and SMEs reveals that 77.5% of MSME operators do not maintain regular bookkeeping. They are flying blind.

The Talent Shortage
Hiring help is often impossible. Indonesia faces a severe shortage of accounting professionals, requiring over 200,000 certified accountants to meet demand, yet currently possessing only around 10,000. This massive supply-demand gap leaves small businesses unable to afford professional financial guidance.

The Economic Consequence
The impact of this gap is devastating:

Numeriya was built to dismantle these barriers.

Numeriya is an autonomous AI accounting platform designed for the "Non-Commercial Version" hackathon track. It is not just a chatbot; it is a full-stack financial agent.

The core philosophy of Numeriya is "Zero-Learning-Curve Finance." Users do not need to understand double-entry bookkeeping, debits, credits, or compliance. They simply converse with the AI, and the system handles the architectural complexity of accounting in the background.

Nume
keywords: accounting, financial, numeriya, indonesia, bookkeeping, project, specific, business, small, data
